1122.content:
It was a normal day for Blythe. working in the pet store. Well she liked working here, and talking with the animals. Well no one knew she could talk with animals except the animals. She never told anyone. Because they probably would't believe her and think she was kind crazy. If they did believe her they would maybe think she was some kind of freak.
She just finished filling the bowls with food for the animals.

"Here you go. Lunchtime everyone!"

"Eh could I perhaps have a bit more?" Russel asked.

"Russel why do you want more. This is what I normally give you since I started working here. Why do you suddenly want more?"

"Eh... It's my instinct." Russel said.

"I thought you instinct was to curl to a ball." Blythe said and giggled.

"That's only when I'm in danger." Russel said. "We hedgehogs hibernate. Much animals that hibernate try to gain some weight around now so they have something to live on while they are asleep."

"But Russel, you have a owner. During the winter you're warm inside a house. You don't have to hibernate."

"I know. But it's just my instinct to eat more to gain some weight.around now."

"Careful Russel or else you get fat. You can better stay slim. Humans also try to stay slender."

"Why is that?" Minka asked excited like always.

"Well slender people are beautiful." Blythe said. Ït's also more..."

"Are you sure about that?" Minka asked. "Don't people think fat girls look good?"

"Well I don't think so. Why?"

Minka fast jumped to a high place in the pet store and returned with two magazines.
Minka fast looked through them and opened both of them on a page.

"I once go those magazines. They're full of paintings from famous painters! I wanted to look through them to improve my art but I also found those."

Blythe looked. One painting was from Rubens with a painting of a fat Lady. The other paintings were from Bortero where all man, woman, kids and even animals looked obese.

"It seems like humans like fat girls." Minka said.

"Minka this was painted over a century ago." Russel said pointing at the painting of Rubens. "Back then people perhaps thought different about fat people."

"But those paintings are still famous!" Minka said excited.

Blythe started thinking. Those painting still were famous. Could it be that people like fat girls. Or was Russel right and did they only liked fat girls in the past. Or did some people liked fat girls. Perhaps. She never thought of that. The people in those paintings did't looked bad. After all they were world famous.
She even started thinking: was she perhaps too thin. Would she look better if she was fat. She never thought of that but why not? Perhaps she did look better fat.
1122.title: Does fat look good on me?

She started with two hamburgers that she grilled together, a hotdog with mustard on it, an extra large pizza with mushroom, and pepperoni on it. Excited by it, she took it like a wild animal, and devoured one food, after another. Blythe was never a big eater until now. If Zoe saw this, she would defiantly be disgusted by this.

         "Oh, it's so good," she said in between meals. "I never thought I would love eating this much!"

         "So uh, why are we going to see Blythe again?," asked Vinnie, the forgetful gecko.

         "Oh goodie," said Minka, "I'd love a banana!"

         The pets, walked over to the kitchen to see Blythe with a swollen belly, and empty dirty dishes. To the pets surprise, they never thought she could eat that much. As Blythe looked down at her belly, she seemed...

"Uh, I'd rather you didn't," commented Blythe. And who could blame her?

         
"Blythe, aren't you a bit worried about your health?" asked a concerned Russell.

         "Yes," agreed Sunil, "I remember how unhealthy it was to eat so many sweets inside the pantry."

         "The horror," said Vinnie, thinking back at it out loud, "THE HORROR!"

         
It then hit Blythe, that she didn't count on her health as being an issue to her weight gain.

         
"Oh gee, guys," said Blythe, feeling foolish, "I never thought of-"

         "WAIT!" Minka interrupted, "there's no need to worry, because there's the..."

         
The mischievous monkey pulled out a printed page from her back, entitled...

         "THE SUMO DIET," she announced, with glee.

         From that moment, Blythe, along with the other pets couldn't believe what Minka had found.

121111.content:
Even though Penny Ling always had someone to talk to at the pet shop, she couldn't help but feel a bit alone inside. She wanted to find someone to love but she felt that given her appearance was so much different from anyone else she thought nobody would ever want her. While everyone else was very slim and had flat stomachs she had a much more rounder form on her body, and belly that was pointing out much more then on anyone else.

If she could choose anyone she would like to spend a bit more "private time" with she would probably pick Russell the hedgehog. He always seemed to be in such a hectic mood of keeping everything in the pet shop so organized that she just wanted to give him a huge panda hug to calm him down. She could see he was once again walking around using his clipboard that he always seemed to be carrying around, and that's when she noticed how he held it. He had the end of it resting on his stomach to keep it in balance while he was checking things of from it. "Has he always been this chubby?" Penny Ling asked herself, and that's when she started to remember something from her past.

When she was small her parents had told her that it was traditions for panda females to get together with the panda male that had the biggest belly since it was a sign on good status.

Russell happen to be a hedgehog but if he got a big enough gut her parents wouldn't probably mind.

And with that in mind Penny Ling thought about what she should do now. Should she tell him about how she feels about him and ask him to gain weight for her, or should she keep it secret for now and try to extra feed him without him noticing it.

Which one should she choose?
121111.title: Penny Ling.

choices: Ignore it and organize the shop
Sit down and rub his stuffed tummy
1211111.content:
After a couple minutes of weighing the two options, she decided that she'd try to fatten him secretly. She'd tell him when the time was right. She didn't want to chance it by flat out asking him if he'd get fat for her! What if he was against the idea? He'd never gain if she forced the topic! But how would she feed him without him knowing?

That day at lunch, Blythe had layed all of their bowls full of pet chow on the ground for them to dig in. Penny Ling eyed her bowl. She was hungry, but she was going to sacrifice her food to a good cause. Once Russell was done eating, she'd say she wasn't hungry and ask him to eat it. It was the perfect plan!

She glanced to her left. Russell's bowl was placed right next to hers today. What luck! When Russell approached, marking off a couple checkboxes before setting his clipboard down to eat, Penny Ling watched him. He ate as any other hedgehog would. One, maybe two pieces of kibble at a time. But she couldn't help herself in enjoying the view of Russell eating. She imagined him getting larger as he ate. Getting cute, chubby cheeks, thick appendages, a round butt, and most of all, a big belly for her to snuggle up against.

She snapped out of it when she saw that he'd finished his food. Now was the time to put her plan into action!

"Russell?" She asked in her soft, sweet voice.

"Yes, Penny Ling?" Russell responded attentively.

"I'm not very hungry today. Would you mind eating my food so it doesn't go to waste?"

Russell was feeling awfully full. He'd had his required amount of necessary nutrition for a hedgehog at lunch. But he couldn't stand to see any kibble be left behind. It was wasteful and - Russell shuddered at the thought of the word - unclean!

"I would hate to see it uneaten...absolutely. I'll eat it" Russell decided.

He made his way over to her bowl. It was much larger because pandas needed more food naturally. He wasn't sure if he'd be able to finish it, but he'd have to try.

He began eating again. It was slow, but steady work as he made a small dent in the amount of food. He was stuffed to the brim, but he felt that he had to keep eating. He'd always had some excess weight on him, but he wasn't like Zoe or any of the other pets. He was never needed for anything that required him to look good. Aside from that one pet photography thing and Blythe's fashion shows, he could look however he wanted. So he was ok with eating "that extra donut" every once in a while.

This, however, was too much for him. His already chubby belly was beginning to bulge outwards unnaturally. It was being filled with food. It was almost like he was force feeding himself.

He eventually finished off the entire bowl. He stood up and saw the aftermath of his binge. His taught gut was protruding and was tight with its capacity being tested. H4 would have to ignore it. There was organising to do in the shop. But it desperately needed some sort of relief from this discomfort. Which should he do?
1211111.title: Keep it secret for now.

choices: Talk to him, and see if he's hurt inside.
A second feeding the same day.
12111111.content:
Trying to get his mind of from his complaining gut Russell decided to do his daily morning report (That he always did after having breakfast at the pet shop.), but when he was trying to pick up his clipboard he found himself stopping halfway down. At first he didn't get why it was happening, but looking at himself he could see that it was his well filled belly that was in the way. He had to instead bend over to the side and pick it up with only one hand to get his clipboard. "Huh, I have never seemed to have this much difficulties picking something up." Russell thought casually as he held it in front of his face and started his daily inspection.

As he walked around the pet shop, checking things out, and putting little marks on the empty spaces on his list, Russell couldn't help but feel like his inspection was being a bit more difficult to do. What he didn't seem to realize (Or maybe being to much into his work to notice) was that the increased size on his stomach made his whole walk cycle much more staggering. His tiny feet had trouble trying to keep everything balanced while still walking.

Looking on as he waddled around Penny Ling thought that his walking reminded her of young panda males that they too also had slight problems walking with their bodies not being full grown yet. "He's starting to become a real panda male more and more." Penny Ling thought happy.

After getting everything checked up Russell was to have a quick meeting with the rest of the group to tell them how things where. Luckily for him everybody seemed to be hanging together right now (Saving him the trouble of gathering them all to one place), and all he had to do was to get their attention. He started doing a slight "cough, cough" to get their attention, but the only one that seemed to be looking at him was Penny Ling. (Mainly because she had been doing nothing but that all day.) He decided to take a deep breath and cough even louder, but right as he was about to cough he could feel a great air pressure build up inside of him. And before he knew what was happening he let out a huge "BUUUURRRPPP!!!", and that got their attention.

"Wow, nice one dude." Vinnie the gecko said, while the others tried to keep themselves from laughing at Russell. He wanted to have their attention, but not like this. Nonetheless they where all looking at him now, so he should just get it over with. "As you all know I have been once again taking on the very important task of making sure that every single item in our daycare center is still under the same perfect quality as we are suppose to have "hiccup". "You are like the blossom of a lotus flower, like the water of a mighty river, like the moon of the night.

"I-I'm sorry...I just don't share the same interest as you..." Russell said a bit nervously. He didn't want to risk hurting Penny Ling's feeling and making her cry.

But to his surprise she didn't seem to cry, she just sat there all quiet. And just as Russell was about to lean over and ask her how she felt, she suddenly looked at him and shouted "NO!!!" at him angrily. She had been doing so much work getting to tell him her true feeling, and showing him just how much more beautiful he would look with extra weight to be turned down now. He was HER dream guy, and she was NOT going to let him leave her now.

"P-Penny Ling?" Russell asked, sounding really scared now. As the panda girl stood up on the park bench and looked down on her overweight lover, Russell could first now feel how all of those extra pounds he had been gaining this day was really weighing him down into his seat. "You are my greatest love," Penny Ling said, with tears starting to form into her eyes." "And I don't want anything more then for us to be together and for me to feed you, and massage your big belly." She then reached down and started rubbing his belly with one of her arms, to which Russell both felt comforting and terrifying given the situation.

He knew he had to get out of this and get help, so when Penny Ling for a moment took her hand away from his belly he took his chance to escape. Before Penny Ling understand what was happening Russell took off and jumped of the bench. He wasn't prepared on how fast he would be falling, and when he hit the ground he did it with his stomach first. It did damp his fall, but also gave him very bad stomach pains.

Still that was nothing he could think about right now as he had to start running while Penny Ling took her time climbing down the bench, or at least that what he thought would happen! After only getting a couple of meters away from the bench he could hear a loud thud coming from behind. That was the sound of Penny Ling doing what he did and jumped of the bench instead of climbing, but unlike when Russell did it she was much more balanced and landed straight on her feet. Looking behind him he could see her taking off after him, and with great speed! "Of course! Since she's been having her extra couples of body mass for probably a longer part of her life, she's much more adapted on moving around at a greater speed. Which means that I need to RUN FOR MY LIFE IF I WANT TO GET AWAY!!!" Russell thought as he once again went from intrigued to scared over the fact that Penny Ling could run around with her fat like it was nothing, while he was almost tumbling over with every step.

Knowing that neither he or Penny Ling had much experience of this park lead to him quickly thinking out a plan that simply involved him trying to take as many detours and shortcuts he could in hope to make her momentarily lose sight of him. The only problem with it was that since she was almost able to catch up to him he wouldn't be able to take his next sudden turn without her seeing it. If he took a left turn to a bush and then a right behind a tree she would see it.

It wasn't until when he was running through another bush that he accidently feel down into a ditch next to a river bridge that he saw a chance of hiding for real. Moving much more quickly then he had managed before Russell crawled under the bridge and kept still. He could hear the sounds of Penny Ling emerges from the same place he had, and he hoped she instead would see the bridge and just assume he had crossed it and follow him.

Would that happen, and would Russell be safe?

Penny Ling ran to him in a frenzy. He tried to take off the other direction to run away, but was again tripped up by his weight. He landed hard on his stomach and face, but that wasn't what he was worried about.

Penny Ling was stressing above him in no time. Russell looked up at her, seeing her silhouette against the sun. She grabbed a huge piece out of the cotton candy, ripping it from the rest. Then without ado, she shoved the handful into Russell's unknowing mouth.

It tasted sweet, but that wasn't going to make him like it!

He swallowed it, although he didn't want to. He, being a smart hedgehog, figured out her plan fairly quickly.

She was going to force feed him and make him fat whether he liked it or not.

Penny Ling grabbed handful after handful of the fluffy confectionary. She then proceeded to stuff it in Russell's little muzzle. There was no pause in between swallowing and another piece getting shoved in his maw. He groaned with discomfort, but not because of the feeding. It was because if the results.

His already plump frame was getting a bigger paunch than before. He felt it pushing against the ground uncomfortably. It was so taught, that compressing it on the ground by laying down on his stomach wasn't a good idea.

He was getting a little food baby in his stuffed gut. It wasn't too visible from his laying position, but from his audible pained noises, Penny Ling knew it was working. So she sped up.

Poor Russell was just taking every hurt causing bite because he wasn't in the position to resist. His stomach was protesting loudly from being too full. He felt like he was going to just pop from being too full.

Penny Ling knew it would soon turn into fat, as back in her days as a wild panda (before she got rescued), she saw alpha male pandas stuffing others until they were utterly massive, and in turn, immobile. It would turn into fat any moment now...

Russell's gut was ready to blow, one more swallow and he was sure his stomach's walls wouldn't be able to take the filling of its capacity. But then, he felt an explosive BWOOMPH behind him. He blushed madly, his cheeks becoming beet red from embarrassment.

Penny Ling stopped her feeding to revel I'm the adorable, embarrassed look on his face. But then she realized why. She giggled, fueling his embarrassment more.

The contents of his stomach had turned to jiggly, wobbly, bouncy fat. But it spread to one place in particular...

Russell had a huge rear. Suddenly, it had grown from non-existent to absolutely gigantic. His blubbering bubble butt bounced and bounded. It was now easily bigger than all of Penny Ling, his tail becoming hidden in the mass of flab. The two massive, orange domes of quaking fat were quite the eye candy. And Penny Ling was eating it up. He was truly beginning her glutton.

12113122.content:
After living a week like this two things had been changing a lot in the Littlest Pet Shop.

The first one was Russell, who even before this experience had been seen by some pets as "a bit chubby" but now the sings of him being overweight was very obviously in everyone else's eyes. His stomach and chest was now puffing out a couple of inches, and he looked like he had about 20 extra pounds on his frame. His limbs and head had also signs of extra weight, but nothing was as clear as how his Hawaiian shirt was sitting really tight around him.

The other thing that had changed drastically was the pet shop itself, or rather the playroom for the pets. Without Russell to look after everything things quickly became unorganized, and then a total mess. At first the other pets where just happy to get to do whatever they wanted, but after only a few days of having a hard time to find their favourite toys, and clean food and water bowls they weren't as happy anymore. They actually started to miss the way things where when Russell was in charge, and after a week like this they have had enough.

Feeling that they needed to talk to him the remaining six of the main pets went over to talk to Russell. He was still sleeping on his bean bag, and they could see how his big stomach was rising and lowering as he was breathing.

"Um, Hello Russell?" Pepper asked carefully, before Vinnie shouted "Hey! Russell dude!"

The other pets first thought Vinnie was being to loud, but Russell seemed to think it was nice enough wakeup call so they let that slide.

"Yes? What did you want?" Russell asked, rubbing his eyes.

"We came here to say that we regret asking you to change yourself." Vinnie said.

"And that without your organisations skills the whole pet shop have become a huge mess." Pepper added.

"But if I'm not mistaken you two where the one that said I should Let loose some and Become more fun. Russell said, making Pepper and Vinnie regret a bit what they had said earlier.

"But can you come back and make everything be put back in order again?" Pepper asked, having the rest of the pets backing her up pleading.

"I don't know, I kinda like living like this." Russell said and stretched his arms backwards, almost causing the buttons of his shirt to pop off.

"No please!" Pepper begged.

"No more fun Russell! Give us back the old Russell!" Vinnie plead.

"How can you get back old Russell..." Russell said while getting of his bean bag and walking up to them, "When he never left you in the first place!" He then said and ripped of his shirt and pulled out his clipboard and pencil from behind him.

"So wait, you just pretended to be fun Russell all this time?" Vinnie asked confused.

"Precisely my friend." Russell said calmly. "I knew that if I simply pretended to be this character during a long enough time, it would easier make you all understand just how much we actually need rules and orders to make a society like ours work." Russell was explaining, while the rest of the pets where getting bored by it.

"Let's say this instead." Vinnie interrupted. "If we all try to not make a mess of stuff we don't have to listen to Russell telling us all this. Does that sound good?" He asked, and had the other 5 pets agreeing with him.

As they went of to start cleaning up their own mess Russell just accepted the fact that they had all learnt their lesson in their own little way. "But in the big whole of it everything seems to be back at normal now..." Russell thought until a he heard a small "Bump". Looking down he saw that the sound was his clipboard hitting his fatted belly. "Oh, right. That." Russell thought as he realized he had still gained those extra pounds during his "lazy" week.

"No problems. No problems." He thought, "I can just lose these as quickly as I got them." but it wouldn't be as easy as he thought since...

Another week of lazing around didn't do any good for Russell's body.

He himself didn't saw it as him being lazy. A lazy person would do nothing but eating junk food and play video games, he on the other hand used his time to read very insightful books and drinking his party drinks that while having a small amount of sugar wouldn't hurt him as long as he walked about 20 minutes a day.

That's what Russell had missed. It didn't matter if he planned the most brain training of readings and held himself to the least "deadliest" of the "poisons", if he didn't do any kind of physical activities he would still end up continuing gaining weight, which he did.

The extra weight was mostly being stored into his midsection, but he even spotted a few extra chins and even his arms and legs could be considered a bit more "chunky". One of the more clear signs on his weight gain has to be the Hawaiian shirt he's still wearing getting even more tight around his body. Being also that hedgehogs has it very natural to gain extra weight for hibernation Russell just felt that this was just even more relaxing and pleasant for him, just packing himself up for winter.

Somebody that wasn't as happy with the progress of things where the other pets in the pet shop. This wasn't how they remembered their friend to be, and while he might have been a bit strict and rule bound before, he just felt so "gone" now just reading his books and never even looking at the others.

"Oh, I really can't help but getting worried that your friend over there is slowly disappearing from us." Zoe said worried.

"Are you kidding he? As much as he has grown he's easier to spot then ever!" Pepper joked, but quickly saw that nobody found it funny.

"Pepper is right. Russell used to sometimes run all around the pet shop even more then I did to inspect that everything was like it should be, but now he looks vey soft." Minka added.

"I don't know, I think he looks kinda cute this way." Penny Ling said, before seeing everyone looking at her and her comment. "Did I say that one out loud?" Penny Ling asked, blushing a little.

"To quote our dear friend Buttecream anywho, what shall we do about our friend Russell?" Zoe said, trying to get back on track with their conversation.

"Maybe out answers lays in how to properly express a fitting solution that could satisfy both sides." Sunil said, making all the other pets speechless for a moment.

"Uhm, that was some very large words coming from you Sunil." Vinnie pointed out, with the other pets agreeing to it

"Well since Russell hasn't been well...Russell for a long time I thought that the most proper thing to do is to let somebody here take on the role of becoming the new Russell, and I think that that role would fit me pretty well." Sunil explained, to which Vinnie quickly replied "And why shall you have that? I can talk just like that if I want to. Watch! By analysing the data found in the sub-particles of the terrains gravitations field we can concluded that the substance of the samples are not radioactive."

"Vinnie you just can't quote Star Trek and think that you just know the words they are saying!" Sunil said, irritated by Vinnie's failed attempt to sound smart. "And you know you words?!" Vinnie said back, getting really up close to Sunil until Zoe separated the two of them.

"How about we all focus on what's most important right now?" She asked, and pointed towards the small mountain that was their friend.

Both Sunil and Vinnie agreed that she was right, and all six of them made their way to Russell.

Once closer to him they could see just how much bigger he had grown since last week. He was easily three times his normal weight, and his stomach now didn't only work as a bookrest but also as table to put the book on when he felt for a nap. Right now he was just reading so it was much easier to get his attention this time.

"Uhm, Hello Russell." Zoe said, sounding unsure of ha to say after that. "Yes?" Russell asked, looking up from his book for a moment. "We where just being a bit worried about your new lifestyle." Pepper said. "And that you barley walk around." Minka added. "Or used your clipboard and pencil." Penny Ling said, holding said clipboard and pencil in her hands.

"To put it simple for you we think that you might have become a bit more soft then what we remember you being." Zoe said. Russell thought for a moment before asking. "Haven't we have this conversation last week?" "Yes, and you said you where going to stop with your act and go back to your old self." Zoe said back. "And that's what I have done." Russell said, patting his stomach to show (Mostly in denial) how he was back at his former, only slightly chubby self.

"But you have barley changed." Pepper said.

"You might even be bigger then before!" Minka added.

"Not that you doesn't look good like that." Penny Ling half said before getting shy once again.

"If I'm really that far off I suggest you give me some sort of proof to it." Russell said, in a demanding tone, and just at that moment...
1211312221.title: Russell had doubled in weight obliviously and t...

choices: Penny Ling because she was secretly liking Russell this way
Minka because she was waiting for a good time to play on his big bellyplayground
12113122211.content:
Just then, as if the universe felt the need to answer his question, the bottom button on his green, Hawaiian flowered shirt popped, flying across the room, luckily not hitting another pet. Instead, it crashed against the wall opposite him and fell to the floor.

"Is that proof enough for you?" Vinnie asked smugly.

Russell have him a glare, putting up a front that he was mad at that comment to hide how evidently true it was. He didn't think he'd gained that much. I mean, he was still in his bean bag chair. Yeah! That was a good argument!

"Well, I'm clearly not THAT big considering I'm still able to fit on my bean bag chair," he counteracted.

Zoe goes around back to check. Behind him, there was only a sea of butt. His huge, orange, round rear seemed to have completely enveloped the whole been bag his entire fat body used to fit on. "Sweetie,.I'm afraid that's not the case" she began, "it seems your...derriere is now replacing it with two bean bags."

"What!?" Russell called out, the sudden burst of voice making yet another button pop, wizzing right by Sunil, making him scream and duck out of the way.

Red shows under his orange cheeks indicating embarrassment. Vinnie laughs, "Haha! Oh man! You've popped two whole buttons, you fatty!"

Just then, instant karma came about, a third button popping leaving only one left. But that button hit Vinnie square on the forehead. "Ow!" He called out.

"So, do you finally believe that you're fat?" Pepper asked.

"I suppose I've out on one or two pounds of excess adipose..." Russell admitted, still not recognizing his whale like body.

"One or two? You're a blob, man!" Vinnie called out, getting back up.

Russell figured out that if he were to exhale quickly, the last button would probably hit him again, so he did so, and it did. Perfect shot.

"Well, I don't think so. What if I'm happy here, with my nice drink and little umbrella? And soft been bag chair to sit on" Russell said

"I don't think that bean bag chair is the thing that's soft" Sunil commented, walking around to see Russell's new, big butt for himself. He poked a gelatinous cheek curiously.

Russell blushed, madly embarrassed that another guy just touched his rear. "Hey! That's my rump you're touching there!" he said.

But throughout all this, one pet was quiet. It was...
12113122211.title: His buttons on his shirt pops.

121132.content: How about "Blythe has Russell doing a modelling job again, and this time some things happens that makes Russell's body a bit more exposed in his clothes"?
121132.title: No, Another Russell story.

choices: Russell needs to comfort eat A LOT to be able to do it.
He can do it, but someone else wants him to fail.
1211321.content:
So after the events of the season 2 final where Russell became the main star for "The International Pet Fashion Expo" everything goes great for Blythe and the pets.

Her fashion designs are a huge success and Russell is the thing everyone likes to talk about.

It doesn't take long after the event when Blythe gets a phone call from Mona Autumn (CEO of Tres Blasé magazine) telling her that she wants Blythe to put up a brand new cloth line that will be the head line for the new issue of the magazine, and she wants Russell to once again be the poster boy for it.

While Blythe takes these news well, how will Russell take them? Will he be able to stand in the spotlight ones again despite his nerves, or will he have to find a way to "calm himself down" to get it done?
1211321.title: Yes, Model Russell.

12113212.content:
After the phone call Blythe immediately got onto her way to make all the new clothes for the fashion line, and after last time Russell had gotten a taste for being a model so he was all aboard to do this.

After some weeks of making clothes and rehearsing Blythe and Russell made their way to the Tres Blasé's headquarter, but they weren't the only ones.

Just outside the entrance there was two other girls with their pets on their way in that Blythe knew all to well. "The Biskit Twins" she said upset over seeing them.

"Oh look Whittany, it's like Blythe." The first on of the Twins said to her sister, who simply replied "And she has that, what do you call it? Porcupine thing."

"Excuse me but Russell is no porcupine, he's a hedgehog!" Blythe said back to them, before asking "Why are you two even here?"

"We got like, a call from somebody that had seen us walking with Cashmere and Velvet." Whittany said while holding up her pet chinchilla, before having her sister fill in with "And they said something along the lines of Your pets are just the thing we want for a shot for our magazine. or something." "Like, why wouldn't they be there? They have the true talent for it." Whittany said, before Brittany once again took over by saying "Much more nicer to look at then that Thing you somehow managed to get to the newspaper."

"So you two are also here to do a photo shot that will be publish as the main article for the next issue?" Blythe asked mockingly, seeing that it was the thing that made burst the Biskit Twins big ego balloon. "No." They finally said, and walked in to get away from Blythe.

"Wasn't that a little bit rude of you to say?" Russell asked, as they to made their way into the building. "Maybe a little, but the looks on their faces was totally worth it." Blythe answered. "You don't think that such behaviour on your parts can lead to any bad consequences in the future?" Russell asked, sounding slightly nervous. "Take it easy Russell, it's the Biskit Twin's we are talking about here. What's the worst they can do?" Blythe asked, as they made their way to Mona's office.

As they took an elevator up to the office the Biskit Twins looked on from around a corner. "That Blythe isn't like, a little bit saucy?" Whittany asked, with Brittany answering "I know. Just because that hedgehog she has happen to become the star that one time." And not only the Biskit Twins themselves but also Cashmere and Velvet where in a rage over Blythe and more exactly Russell's success.

They all four looked eager in wanting to ruin it for the hedgehog, but who would actually dare to try?
12113212.title: He can do it, but someone else wants him to fail.

choices: Tie up and force feed him.
121132122.content:
While their owners where all to familiar to Blythe and Russell the two chinchillas knew that the hedgehog had never really seen them before, so that would give them the elements of surprise for when they would do their revenge plan against him.

So while their owners where to busy taking out their anger over Blythe on angry Facebook and Twitter messages the twin chinchillas decided to take of and find the hedgehog on their own. They ran back to the place where Blythe and Russell had been taking the elevator from early. The place also had a reception desk, and the chinchillas took and hide under it while thinking out a plan.

"So like, where are we suppose to go to find him?" Cashmere asked, in way that really made her sound like her owner. Just at that moment a man driving a food trolley came by and asked the receptionist for "where he was suppose to go to leave all the food that was for the girl and her hedgehog?".

"Looks like we found our ride to our goal." Velvet said, as they both ran out from their hiding place and instead hide under the sheet covering the trolley.

After being told where to go the man went to the elevator with the trolley, and made his way to his destination. Under the sheet the two chinchillas where planning over what the next part of their plan would be.

"So like, when we get there, what happens next?" Cashmere asked her twin sister, who in return gave a look of a typical movie bad guy planning on tell the trapped hero his/hers evil plan.

"Once we get there we need to find a way to get Blythe out of the picture, (or rather out of the room.) so we can focus entirely on the hedgehog. When it's only him and us there will be the perfect time to take care of him." Velvet said.

"And just how will we take care of him?" Cashmere asked, feeling a bit annoyed by the long wait it took for her twin to say it.

"Think about it. What kind of way would be the perfect one to completely humiliate this fashion modelling wannabe?" Velvet asked her sister, who still looked as clueless as ever before.

"Let me give you a clue." She said before pointing her paw to all the food related things filling up the three level high trolley. "It has something to do with food." She added.

Cashmere really looked like she was getting something out of it. Her face was making grimacing, she made grumpy noises of her struggles to think hard, and when she finally looked like she was about to get it she said "I have no idea."

After face palming herself Velvet decided to be as clear as possible. "We are going to feed the hedgehog as much of all this food as possible so that he can't even fit the clothes he's suppose to wear!"

"Oh! I get it now." Cashmere said after few second of imagine it in front of her. (Making Velvet roll her eyes over her sisters slight air headedness.)

"But how will we make him eat all of it?" Cashmere suddenly asked, thinking it was a huge problem to their plans. But she could see in her sister's calm persona that she had thought about that.

"Well, we have two choices." She started, making her twin look very intrigued.

"First one is that we simply tie him up and force-feed him until he can't fit anymore food inside of him." Velvet said before pausing.

"And what's the other one?" Cashmere asked very excited.

"The other one is that you and me bring the Lady Charm, and convinces him to have a few bites before his big break." Velvet said while trying to look really seductive to her sister.

"Oh, you naughty girl." Cashmere said, blushing a little over the thought of making the hedgehog boy fall for their charms.

"And I want you to decided with one of the plans we will go with." Velvet then told her sister, who got really surprised by the sudden task.

"Oh! I don't know. They are both sounds like very fun things to do towards that hedgehog." She said, trying to decided.

"But if I have to choose one, I think I will go with..."
121132122.title: Cashmere and Velvet Biskit.

choices: He says Yes, and have them feed him more.
He says No, and they start to force to food into him more violently.
1211321222.content:
"Lets do the charm plan." Cashmere finally said, sounding pretty excited over to do it.

"Good choice sis." Velvet said, as the two of them suddenly felt the whole trolley stop.

"Room number 19, must be here she is." The guy said to himself, as he knock on the door.

Blythe came out opening it, and looked happy to see the guy.

"Great, you're here!" She said.

"Have you been waiting long for me?" The guy asked as he drove in the trolley.

"No, but my hedgehog has. He's been starting to get very hungry." Blythe said and pointed at Russell, sitting in a big sofa rubbing his very hungry stomach.

"Is there anything special you want from it?" The guy asked as he showed Blythe all the treats being on top of it. "There is also more stuff on the second and third platform under the sheet." The guy added.

Looking at it Blythe could see that there was really a lot to choose from. From small little cookies and candies, to triangle shaped sandwiches, to some fruits and berries. "And he also said that there was even more under the sheet." Blythe thought, as she a hard time knowing what Russell would like out of it.

Blythe looked over at Russell to ask him if there was anything special he would want to eat, but as she did so she was treated to the saddest, most begging eyes of any pet she had ever seen. Russell's hunger pain had just gone to the next level and he just wanted to eat something, it didn't matter what.

Seeing this Blythe turned back to the guy and said "I think I keep the whole trolley for now."

The guy was first a bit surprised by the little girl's request, and seeing this Blythe added "He wont eat it all. You can just come back later and take away everything he didn't eat."

The guy just accepted Blythe's offer and leaved the trolley in the room as he left. Seeing how incredibly starving her hedgehog friend was Blythe took a cheese and ham sandwich, and was about to feed him when Phoebe (Mona Autumn's overly stressed assistance) suddenly entered the room.

"Blythe! I need you quickly!" She said in her typical stressful and nervous manners.

"What is it?" Blythe asked.

"It's Mona. She did some last minute changes to the photo shot, and need you to go through those changes with her." Phoebe quickly answered.

"And what changes is that?" Blythe asked.

"A bunch of stuff. The lighting's for the shot, the theme for the clothes, how many different outfits to show. I can also give you a written list if you need to." Phoebe said, and pulled out a five foot long list of the changes that Phoebe had made for the act.

"Do I need to have Russell with me for this?" Blythe asked, seeing that it would be very bad for Russell to sit in a meeting for so long without having to eat anything.

"No, no pets. This thing is something only you is needed for." Phoebe quickly answered.

"Could this wait for a moment? I need to feed Russell." Blythe pleaded.

"No. Sorry. We need to go now." Phoebe said, and took Blythe arm and started dragging her out the room.

Blythe put the sandwich back on the trolley and said to Russell "Can you take care of your own feeding?" Russell simply answered back with a nod, and seeing that Blythe took and cooperated with Phoebe as they both went out door and closed it.

Now Russell was all by himself with more food then he could ever dream of, that he would be able to have all for himself. Or at least that's what he thought before suddenly the two chinchillas jumped out from under the cloth.

"Who are you two?!" Russell asked, being very surprised by the sudden company he now had.

"Oh, we? We are Cash..." Cashmere said before her twin sister stopped her and took over.

"We are just two young Chinchilla girls, that wanted to have a chance to meet a real pet fashion icon in real life." She said, while acting like a stereotypical "valley girl".

"Oh, well I'm sure Blythe doesn't mind me having a little company in my loge." Russell said, feeling like a really hot model, even having his own groupies getting into his loge.

While Russell was still taking in the fact that he might be that popular, Cashmere leant over to Velvet to ask "Why are you like, acting so strange?".

"I'm acting the way I do because if he thinks he's a real ladies man, he will be much more easier to manipulate." Velvet explained.

"Okay, I see." Cashmere said, before she decided to walk over Russell to try it out herself.

"How would you like if we two took and like, stuffed you so much so you couldn't even move afterwards?" Cashmere asked, sounding even more "stupid" then her sister had.

"Excuse me what?" Russell asked confused, and Velvet was quick in trying to save the plan from failing from Cashmere's lack of subtlety.

"What my sister means is that an attractive hedgehog like yourself shouldn't need to have to do simple stuff like picking up the food to eat, when he can have two loving fans to do it for him?" She said, truing to sound and act as flirty as possible for him. (Doing things like stroking him stomach with her paw.)

This whole thing really started to make Russell feel very "light-headed", and he could only see logic in everything she said. "Of course I should let you two do it for me, when you want it so much." He said, starting to like more and more where this was going.

"Okay. You just lay down in your big comfy sofa, and we will serve you greatly." Velvet said, winking at Russell.

Getting himself comfy Russell took and saw how the two Chinchillas very quickly climbed up the side of the trolley and came down with the food that was on the top floor. "Good thing they where here. I don't know how I would have done to reach that." Russell thought, as his food as arriving to him.

On top of the Trolley was like mentioned before Cookies, Candies, Sandwiches, Fruits, and Berries. And the two Chinchilla twins decided to start with the fruits and berries to warm up the hedgehog's appetite.

"Would you please open your mouth so we can feed you?" Both Chinchillas asked in harmony. (Almost sounding like a hypnotic rant from two sirens.)

Being lost in their lovely voices Russell took and left his mouth hanging open, making it easy for Cashmere and Velvet to stuff it with Blueberries, Strawberries, Grapes, and even a few pieces of Apples and Bananas.

Once nothing more could be filled started to work on chewing and swallow his food. This proved to be slightly difficulty (Given how much he had been taking into himself at the same time.), but after a few powerful chews Russell had managed to make some of it soft enough to send it down to his stomach. And once that was done he could chew and swallow the rest of it much easier. As for the next rounds of fruits and berries (Which this time consisted of pineapple and melon slices, and Raspberries and cherries.) he simply asked to get feed smaller portions at a time and then he could get it all down with no problems.

After the juicy start of his feast, the twin Chinchillas started to hand over the triangle shaped sandwiches. These things where a bit bigger then the slices of fruits he had earlier, (One sandwich being about the size of a whole apple.) but he could still feel his stomach having some empty room left so he continued.

These sandwiches where even more tastier then the fruit from before, coming in tastes like..."Olives and Salad", "Eggs and Caviar", "Cheese and Ham" and so on. As he ate the space in his stomach was quickly starting to get filled. He knew that as a hedgehog he was able to keep himself stuffed with lots of food in order for hibernation to winter, but since he was a pet he had never been in need to prepare himself for that and therefore never really tried to reach his limits, until now. Looking down he could start to see his stomach grow out a few inches as he was finishing down another sandwich. "I might have to reconsider going on a diet after this." He thought to himself.

Once he had gulped down all the sandwiches there was, there was only the small cookies and candy left for him. "Good thing too, cause I start to feel like I have reached my limits." Russell thought, as he clutched his stomach that was now standing out one or two feet. Since the cookies and candies was much smaller then the sandwiches it went down with little problems, but for as long as it went on the more painful his stomach felt. "Good thing this is almost over." He thought as he got the last candy pieces feed to him.

Once it was all eaten he once again held tightly onto his very stuffed gut, and started rubbing it to make it feel better. Suddenly he felt a shadow covering his light, and looking up he saw that it was the two Chinchillas looking down on him.

"Thank you so much for everything you've done for me, but I think I need to rest now." He said as nicely as he could.

"Don't tell me your feeling finished already?" Velvet said, pretending to sound chocked over it.

"Now when we have only started." Cashmere added.

"Started?" Russell asked confused.

"Yes. There is more food waiting for you under the sheet of the trolley." Velvet said, pointing towards the food treasure that it was.

"Much, much more." Cashmere said, trying to sound really dramatic like her sister.

Russell didn't know what to do right now. On one hand he had these two beautiful ladies wanting to hand feed him everything he wants, but on the other he felt like he wouldn't be able to eat much more. There was only so much he could take before it would start to hurt for real, but seeing their pleading eyes was also pretty hard to ignore.

What would Russell say to them?
1211321222.title: Charm him to eat more.

choices: They feed him the third level of food also.
12113212221.content:
Their charm got the better of him as he said "Can I have some more please?"

Being quick to the point Cashmere and Velvet went over to the Trolley, and seeing that everything from the top floor was taken they decided to start going for the "Bigger stuff".

"Let's see what's await under here?" Velvet said as she reached under and pulled out a plate with spaghetti and meatballs, and Cashmere pulled out a bowl of tomato soup.

Both of these things where much larger then anything he had been eating before, and Russell felt that he wouldn't barley be able to eat even one of those things. Yet they both also where still very warm and smelled absolutely wonderful. Having to say no to them would be such a mistake.

"Is something wrong, my dear?" Velvet asked Russell, who forgot that he had lost himself in his thoughts for the moment.

"I'm fine. I just...I just don't know if I can take it all in. It is a lot after all." He said.

"But who said you need to eat everything? You can just settle with one bite." Velvet said, making Cashmere confused.

"One bite? But weren't we trying to make him really stuffed?..." She asked before getting a angry look from her sister to tell her to be quiet.

"I have a plan for that." She whispered to her twin before going back to Russell.

"I think I could take one bite of that Spaghetti and Meatballs dish." Russell said, licking his lips in anticipation.

"Just give me a few seconds." Velvet said, and turned her back to Russell to "fix" her dish up a little. Once she was done she turned back, but now with the loose end of a piece of spaghetti in her paw. "I thought that you could just put this one in your mouth, and then just slurp the whole part of it in. Doing that wont require you to chew once." She said.

Russell had to agree that just slurping up and swallow one small piece of spaghetti would work well as a way to taste it, and it wouldn't be any problem having some small room left for it in his stomach. But what he hadn't counted on was that Velvet (while having her back turned against him) had taken and knotted all the pieces of spaghetti into one long string. He was going to take it all in, one way or another. (Plus she had also tied around the meatballs.)

Taking the small end of spaghetti into his mouth, Russell started to slurp it down. He wasn't doing anything but swallowing, but the thing was touching his tongue as it went down his throat, so he had some chances to taste it. "Small but satisfying." He thought as he swallowed, and swallowed, and swallowed...

It wasn't until he had been swallowing for 20 seconds straight when he thought that something wasn't right. Looking down he could see what looked like a long rope of pasta with no clear end in sight. He wanted to just pull it out of his mouth, but given how much had already been taking in by him that would be an impossibility. He just had admit that he was tricked and had to finish it, whether he liked it or not.

As he swallowed he felt that it wasn't all bad. It was after all just spaghetti. He was pretty stuffed, but he could probably fit that in too without any problems. That's when he felt something larger then a spaghetti straw entering his mouth. It turned out to be one of the meatballs. It was very big, and his jaws couldn't move with it blocking up the room. So he had to just swallow it like everything else. Russell could feel it making a huge lump in his neck, (And later how it entered his already bloated stomach.) and he know he had at least 8 more of those to eat.

He continued this process of swallowing whole spaghetti and meatballs until he had nothing at all left on the plate that it used to be on. Once done he clamed his stomach feeling REALLY full now. It felt painful and was so big and round. It was almost like a hibernation for a decade that he had in there, and there where still something left to eat.

"Don't forget about your soup." Cashmere said delightful, as she walked up to him with the big bowl of soup.

He really didn't want to have more but he didn't want to come of as rude either, so when looking at the chinchilla lady all Russell could say was..."I have no spoon."

It sounded stupid when he said it, but it made some sense inside his head. You need a spoon to eat soup. No spoon, no soup right?

Wrong! Almost immediately after saying that Velvet gave a whistle, and showed Russell and Cashmere a funnel she had found under the sheet of the trolley. "Looks like we have found something that could substitute for a spoon." She said, in an almost diabolical way.

Russell gulped a little as he now realised he had to even eat the soup. He could try to just simply get up and run away, but being feed so much really made him feel so weak and tired. It was hard even lifting his stubby arms.

With little to no resistance Russell got the funnel shoved into his mouth, and the twin chinchillas both helped out lifting the heavy bowl over their head and aiming for the wide open part of the funnel.

"Open wide, and prepare to eat." Cashmere said playfully, before they started poring the dish right into the hole.

This was even more of a torture to Russell then the spaghetti one was. The soup itself was tasty to eat (And also very warm relaxing.), but after already feeling like there was almost no room left inside of him this dish here was making sure to fill him up properly. Letting the liquid soup take up those little empty spaces that could be found that no solid food pieces could fit.

Unlike the spaghetti process where he could eat at his own pace, Russell now had to constantly swallow at all time to not risk getting anything of the soup in the wrong throat. He also this time got less of a chance to taste, (given the stress he felt eating.) but from what he did taste it was pretty decent.

After three minutes of none stop soup eating the bowl was empty. and Russell was more full then ever. Now his stomach was so round and swell as it could possibly be, and he felt like he could almost explode if he got something more to eat.

"Please no more." He begged his two feeders, who really took their time admiring their work so far.

"What do you say Cashmere? Should we stop or feed him more?" Velvet asked her sister, who replied "Well, we have one more level of trolley that we still haven't used yet. So maybe?"

What would happen next?
12113212221.title: He says Yes, and have them feed him more.

choices: Blythe tries to quickly make clothes in a large size for Russell.
There is no time! Photo Shot now!
121132122212.content:
There where about to continue their torture when they heard the sound of the door getting opened. As quickly as they could they ran back to the trolley and hide under the sheet again.

As soon as they got hidden Blythe and the trolley guy returned to the room, only to both stop in shock of what they saw. All over the floor was crumbs from cookies and sandwiches and empty plates and bowls. And also a very, very stuffed hedgehog.

"Russell?!" Blythe asked, shocked over seeing her friend in this state. She immediately ran over to comfort him, seeing he wasn't feeling very well.

"Blimey! That porcupine thing ate almost everything on my trolley." The guy said as he took and placed the plates and bowls on the top of it.

Blythe was about to correct him once again on Russell being a hedgehog and not a porcupine, but he was in such need of help from her that she let it pass this time.

Seeing that the centre of pain for Russell laid in his stomach Blythe decided to try and ease it by giving him a belly rub. She hoped that rubbing and massaging his gut would make it feel better, and it seemed to work. Russell started to feel more relaxed, and the hardness of the food inside started to get softer as well.

"Who did this to you?" She asked him, hoping he could answer her. But Russell was very weak from all the eating and he tried to show Blythe by pointing towards the trolley where Cashmere and Velvet was hiding, but as he did the guy in charge of it had started rolling it out, and when Blythe herself turned around to look the trolley had already left the room and the guy had closed the door.

"Listen Russell, no matter who did this to you it has to wait. What's important now is that we try and do something about this." Blythe said, and poked a finger into the very fat belly of Russell, who blushed a little over how much of "chubby guy" he was now.

If they would want this to still work Blythe and Russell knew they needed to think out a plan, and fast.
121132122212.title: Blythe suddenly comes back.

choices: He's a complete embarrassment, and has eats more to kill the sadness he has.
He turns out to be a huge success!
1211321222122.content:
But they didn't have time to do anything until the door open again, and this time it was Phoebe once again looking very stressed.

"Blythe! A change of plans has happen again, and we need you both for the photo shoot now!" She said, not seeming to notice the food mess on the floor.

"But Russell's..." Blythe said, before getting dragged away again. (This time with the well rounded Russell in her hands.)

"No time! We need to go and get it done now!" Phoebe said, ignoring Blythe trying to show her how Russell looks like.

While that was going on Cashmere and Velvet was making their way back to their owners.

"Wow, that went even better then I could ever imagine." Cashmere said as they rushed through the corridors to where they left their owners.

"I know. All we needed was a little bit of a female charm, and then we had him eating out of our hands. Literally!" Velvet said, and laughed a little at her own joke.

As they saw Brittany and Whittany still sitting there with their cell phones, they knew that they just needed to return to their cage to make it look like they had never left in the first place. They rushed in and closed the door, and the sound of them closing it was the first thing that got one of the twins to look away from her phone for a moment. Looking down she just saw their two pets, looking like they where a bit restless.

"Whittany! Cashmere and Velvet looks a bit bored." Brittany said to her sister, that first now also looked up from her cell phone.

"I can understand them. I'm that too." She said, sighing over how long time they had been sitting here waiting for their turn.

"Don't worry sweeties. We will probably get to do our thing in like, any second now." Brittany said to the two chinchillas nicely.

"You sound very like, soft sister." Whittany said.

"I can't help it. Having these two beautiful things as our pets makes me feel so warm inside." Brittany said, sticking in a finger in the cage to feel the chinchillas soft fur."

Right at that moment Phoebe came rushing towards them, telling them to come and have their photo shoot now.

"Like, finally!" Brittany said, taking the cage with the chinchillas with her as she and her sister made their way to the photo room.

"To bad we also have to see Blythe and that hedgehog looking porcupine thing taking the spotlight from the true pet talents." Whittany complained.

"We can always hope that some kind of accident happens to them on stage. Like if he misses a cue or something." Brittany said, while the two chinchillas in the cage where giggling over what they where going to see.

"I think there will be much more problems then missing a cue from them." Velvet said.

At the photo shoot Blythe had asked if she and Russell could be after the Biskit twins and their pets, and the photographer seemed okay with that.

So first up was the Chinchillas, that got a very straight on and simple photo shoot with some very simple outfits. (They where mostly something small to be posted as an article in the paper, and not the main thing.) As they got their pictures taken and their owners getting interviewed, Blythe tried her best to fix the problem with Russell.

During their walk here Blythe had done nothing but massaged Russell's food filled middle to ease his pains, and it seemed to have worked great. All the food inside seemed to be digested now, and his stomach felt like it could relaxed now. But it had one bad effect, and that was that all the food had been transformed to fat now.

He had always been a bit chubby and had a bit of a potbelly, but that used to be it. Now he has three extra chins, thick tights that was constantly touching each other, a big blubbery butt, a couple of man-boobs on his chest, and a belly that was sticking out two feet and hanging down his to his knees.

"What am I suppose to now Blythe? I can't go out there modelling like this!" Russell said, sounding surprisingly worried about his chances as a model.

"I can try to loosen up

"One last photo girls!" The cameraman said, as he took a picture of the Biskit twins both holding their chinchilla self in their hands.

"Like, finally." Whittany said.

"Let's leave now." Brittany added, and the both twins where starting to head for the exit door when their pets started to act strangely.

"Brittany, my pet is, like acting crazy here." Whittany said, with her sister answering "Yeah, mine too."

Looking at their pets they saw that they where pointing toward the photo set, and then at their owner with pleading eyes.

"Whittany, I think they want to stay and watch when Blythe and her, thing is doing their photo shoot." Brittany said.

"I have no idea why they want that but I guess they also think that Blythe will just fail, and wants us to see when it happens." Whittany said.

"They are kinda smart that way Whittany. I suggest we do as they say." Brittany said, as they all decided to stand in the background and watch.

"Okay. Blythe and Russell, your time now!" The cameraman said as Blythe came in with a dressed up Russell in her arms.

Russell an outfit that included a green checkered sweater, with a pink and yellow striped scarf, and a pair of purple tights. (The theme for it was 1980s.) And his added weight was really being seen in it. His stomach was being pushed out from the sweater and hanging over the tights, his legs and butt was super detailed in the tight tights, and while Blythe added the scarf on as a way to try and hide his extra chins all it did was to make it even more obvious as it was tighten around his fat neck rolls.

"Put him down on the set, and I will do the rest." The cameraman said, and Blythe had no choice but to leave Russell for his fate.

As he saw the camera lens and the spotlights all having their attention focused on him, Russell could feel more then ever how incredibly fat he looked in these clothes.

"And...start posing!" The cameraman said, and Russell knew this was it. The moment of total embarrassment. Even thought he could have just fled the place and just forget it all, some part inside still wanted him to do his best. So against his better judgement Russell tried to do several of the poses he and Blythe had practiced, but he soon found them pretty hard to pull through thanks to his body.

When he was striking a pose all he could feel was how the flab from his stomach, jiggling by the sudden movement. And trying to show off his "Strong backside" he knew that the camera was only focusing on his wide bottom. But the crown achievement in embarrassment came when Russell was down on his knees to do the picture that would be on the cover for the next issue of the magazine. His stomach fat hanging down was once again a huge focus for attention, and in an effort to try and "hide" it Russell tried desperately to pull down the sweater and cover it all. (Even though if didn't even reached over his bellybutton.) The warm lights from the lamps where also starting to make Russell sweat a lot as he tried doing his covering act, only embracing the image of him as a real "slob of a pet". And to top it all of when Russell tried to help his sweater reach by bending forward he could he a loud "RIIIIPPPP!" coming from behind. Glancing over his back he saw what he sadly hoped not was true, but it was. He had just made his pants burst open from behind. Even though the camera would not be able to see that it still made Russell blush that his butt was so big that it had just broken his clothes.

And right in the middle of it all with Russell trying to cover with his sweater, belly flap hanging loose, lots of sweat covering him, eyes looking back at his cracked pants, and blush red cheeks he heard a "CLICK" sound, and knew that the cameraman had just made this moment the cover photo.

The embarrassment levels knew no limits as Blythe was allowed to now go in and pick him up again. Russell felt like he had just let Blythe down, but more importantly himself down. As they walked towards the door they where both being laughed at by the Biskit Twins and their pets.

"What's the problem Blythe? Didn't the clothes fit?" Brittany said in-between laughs.

"Did you feed him to much before shooting or something?" Whittany added.

"What have I done Blythe?" Russell asked.

"Don't worry Russell, it's not that bad." Blythe said, trying to cheer him up.

"Yes it was Blythe! Once that number gets published I will be the biggest laugh in the whole pet world!" Russell said, and almost started to cry.

How would things end for Russell? Would be victim for the fashion industry, or is there any hope left for him to still shine?

(Picture here of how Russell in the pose that becomes the cover of the magazine.)
http://d.facdn.net/art/marx50/1413684138...
1211321222122.title: There is no time! Photo Shoot now!

choices: Russell gets a lot food gifts from his fans.
Cashmere and Velvet is forced by their owners to "join" into the trend.
12113212221222.content:
But things did turned out very well Russell. Once the new number with him on the cover was for sale, the public reactions went through the roof. They had never seen anything like this before. The pure fatness in the pet, and the look of embarrassment in his face that was captured was something brand new for the market.

While some didn't get it at all at first, some art and fashion critics started to say that this was indeed trendy, and pretty soon most of the main stream started to follow that as well.

After only a day having fat pets with small clothes where the new thing. Many pet owners would let their pets eat themselves silly, and then have them where stuff that only covered the chest and hindquarter area, leaving the stomach part to hang wide open.

Even at Littlest Pet Shop this was present as most of the pets had been gaining their fair amount of weight, and where all sporting outfits that really showed their figure. (Especially Penny Ling, who already had been a bit on the round side before it was trendy, now looked like a real cover girl that could have made what Russell made unintentionally trendy to Seriously trendy.)

As for Russell he was a huge star now. Many of the pets staying at the pet shop almost couldn't believe their luck in seeing the famous hedgehog in the flesh. (And fat.) The rumours telling that it was on "Littlest Pet Shop" where you could find him made even more pets ask their owners to be left there, which was even better for the pet shop's business. Many fans told him that they adored the "innocents" and "cuteness" side of him that his picture had been giving them.

Where will this story go from here?
12113212221222.title: He turns out to be a huge success!

choices: The Biskits start to feed their pets
121132122212222.content:
After the premier of a certain hedgehog, every pet In Downtown City were constently gorging theirselves and tearing out of their cute outfits, not really caring that they've ruined their clothing even Mona Autmn was letting her precious Cairo stuff her face, Mona was also following the fad, ever since she saw the issue that starred Russell she was inspired to be more like that marvellous little rodent.

Meanwhile at the Biskits estate, Britney and Whitney were very miffed at how Blythe's little hedgehog porcupine thing got their spotlight instead of their Cashmere and Velvet. The two girls went to their father to complain to him "Daddy, like we were at this photo shoot thing for some like old fashion lady, and Blythe was there with her obese porcupine hedgie thing." Britney whines. "And Blythe's porcuhedge thing like took our chinchillas spotlight from our pets, we should've have won that issue"

Fisher Biskit was confused by this "Girls, girls, one at a time please " he says to his girls, "what's all this about?" He. Asks his daughters, they hand him the magazine with Russell's picture on it, his eyes widen at the sight of the front page "girls what's that" Mister Biskit asks. "That daddy is Blythe's hedgehog porcupine from 'Littlest Petshop'" Britney says "and he's started a fat pets fad" Whitney said in response to Britney.

"Well then girls why aren't you tending to your pets then" fisher says to his girls "but daddy we want them to be in shape if they're to become famous" Britney whines "yea" Whitney whines as well, "I thought you girls were into these fashion magazines, you should try this out'
121132122212222.title: following the fad

choices: Cashmere and Velvet puts their revenge plan into motion.
1211321222122221.content:
"Listen. We don't like doing this to you girls." Whittany said, and her twin sister Brittany added "But this is apparently the new trend now so you must like, like this." before they both started shoving in pet food biscuits into their pet chinchilla's mouths.

For Cashmere and Velvet their plan of ruining Russell's modelling career had back fired, big times! Not only did people love his "Fat Style" and all the other pets would want to become as fat as him, but now their own owners were forcing them to join the trend. (Whenever they wanted it or not!) Also given their small sized compared to their human counterparts they could to pretty much nothing to stop their force-feeding from happening.

Since the Biskit Twins themselves really didn't like making their pets big for any other reason them to follow "fashion", they couldn't know if they where force-feeding them right. "Whittany. I know that we are suppose to have our pets eat much more then what is recommended, but do you have any idea on when to stop for now?" Brittany asked while taking an about half-gallon of water and having her pet drink it, and Whittany's respond (While emptying whole cans of meat into her pet.) was simply "Just do it until they have no more room."

So that's what they did, and didn't stop until both of their previous perfect model pets now looked liked two bloated (And slightly hairy) sausages. With barley any movement in their legs and arms the two chinchillas just laid there panting as they finally got a chance to take a breath. "Well, school starts about now." Whittany said, and the two twin sisters walked out of the room in order to be driven to the school building.

Once alone the two pets started to speak to each other. "Velvet. This here is NOT okay!" Cashmere said and her sister agreed, saying "None of this would have ever happen if it hadn't been for that "New sensation" hedgehog!"

"You know what would fit him?" Cashmere asked, and Velvet just shrugged her arms in response. "If we took and made him into an even Bigger star!" Cashmere said, and the two Chinchillas laughed evilly over their plans for getting revenge on Russell!

12113222122.content:
How about...

In present time one of the pets asks Russell how he became so "round" in body shape.

Russell first doesn't like being called "not skinny", but thinking about it he too gets curious about it, and tries to figure out what happen.

As he does he has several flashbacks to when he was a little kid and had moments when he ate "more then he should have".

Does that sound good?
12113222122.title: No.

choices: Russell ignors it all and walks off.
Russell decideds to tell his friends what happen when he was younger.
121132221221.content:
(This part takes place in present time.)

The Pets where all relaxing now after having had a great meal, and by looking at them you could see that some of them had "enjoyed" it a bit more then the rest.

Russell.

He had a tendency to when he ate he wouldn't just munch a little, but take in as much as his body could! This had been having the effect of having his body be more "well feed" then any other pet. (Maybe except for Penny Ling)

After this particular eating he now was resting on his back, with a belly that stuck out about 3 inches from all the food stored inside.

As he was trying to relax another pet (A certain Gecko named Vinnie) walked over to him and pressed one of his sticky lizard fingers into the fat middle of Russell.

"Hello, what are you doing?" Russell said, wondering why his friend was doing this without asking for any kind of permission first.

"Oh, sorry. Didn't know you where actually awake. You looked to be asleep." Vinnie said, not making Russell look any more pleased with the awkward situation that they now had.

"Still even if I was asleep, why did you have to touch my belly?" Russell asked loudly, getting the other pets attention in the process.

"Sorry Rusty, It just looked so big and well filled after our meal that I wondered how it would feel like." Vinnie explained.

"We all ate a lot after this meal, so why don't you feel on someone else's belly?!" Russell asked annoyed.

"To be honest there isn't anyone here that has a belly quite so well..." Vinnie said, trying to find a good word to chose to finish his sentence.

"Fat?" Russell said, knowing that it was the word Vinnie was going for.

"Yes, just that." Vinnie said glad over Russell helping him, only to realize that it was just the word he had been trying to avoid to use.

"But we all just ate a huge lunch together. Isn't anyone else being a bit "extra pudgy" after it?" Russell asked, and patted his belly to indicate what he was talking about.

To his surprise no other one of the pets seemed to show any signs on over eating, despite them all eating the same amount of food.

"Oh, come on! No one at all? Not even Penny Ling..." Russell said before stopping when seeing that the Panda Girl didn't like being flat out called fat like that. (Even if she was just like her hedgehog friend, a bit rounder then the rest.)

"Actually, I have been wondering one thing." Minka the monkey said, and got everyone attention. "When did you even start becoming so big?" She asked direct to Russell.

Russell wanted first to tell her how he didn't like her asking him like that, but to his surprise the other pets started to fall in with Minka, wondering if he had always had this figure since arriving to the Pet Shop, or if it was only just recently.

Russell didn't know why, but suddenly he and his belly had become the centre of subject for talking about, and all the other pets didn't look like they would want to drop it anytime soon.

He had now two choices. Either he could give in and talk about when actually he could have started his little "eating habits" since joining the gang. (Which he himself now was starting to get a little curious about.), or he could just ignore them all and go for a place to be alone. (Maybe even take some food left overs with him.)

The question was "Which one does he choose?"
121132221221.title: Yes.

choices: It was the time when he tried to impress Penny Ling with his eating.
It was the time Sunil and Vinnie dared him to eat a lot, and he said yes.
1211322212212.content:
Being more curious then he himself thought Russell did want to know if there was some kind of "origins" to his "eating habits".

"Fine. I'll try seeing what I can remember." Russell said, and all the other pets got really happy.

"I'm really curious on what you will tell since I hadn't started coming to the pet shop yet." Penny Ling said, really looking forward to this.

"From what I can remember it was my first time ever setting my foot in the Pet Shop, and in the Day Camp Centre..." Russell said before a certain Panda Girl interrupted with a question.

"Did you wear anything?" She asked.

"Yes, but how did you know that?" Russell asked confused.

"I have been told stories by the other about how it was when they where small, and they all had some kind of cute cloths back then. Vinnie had small tap shoes, and Sunil had a propeller hat for example." Penny Ling explained.

"Oh, okay. Well, I did use to wear a Red Cap with a white lightning bolt on." Russell said.

"You must have looked really cute with it." Penny Ling said, making Russell blush slightly.

"Anyway," Russell said, wanting to get back to the story. "Since it was all so new and strange to me I got pretty nervous, and once that happen I got pretty hungry. So when the sweet Mrs. Twombly said that it was lunch break I of course headed quickly towards the bowls to get something to eat. The food we got that day was probably the same things we get everyday, but having this strange (but kind) woman pouring a whole bowl full of pet food for me felt like the strangest thing yet. I don't know if it was the sheer amount of food in front of me, or that I was allowed to eat as I pleased, or..." Before getting interrupted again, but no by Penny Ling this time, but Vinnie.

"Uhm, when does he actually start to eat? Or did he just stand there thinking all day back then?" Vinnie asked. and he got wacked in head with a rubber chicken by Pepper in response, who told him to be quiet and let Russell continue.

"Like I said," Russell continued, ignoring what just happen. "I was so taken by all the food that was put up just for me that I didn't know what I should do. That's when all of you run passed me and started eating your portions like there was no rules on manners at all." He could at this point see that most of the pets didn't seem to like what he said of their eating habits. (Except for Penny Ling that was just listening trustfully to him, and Vinnie who was still thinking more about the rubber chicken hit then what Russell was saying.)

"Not that there is anything wrong with that of course." Russell said, a bit cold sweaty before continuing. "I on the other hand didn't have that kind of eating in my mind at all, and was just wondering if it would be okay with me also eating like this."

"And that's when you Vinnie told me that it was completely okay for me to eat in any way I wanted." Russell said, looking directly at him while saying this.

"I did? I don't remember that." The gecko said confused.

"It must have been all of those hit with Pepper's rubber chicken that has made you lose some memory." Russell pointed out to his friend.

"Don't get me started. She hits for just about anything I say or do. She's so short circuited that way." Vinnie said, and got immediately hit again by Pepper, who shouted "No I'm not!"

"So with Vinnie telling me that everything is fine with me to eat like I want, I completely jumped into the food pile and chowed down like crazy!" Russell said, barley even believing that he used to eat so wildly as a kid. "I probably didn't even ate to not be hungry any more. I just ate because I could. I remember getting full and just continuing! I remember crawling into the bowl to get the very last crumbs of snacks! I remember...Wow, I did have a bit on an eating problem back then. No wonder I became so..." Russell said, before looking at the others, and getting slightly red faced over telling them all this.

"I think I have said enough for now." Russell said, and that's when Penny Ling asked. "But are you really sure that this was all of it?"

"What do you mean?" Russell asked back, and Penny Ling answered "I just think that something that happen from the first day on the Pet Shop to now must have involved some more events then just one."

Thinking for a short time Russell did remember a second incident that could have helped with him getting the body he now had, but what was that?
1211322212212.title: Russell decideds to tell his friends what happe...

choices: He says Yes, and tell them another story.
He says he need a small break. (So he can think about another Penny Ling memory)
12113222122121.content:
Russell remembered something more from his past, but what he remembered made him blush slightly.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------
