He remembers that when Penny Ling had joined the pet shop for the first time he had gotten very interested in her.

From the first time he saw that Panda girl his heart skipped a beat, and he felt all nervous and sweat when he had to introduce to him.

He couldn't at first put his finger on what it was that he felt made her so "different" compared to him in his eyes, but when he looked up to greet her face to face he started to get a vague idea. When he stood to face her his face was only seeing her chest area.

He was about a whole head shorter then her! (And given their pretty big head that said something.) As he looked up at the panda looking back down at him, Russell felt very, very little by comparing.

"Hey! My name is Penny Ling. What is yours?" The Panda female asked him, and suddenly Russell felt that his otherwise huge library that was his brain, was now very short of books.

"R-Russell." He finally managed to figure out to answer her.

"Oh, hey Russell. It was nice meeting you, but now I need to learn what all the other pets here has for names." Penny Ling said and walked away from Russell, who tried to say something more to her, but he ended up silent again.

"Why did I have such problems speaking to her?!" Russell asked himself. For him it was true mystery to why he couldn't just speak to her like he did to any other pet, and the strange warm feeling inside of him only made it harder for him to think.

The harder he tried to think, the simpler his thoughts started to become. And in the end he had ended up thinking like he was a caveman.

"Penny Ling. Big."

"Me also needs to be Big."

"Eating Food makes me little Big."

"Eating much food will make me BIG Big."

So with that logic Russell decided to head for his food bowl, in order to make himself bigger and therefore give him the courage to face Penny Ling.

He made his way to his food bowl with the plan to eat as much as he could and get bigger, but he had no plan on what to do when his bowl would be empty. That's when he saw it.

Placed right next to his food bowl stood a huge Pet Food bag, just left in the open. (Apparently Mrs. Twombly had gotten a phone call just when filling up the food bowl, and left the bag standing there.) Seeing it Russell knew that all he needed now was something sharp to open up the bag, and he could start his "grow spurt". Looking at his quills on his back Russell knew just what to use to tare a hole in the bag.

After breaking off one of his hundreds of quills Russell tore up a hole to the bag (in about face level to him), and then just open wide and let the food pore down his throat.

It all started coming down like an avalanche towards him, and he just stayed there and tried catching all of it into his mouth. He thought he could take it, and at first he was right. Just swallowing it all down, and feeling himself growing out from it.

But after some time he started to feel full from it, and when he tried to move away from it he was still taking in a big stream of Pet Food. He wanted to get big, but first now he seemed to realize that this wouldn't help making him any "Taller".

When he finally felt to flow pressure get weaker Russell pulled away his mouth, and saw just how much "Taller" he had become. His belly had now grown out a whole feet in front of him, and he could in one way become taller, but only if he decided to rest on top of it.

"This was a dumb idea." Russell thought as he started to massage the pain in his overfilled stomach.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------

"So what did you remember Russell?" Penny Ling asked him.

Waking up from his memories Russell got reminded that he was suppose to tell his friends another memory, but if he said this one he would have to reveal his true feelings for Penny Ling!

"I uh....Remember this one time when I took a small piece of Pet Food Candy, after I already had a pretty big lunch portion." Russell quickly lied up.

There was an awkward silence for a short time, before Vinnie said "Lame." about Russell's story.

Even thought the other pets thought that was an unnecessary comment from Vinnie they too also would like to hear a bit more exited story from Russell.

So what does Russell say about that?
12113222122121.title: It was the time when he tried to impress Penny ...

choices: He saw the mess on the floor, as the pet food bag had kept spilling! He ate it
Whatever. Not important. Penny Ling wanted him to tell more stories!
121132221221212.content:
Russell could feel all the pets staring at hin, piercing into his soul. He had to get out of there. They were all just waiting for him to talk all about his weight! It was uncomfortable. Plus, there was way more to that Penny Ling memory he needed to reflect on alone.

"If you all would excuse me...hehe...I need to sit down for a moment. Alone" Russell said nervously.

"Need to sit down because standing too long is too much exercise for you, fatty?" Vinnie commented before once again, for the tenth time this week, he got whacked on the head with a rubber chicken from Pepper.

"What?" he cried, "That's not the reason?"

"Of course not, you idiot, he needs to be alone and you should respect that" Pepper chastised him.

"He needs to be alone so he doesn't have to talk about how fat he is?" Vinnie tried again, resulting in another whack.

"Just shut up and let's go" Pepper grabbed his wrist and dragged him off.

Russell went to his favorite bean bag chair, sitting down and beginning to reflect as the rest gave him his space. But Penny Ling walked over for a moment, saying one thing before she left "When you've had your alone time, I do hope you'll tell more stories. I like hearing about your kid/teen life. Especially on the topic we were on" and with that, she smiled sweetly and left. Did she mean just general little kid stories? Or...him being fat?

Whatever, for now he went back to thinking about that day

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------

He remembered Little Russell was still massaging his overgrown, stuffed gut. Fingers kneading into the tight fullness that was apparent in front of him. But as he did that, Penny Ling once again caught his eye. She had found a place to sit down and was just getting a good look at the pet shop now.

Russell forgot all about how big he was. He began to sweat a bit. Why was that particular pet doing this to him?? He almost forgot his own name earlier! Wait...What was it again?.........Russell! Right. But the name he couldn't stop thinking of was Penny Ling's.

He found himself walking towards her, shuffling rather as his belly prevented smooth motion in any way. He didn't even know what he'd say to her. How was he going to talk to her if he couldn't plan ahead!? But there he was now. Next to her. Not knowing how to start, his mouth uttered a feeble "Hi Penny Ling"

"Hello, Russell. Russell, right?" she asked reaffirming that she got it correct.

His brain was failing him. He just nodded his head "Yes"

"Um, pardon my asking, but did you get...a little bigger since the last time I saw you?" she asked sweetly, not wanting to offend this future friend of a pet.

He'd forgotten about that. "A little, yeah" That was such a dumb answer! He needed to kick this conversation in gear! Ask her something about herself! That was a great way to start not awkward conversation. "So, you're a panda"

"Yep" she responded, still somehow maintaining a non awkward air to her answers.

That was even dumber! He needed to get out of there, plan up a better conversation and try again tomorrow...or chicken out.

"I am going to go now" he couldn't be more frustrated at how NOT smooth that was

"Ok! Bye, Russell" she waved cutely

Hearing her say his name made his stomach get all fluttery every time she did so. He waddled away, back to where he was.

That stomavh flutter was unfamiliar to him. Was it hunger? He just ate all that food...But maybe that's what it was

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------

Russell thought about it, as an adult, on the bean bag chair. It was from that point on he associated love and Penny Ling with eating and food. Probably how he sustained such a gut in his current state. But he couldn't quite remember what he did after that on that day.
121132221221212.title: He says he need a small break. (So he can think...

121132222.content: Okay, then how about if adult Russell was force fed by someone to make him more cuter?
121132222.title: Nope. I want him to be an adult in my story.

1211322221.content: Should Russell be human or a Pet in this storyline
1211322221.title: Adult Russell

12113222211.content:
Option 1: Russell is straight; Russell hooks up with some lovely ladies, and gets them to fatten him up

Option 2: Russell is gay; Russell hooks up with some handsome men and they fatten him up
12113222211.title: Russell's BIG Adventure

12113222212.content: Who in the pet shop ends up making Russell pack on the pounds?
12113222212.title: Pet storyline

choices: She wants to play prank with him.
121132222121.content: What does Minka do to Russell that involves him gaining weight?
121132222121.title: Minka the Monkey

choices: Maybe feed him one of the other pets? (Or herself!)
No time for that! The other pets are coming!
1211322221211.content:
Minka was bored.

So.

Very.

Bored!

The monkey girl was often known to do just about anything (as long as it involved doing something.), and when there was now nothing for her to do all she did was sitting by her food bowl and eats bits of her food.

"I probably should try to avoid eating to much, or else I might end up like Russell!" Minka thought to herself, and ended up laughing out loudly over the image of her with the body shape of Russell!

Looking over at the hedgehog in question she saw that he was sleeping.

And it wasn't just a nice little rest that he had curled up for or anything, but more that he had been super tired just moments before it happen, and he was still holding his trustfully clipboard and pen in his hands as he was resting onto his back.

Then there was also the factor that he was snoring. (And not a little but a lot!)

He was snoring so much that his mouth was open really wide for most of the time. (With a small moment of him closing it in as he was breathing inwards.)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------------------------------------------

Minka just knew she had to do something funny with this, so she started by pretending she was a lion tamer, and tried sticking her big head into Russell's wide open mouth. (And it actually fit inside!)

After that she saw how Russell chubby belly was rising and lowering as he was breathing in and out, and looking back at her still pretty untouched food bowl Minka got a devilishly funny prank to pull on Russell!

She rushed over and grabbed her nearly filled foodbowl, and then carefully she held it right above the sleepy face of Russell.

When the moment was right and his mouth was at it's widest she tipped the bowl slightly, and started to let her food rain down into his mouth!

She wasn't sure how he would handle this sudden amount of food inside of his mouth (And she feared a little bit that it would result in Russell either waking up or chocking on them!), but to her surprise he started to eat it!

He was tasting, chewing, (Even given comments in his sleep on what he thought about it.) and then finally swallowed it down!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------------------------------------------

Mink was in such awe of what Russell had just done, but when she saw how his cute little chubby belly had grown out about an inch she knew she needed to do this to him again!

Tipping her bowl over a lot more this time Russell was forced to eat (and sometimes swallow without chewing) at least 3-4 times more then the first batch that Minka had given him, and before Minka knew it she had feed Russell all of her food!

Looking back at his belly Minka was astounded by how big she had made it, and resting her head on top of it Russell's belly felt like soft and wonderful pillow to rest on.

"I need to make it bigger!" Minka thought, and then saw the other foodbowls belonging to the other Pets.

She knew that some of them would get very upset when they found out their food is gone, but she just had to see how far she could take this thing!

From having been very careful the first time Minka had now gone completely (excuse the pun) bananas over this funny thing!

She rushed foodbowl after foodbowl to him, (and she didn't care about the messy trails it created.) as she saw that round orange dome rise higher and higher with each meal.

When she ran out of food bowls to feed him she realised something.

She could basically feed Russell just about ANYTHING that she could grab!

Pretty soon plush toys, small balls, and even a small food bowl (meant for kittens and puppies) found it's way down into Russell's everlasting belly.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------------------------------------------

Minka was really proud of just how much stuff had actually been fit inside of her friend's round middle. It looked to be about 1-2 feet in diameter now, and it didn't seem to show any signs of running out of space yet.

But there was almost nothing left for her now to feed him.

What ever shall she do?
1211322221211.title: A sleepy prank.

12113222212112.content:
As she was wondering what she should feed Russell next Minka suddenly heard the sound of the other pets coming!

Not wanting to be found out for what she had been doing the pink monkey quickly climbed up and hide amongst the pipes, as to observe what was going to happen next.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------------------

As Russell was still sleeping heavily the other 5 pets came walking into the daycare centre.

As they walked in some of them got first surprised by how big he suddenly was, but after some of them saw that their food bowls where empty and that there was big food trail leading up to the sleeping hedgehog made many of them start getting a little upset towards him.

"Did he seriously eat ALL of our food?!" Zoe asked, while not being not know to be the most heavy eater she did like at least eat something!

"Maybe this is some elaborate joke he is pulling at us?" Pepper asked, to which Vinnie and Sunil immediately started lifting all the empty bowls, hoping that he food would somehow be underneath it. "Seriously?" was all the Skunk could say to seeing this.

"I'm going to ask him." Penny Ling said, feeling that if anyone else asked him they would probably be very rude.

"Uhm, Russell? Are you there?" The kind Panda girl said as she carefully woke up her very stuffed friend.

"Penny Ling? I had such a weird dream. I dreamt that I ate so much...!" Russell said while trying to get up, and then realised that his had a much larger belly then when he went to sleep!

"What is this?!" Russell asked as he felt his belly. "What did I eat?!"

"What didn't you eat, Russell?" Zoe asked angrily, and sent her food bowl flying into the fatted up sides of Russell. "You ate my food!"

"And you ate our food!" Sunil and Vinnie said, also sounding very upset.

"And everyone else's food." Penny Ling said, who sounded much more concern then angry.

"And even some of my props!" Pepper said while searching through her box of joke props. "You ate three juggling balls, two joke glasses, and even my rubber chicken! What am I now suppose to hit Vinnie with when he says something stupid?" She asked, to which Vinnie first said an agreeing "Yeah!" before giving a delayed "Hey!" to Pepper.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------------------------------

Watching how the caos of Russell trying to come to grips with why he had suddenly eaten everything, and the other pets added confusion to the whole thing was truely something to be called "Master of pranking".

Minka had a blast laughing over it all, but in her own moment she realised something.

From where she was hiding from everyon Minka felt that something as fun as fattening up Russell in his sleep couldn't be kept for herself.

She needed to tell another one of the pets about this, and and see if he/she would want to join her in on the fun.

But who should she share her secret with?
12113222212112.title: No time for that! The other pets are coming!

121132222121122.content: Not Penny Ling, but who?
121132222121122.title: Someone else.

1211322221211222.content: Not Penny Ling or Pepper, who else?
1211322221211222.title: Someone else. 2

12113222212112222.content: If not the girls, then maybe one of the boys?
12113222212112222.title: Someone else. 3

choices: He tries one of his own spells on himself, and it has some gaining effects.
His owners back home starts to spoil him A LOT with the food.
1212.content: What's the reason for the magical Mongoose to get fat?
1212.title: Sunil Nevla

12121.content:
Sunil was all by himself, doing what he usually liked to do the most. Practice his magic.

He was a bit nervous for this particular magic trick since 1, he had never done it before, and 2, he was going to do it on himself.

What he was going to do was to cast a spell that would change his whole body structure, and give himself the body of a fitness god. (At least that's what he was planning would happen to him.)

Not wanting to risk hurting anyone of his friends Sunil took a deep breath, pointed the magic wand towards his body, and said the magic words.

A huge thunder bolt looking thing came out the wand and his Sunil's body with such great force that it made him fly a few feet away and land hard on his back.

"Ouch! Big mistake, Big mistake!" Sunil said, as he got himself up again.

Looking at his body he didn't see any kind of change. "Either it didn't work, or this is one of those slow working spells. Either way I don't think I will try doing this spell for a while." He said, and put his magic wand away and went of to play with his friends.

Even thought he thought he had failed Sunil had actually succeeded in casting a spell on himself. What he didn't know was that is wasn't a weight loss spell. It was a weight gain spell!

The only thing that was still unknown was if Sunil's gaining would be a slow or a quick one?
12121.title: Mismatched Magic

choices: He continues playing and forgets about being slower.
121211.content:
As he got over to see what his friends was up to he saw that they where all playing around with a small soccer ball.

"What are you all doing?" Sunil ask the group.

"We are just having a game of soccer." Zoe said.

"After the trip to Brazil we had a while ago Minka suddenly wanted to show us all what great dribbling tricks she had learned from the animals there." Russell added.

"And after doing some awesome trick with the ball, she challenged us all for a match." Vinnie finished.

"Oh, okay. Can I also join in on that?" Sunil asked.

"Why wouldn't we let you Sunil? Of course you can join." Pepper said, and since she currently had the ball she sent it over to Sunil.

"What am I suppose to do with this?" Sunil said slightly stressed over the sudden task of playing a game he know.

"Just send it over to us Sunil!" Vinnie shouted, and Sunil was quick to do as he was told.

As this went on Sunil did his best to try and pass the ball, try to set goals, and just keeping up running after the ball like all the other pets. Especially that last part turned out to be more and more difficult to do as time went on.

That was because of the spell from earlier giving it's slow effect. The spell had been reversing how Sunil's body worked so that every time Sunil did something that would burn his calories he wound actually gain them, and vice versa. This had the effect of all Sunil's sweaty running, passing, and kicking was starting to make the changes happening.

Sunil's stomach started to expand slightly. The same was happening to his arm, legs, rear, and chest. All of this only helped him get more slower in the game, (with his body becoming more heavier and all.) which only made him try harder to keep up with the other pets.

After about an hour of playing he was still looking a lot like he started, with a new found small pouch of a stomach being the most obvious change.

But the question is, does he notice the changes happening on his body?
121211.title: It's a slow gain.

choices: He manages to sneak away from the others without being seen.
One of the pets notice him trying to sneak away.
1212111.content:
Feeling that it is very strange how he sudden is so slow in the game Sunil looks down on himself and is shocked.

He who usually is one of the more slimmer pet now found himself having a small potbelly. (It was not as big as on Russell or Penny Ling, but for him it felt that big.) As he was catching his he could actually see it fill out a small bit because of all the sweat he was losing.

If he could see it, then the other would notice it also he thought, and started to quickly make up a plan in his head on what to do. To be able to do anything against this he knew he needed to get back to his magic wand he placed in the corner, but to do that he needed to leave the soccer game, and that could make the pets notice his embarrassing problem.

"I just have to try and be as sneaky as possible when I go away." He thought to himself. "I just hope nobody notice is I'm gone for while."

Does Sunil's plan work?
1212111.title: He notices his weight gain.

choices: Try to cover his extra weight with something.
12121111.content:
Luckily for Sunil the other pets where really into their soccer game, so he had no problems at all leaving without being seen.

Getting back to his magic wand laying in the corner he left it in, Sunil picked it up and looked down at himself again.

He could see that during the time it had taken him to get back to the wand he seemed to have gained another pound, now making him look like he had a paunch on 10 pounds. (That is in Mongoose pounds and not human pounds.)

Knowing he had to be quick so the other wouldn't see him in this ridiculous shape Sunil took and waved his magic wand and said another chant to make the spell work. "Good bye forever belly." He thought as he casted the spell.

Once again there was a small lightning burst from the wand, and a small explosion with smoke when the spell was cast. After clearing the smoke around him Sunil looked down, expecting to see his problems (Like his extra weight) gone. But what he saw the exact opposite!

Not only was his belly fat there, but there was even more of it now! (It had gone from 10 to 20 extra pounds!) And not only that, but he could also see and feel that both his hips and butt had now also outgrown slightly. And if that wasn't enough, by just staying still long enough Sunil could actually see how the fat in his body was increasing!

"Maybe I can fix this before the others finds out!" Sunil thought, when he suddenly heard a voice from a distance. "Sunil are you okay?"

"Oh no! That second blast must have alerted the others about me! What do I do? What do I do?!" Sunil thought in pure fear.

He had two options. Either he try to run away and hide from the others. Or he could greet them, but while wearing something that could cover up his extra weight.

What does he choose?
12121111.title: He manages to sneak away from the others withou...

choices: One of the pets thinks something is up.
121211112.content:
Knowing he wouldn't have time to escape before the others would caught a glimpse of him, Sunil had to instead find a way to "hide" his body.

Seeing his black magical laying on the floor Sunil quickly grabbed it and tied it around his neck. (Which he felt had also grown slightly larger thanks to the spells.)

After tying it around his neck Sunil pulled the rest of the cape around him, to hide most of himself. He could still see several lumps sticking out on the fabric, (That was from his sticking out stomach, chest, and rump) that was looking really obvious to the otherwise smooth surface of the cape.

Seeing his problem he tried simply suck in his gut and chest, (And stand more straight in order to drag in his rump slightly) and hope he could hide it for his friends.

As he saw his friends rushing towards him Sunil knew he had to try and keep up his best "poker face".

When they all came up to him he simply greeted them by calmly asking "What's the big hurry?", like if it was just raining.

"We heard what sounded like a loud explosion!" Pepper said in a very worried tone.

"And we saw some smoke too!" Penny Ling added, sounding just as worried.

"Oh, that was nothing. Just some...failed cooking." Sunil lied, hoping his "innocent face" would make them buy it.

Luckily they all seemed to buy that the smoke and explosion was just Sunil being just that awful in cooking, (Which on second thought made him wonder if they really thought that he was that bad at it, cause he wasn't. Or was he?) but that's when Minka for no reason at all suddenly asked "Why are you wearing your magic cape, but not your hat?"

"Minka!" Sunil shouted inside his own head. "Why did she have to say that?"

Just like Sunil had originally worried now all the pets where wondering the very same thing. He could just simply had said that he had forgot the hat, but for some reason he instead said. "I was...freezing."

Everybody looked strangely at the covered Sunil, and Russell was the one to say "But it isn't so cold inside here."

"Oh. Well, that's because..." Sunil said as he felt his panic growing bigger and bigger inside of him. "I lowered the temperature in the room slightly, but then regret it. But by then I was already freezing so I had to cover myself with my cape." Sunil's final explanation finally became said.

Some of the pets looked a bit sceptical, but luckily for Sunil Zoe said "Actually, I too seems to feel that slight cold in the room now when he says it." which made the other pets drop their suspicions.

"Well, looks like all of our questions are answered now, so I think I will go to do other stuff." Sunil said, and started to walk away from the group. (Trying to make his half walk/half running look as natural as possible.)

Looking behind him he saw how the other pets also seemed to return to their normal lifestyles. and he hoped that nobody was suspecting what had actually happen.

Did they?
121211112.title: Try to cover his extra weight with something.

1212111122.content: One of them thinks that Sunil is hiding something, but who is that?
1212111122.title: One of the pets thinks something is up.

12121111221.content:
Sunil could see from Russell's looks that he wasn't buying his excuses, and he knew he should try to get away very quickly before the hedgehog tries to talk to him one to one.

"Sunil." Russell's voice said from behind him.

"To late." Sunil thought, and turned around to face Russell.

There is no use for to hide it from me. I know that you where lying when you said that it was you being bad in the kitchen, and I also know that it must be something about your body that you are hiding." Russell said.

"How did you know?" Sunil asked.

"Elementary my dear Sunil." Russell said, sounding like his favourite literature character. "Given you typical way of acting I could easily calculate that you where hiding something, and since you are using your cape to cover almost all of your body I'm 100% sure that it is something that has happen that can't be wash away."

"Wow. You are good." Sunil said amazed.

"Well not to sounds selfish but yes, I am." Russell said, giving himself a small pat on the back.

"But you still need to tell what exactly what it is you are hiding." Russell said, and took one step closer to Sunil, which made him almost start running away.

"No! I can't show you!" Sunil said, sounding as scared as always of his secret to be revealed.

"Okay let's make a compromise. You tell me what it is that is wrong, but you don't need to show me." Russell said.

His diplomacy skill proved to be working as Sunil seemed to calm down and say, "Okay, I think I can tell you it at least."

"That's good Sunil. So what is it that has happen to you?" Russell asked.

"Well...I wanted to try and look more "slim and thin" with a magic spell, but after a small mistake with said spell I became less thin and more..." Sunil said, and had a hard time knowing how to put his last when Suddenly Russell filled in with..."Like me?"

Sunil got very surprised that Russell right there basically called himself fat. "Are you not upset over me almost saying that?" He asked confused.

"I have got to hear that a lot of times so I'm pretty used to it, and it's not like I'm ever ashamed of it." Russell said, and patted his own gut as to prove his point.

"Okay, that's very nice to hear." Sunil said.

"But I guess that you yourself wouldn't like to live the rest of your life like this?" Russell said, with Sunil simply nodding as an answer.

"If there is any way for me to help you fix this Sunil, I'm always here for you." Russell said, placing one of his paws on Sunil's shoulder.

Sunil was very happy over hearing that his friend was prepared to help him with his problem, but does he really know anything about how to undue Magic Spell? Maybe he would only make things worse, even if he wasn't intending to do that?

Should Sunil accept Russell's help?
12121111221.title: Russell.

121211112211.content:
Feeling that two minds would think better then one Sunil decided to accept Russell's help.

"Okay Russell. If you can I would gladly accept your help." The mongoose said to his friend.

"Thanks." The hedgehog said back.

"Excuse me for asking this, but do you have any ideas on how you would be able to help with a weight gain spell?" Sunil asked.

"Well...one thing that I'm very good at is observing and analysing details, so maybe if I could see how your body is expanding by the spell, then maybe my facts could help you in making a counter spell?" Russell suggested from the top of his head, but by the look from his friend it must have sounded like the most smartest plan he could have made.

"Once again Russell. Wow, you are good." Sunil said, once again amazed.

"Thanks." Russell said, and felt a slight blush from the compliments he got. "There is just one more thing." He added.

"And that is?" Sunil asked curiously.

"In order for me to clearly see the whole weight gain process, I must ask you to drop your cape." He said, which got Sunil to only cover himself even more.

"What? No!" He said, not liking the thought of him exposing himself to his friend in this state.

"Please Sunil. It will be much more harder for me to make notes if you keep yourself covered. If you want me to help you, you must do what I ask you for." Russell said, and even tough Sunil didn't like it, he decided to do what his friend asked for.

"Sigh" "Okay Russell." Sunil said, and untied the knot around his neck, and let his cape fall to the floor.

Even tough Russell had been told by his friend that he was going to be a bit "huksy" in his body shape, he was still very surprised by that he was this big. He had his big chest, belly, and rump, but it all looked much bigger on him then on Russell given that he was a few heads taller then him.

"And are you still gaining weight right as we speak?" Russell asked.

"Yes. In fact I even think you can see it happening right with your own eyes." Sunil said, and stood still for a moment to let Russell see it.

As Russell watched he could in fact see Sunil's stomach inching out a little bit as time went on. "Fascinating." He said, and immediately picked up his always ready notebook and pen, and started taking his notes.

He walked around Sunil, looked up close at all the expanding parts of his body. And even felt on some of them with his pen, (like the belly and the rump.) which Sunil felt was a little bit to personal for him.

After feeling he was finished taking notes he told Sunil that he could start moving again. While the mongoose was getting his body to feel less stiff Russell made a final conclusion.

"After looking through everything closely, it seems like your stomach is where the gaining seems to start, and from where it takes and spreads out." He explained.

"So you are saying that I should try to put an anti-spell on my belly in order to stop my gaining?" Sunil asked.

"It's always a start." Russell simply answered.

"Okay. Here I go." Sunil said, and grabbed his magic wand (That he had been hiding under the cape this whole time.), and made a small gesture with it.

A small poof of smoke appeared again around Sunil, and once it was settled bot he and Russell could see that...
121211112211.title: He accepts Russell's help.

1212111122112.content:
...Nothing had changed. Sunil was still looking as chunky as he before the spell try, and by staring for a short time Russell could assure that his belly was still slowly growing outwards.

"Dang it!" Russell said while tossing his clipboard on the ground, being really upset over their failed attempt.

Sunil on the other hand was much more worried over his condition not stopping, placing his hands on his round belly and simply saying "Oh dear."

"Can this get any worse?" Sunil asked loudly (mostly to himself), and as if fate wanted to play pranks on him the mongoose and hedgehog suddenly heard a familiar sweet voice say "What's even worse?".

Looking from the entrance they both saw Penny Ling staying there, and she looked so taken by the sight of Sunil, in this state, holding his stomach with his hands.

There was first a very awkward silent moment before Russell tried breaking the ice by saying "So...You are here."

The sound of speaking once again triggered Sunil into his (now very common) panic state. This time his panic state made him start to walk around nervously while still carrying his belly in his paws. (Looking like he was afraid that it would fall off his body if he didn't hold it.)

Penny Ling (Not wanting any situation to be bad.) tried to calm Sunil down, so she took him in his hands and said "Calm down Sunil! What has happen to you?"

Still on the verge of either crying or running away Sunil took and tried his best to explain to Penny Ling what had happen to him, and she made sure to keep him calm during the whole talk.

Once he was finished she told him that it was nothing to be ashamed of, (As accidents happens) and then she said, "In fact, I actually kinda like it." while blushing a little by her confession.

Both Sunil and Russell got very surprised and shocked over what she said, and while Sunil started to blush himself by hearing that she liked his body, Russell started to form a slight look of jealousy.

Before any of them had given any response to what the panda had said, Penny Ling walked up to Sunil and said "As a matter of fact. Since I already have said this I might as well also ask this."

She then looked Sunil in the eyes and said "Can I...feel on your belly?"

This question completely dumbfounded both of the guys, and while Russell just couldn't believe what he had heard, Sunil got so taken by the question that he lost his grip of his stomach and let it fall down to hang freely.

This was a very unexpected turn of events for Sunil to have Penny Ling find out about his problem, for her to like what she saw, and to now have her almost after saying that ask for Sunil to let her touch it.

The question is, should he let her do it?
1212111122112.title: The spell did not work.

choices: Sunil wants to stop the spell.
Sunil wants to continue feeling Penny Ling's paws on his belly.
12121111221121.content:
Having someone else place her paws on his belly and feel around on it felt like something that Sunil never would allow anyone under any circumcisions, but looking into those sweet pleading Panda eyes of Penny Ling he felt like he was there was no way he could say no to her.

"Those eyes could open any locks." Sunil thought as he managed to make his mouth make out a (somewhat forced) "Yes, you can." to her.

"Oh, thank you so much for saying yes Sunil!" Penny Ling said, and hugged him with big happiness.

Someone that wasn't as happy was Russell, who (even thought he had never said it to anyone) had been having some "feelings" for Penny Ling, and seeing her hug Sunil started to make him a little bit jealous.

After releasing her hugging grip from Sunil, Penny Ling wasted no time in starting to feel his fat.

What first started with simple touches, soon turned into full on Massages. Penny Ling took and poked, pushed, grabbed, and doing just about anything else with Sunil's flabby stomach. It was like seeing a little child playing around with a piece of clay, turning it into any kind of shape, and just feeling it's texture in her paws.

For Sunil it was quite an experience for him too. Going from first fearing it, to actually love the treatment he got a lot.

While Sunil felt more and more in heaven with this experience, Russell felt more and more of the hate of Penny Ling showing the likes for Sunil then him. It's was so that he just wanted to jump up on a table, smack his own gut, and yell "Look Penny Ling! Look at all this fat." while rubbing it for her. (But he had never really been the one to make any huge scenes.)

To show just how big impact this massage had on Sunil, he was in so much inner pleasure that he lost his feelings in his legs and landed on his back on the floor. And instead of stopping (or even asking if he was okay first) Penny Ling just followed him and continued feeling around on his midsection on the floor with him.

Feeling that this was getting way to crazy now Russell decided to stop Sunil's "fun" and said clear and loudly "Maybe we should try finding a way to stop that spell, Sunil?"

For the first time since this whole belly massage thing started Sunil got out of his "trance" like state, and heard Russell's question. The real question was, would he want to fix it now and end this that was going with him and Penny Ling?
12121111221121.title: He says Yes.

121211112211211.content:
No matter how much Sunil loved the feeling of Penny Ling's massage, he still wanted to try and get back to his once slimmer form again.

"Uhm, Penny Ling? Could you please stop?" He asked, and Penny Ling did stop. (Even thought she was pretty surprised over hearing him say that.)

"Why, yes Sunil. But why don't you want me to continue?" She asked him.

"It's just that this condition I have makes me constantly fatter the longer time we waste. So if I don't want to become completely immobile with fat I really should try and find a way to brake the spell." Sunil said, as he got up from the floor.

"Immobile?" Penny Ling asked, sounding like she hadn't heard anything else from Sunil after he had mentioned that word.

"Yes. Can you imagine how that would have looked like?" Sunil said, as he walked off with Russell who said "Good job there Sunil." to him.

Penny Ling sat left there imagining just how it would look like if Sunil was turned into a Mongoose blob of fat, and she liked it. She really enjoyed the thought of her laying on top of parts of his huge body, and use it as a bed. This thinking pretty quickly soon turned into a full on obsession, and she couldn't imagine any other future then of Sunil continue gaining his weight.

"Hey Russell, have you seen where my magic wand has ended up? I need it in order to be able to try and change myself back." Sunil said to his friend, as he searched everywhere for it.

Looking behind her Penny Ling saw said magic wand laying on the floor, and a very evil looking smirk came up on her face.

While saying a very fake "Oh, Ops!" Penny Ling pressed her foot hard on the magic wand, breaking it in two.

Hearing the noise Sunil and Russell rushed over, and got shocked over what they saw.

"No! How will I ever stop this now?!" Sunil said, as he picked up the pieces and started to cry.

"Oh, don't cry Sunil. You know, I think you will find a way to fix this. Maybe just not now." She said, while putting one of her paws on his belly.

"But my body?" Sunil asked, while seeing how Penny Ling was starting to rub him slightly again.

"When you put that spell you will turn back to your ordinary shape again, right?" Penny Ling asked.

"I guess yes, but I still would have wanted to do that now. Maybe I can fix this wand and cast that counter spell?" Sunil said, looking on his two wand pieces, but Penny Ling took them from him and tossed them above her back.

"You can do that later Sunny. How about you and me spend some time together instead?" Penny Ling asked, and got close face to face with Sunil.

This was a hard decision for Sunil since he wanted to be normal sized again, but it was hard to resist Penny Ling's charm.

What does he choose?
121211112211211.title: Sunil wants to stop the spell.

choices: Penny Ling comes up with the perfect plan.
Sunil and Russell has the wand fixed before she gets an idea.
1212111122112111.content:
"No Penny Ling. I need to first fix the wand and get my old body back!" Sunil said as he broke the hug he was getting, and rushed off to collect the two wand pieces.

This made Penny Ling very upset, (seeing how she had hoped to spend some more time with fatty Sunil.) but Russell on the other hand was very pleased with Sunil's choice. (As he was starting to get a bit jealous over his crush starting to hook up with another guy.)

"Let me help you get that fixed Sunil, after all two heads thinks better then one." Russell said as he picked up one of the wand pieces, while Sunil picked up the other. "Oh, thanks Russell. A helping hand in this would make it much quicker to fix this." Sunil said, as the two of them walked over to try and fix it on Sunil's Magic table.

Penny Ling was not at all happy over what was happening. She wanted to have a big warm Sunil to cuddle with, and she was not going to let that opportunity slip away from her. But she had to act quickly, as Russell and Sunil working on the wand together could have it fixed in no time. She needed some kind of way to distract Russell from being near Sunil, then she had to make sure to destroy the wand into such little pieces that it would never be able to get back to normal again!

But the question is, would Penny Ling be able to come up with an evil idea in time, or would Russell and Sunil manage to fix the wand before then?
1212111122112111.title: Try and fix the wand.

12121111222.content: If not Russell then who?
12121111222.title: Someone else.

choices: Sunil dosen't asks for her help.
121211112221.content:
Just as Sunil thought that he was safe and could drop the act (and his dragged in belly), he heard the sound of very familiar Skunk from behind.

"What has happen Sunil?" Pepper asked him.

Getting back into his familiar "panic state" Sunil almost didn't know how to use words when he said "W-What do you mean, Pepper?" to her.

"Come on Sunil. I know you, and it's very easy to know when you are lying." Pepper said, sounding less funny then she usually was.

"You...can?" Sunil asked, and after he got a simple nod form Pepper he let out a sigh of defeat.

"But what is it Sunil? The way you have been acting it must be something really serious that has happen to you." Pepper said, this time sounding more worried.

"I-I don't want to talk about it." Sunil said, while almost starting to walk away again.

He had only taken a few steps when Pepper suddenly shouted to him.

"Listen Sunil! I want to help you, and either you tell me now what's the problem, or I will tell the other that you have been lying!" (She didn't like yelling at him like that, but she only did it cause she was carrying about him.)

After having some inner debates with himself Sunil decided that it would be much worse to have ALL of them getting to know his problem, instead of just Pepper.

"Okay. I will show you my problem." Sunil said, and started to prepare to take away his cape. "Just promise you wont laugh." He said to Pepper, before starting to tie up the knot around his neck.

"What, no. I would never laugh at you Sunil if you wouldn't want me..." Pepper said right before Sunil open up his cape, and dropped it on the floor. Once he had done that a smirk appeared on Pepper's face, and she went from small giggles to completely burst out laughing at the sight of Sunil's chunky body.

"Pepper!" Sunil said, blushing slightly over her laughing at him.

"Hehe. I'm sorry, but you have a body that would even make Russell look slim by comparison." Pepper said, while wiping tears out of her eyes. "But how did you even end up like this? Did you eat 5 cheeseburgers at the same time before putting that robe on?" She asked

"I was just trying to use a spell to make me look thinner...and it had the opposite effect." Sunil said, while patting his stomach, making Pepper start doing laughing sounds again.

"Pepper!" Sunil said, this time sounding more upset then ashamed.

"Sorry, sorry." Pepper said. "But seriously, is there anything I can do to help you with...this?" She asks, and tries not to laugh again as she points to Sunil's body.

Having been so forced to show Pepper his body Sunil hadn't even thought of her actually helping him. But how would she do that? And would he even want her to try and fix it? What if it would only make things worse?

Should he ask for her help or not?
121211112221.title: Pepper.

1212111122211.content:
"Okay Pepper. I gladly accept your help." Sunil finally said to his skunk friend.

"Thanks Sunil." Pepper said, and got so happy that she went up and hugged Sunil's huge body. After first a few moments of what was happening did she break up from Sunil, and blushed a little over it.

"So..What exactly is it that you would want me to help you with?" Pepper then asked Sunil, who after some thoughts said, "I did forget to get my Magic Wand and Hat when I walked off. If you want, you could go and get it for me?"

"Sure thing Sunil." Pepper said, and then started to walk off to get it for him.

"Oh, and one more thing." Sunil said.

"Yes?" Pepper answered.

"Would you be so kind as to not tell the other ones about...this?" Sunil asked, while holding his spare tire around his waist.

"Absolutely Sunny." Pepper said before walking away.

"Sunny? I don't think I have ever heard her call me that before." Sunil thought as he waited for Pepper to get back.

After a few moments Pepper came back with both the Wand and Hat for him.

"Here you go Sunil." She said, as she handed it over to him.

"Thanks Pepper." Sunil replied.

"So what will you do now when you have your stuff back?" Pepper asked.

"I will try to see if I can find any way to reverse this whole mistake. Can you stand guard and look out for other pets that might come over here and look? I'm much better the fewer knows about it." Sunil asked.

"Absolutely Sunil. Anything for you." Pepper said, as she walked off to stand guard for him.

"Anything for me? That's so sweet of her to say to me." Sunil thought, before trying to focus on his counter spell.

While he was trying his hardest to focus on the spell, Pepper did her best at keeping her eyes out for any other pets that might wander up to their corner.

The question was "Would anyone appear?", and if yes "What would she do about it?"

Does anyone appear?
1212111122211.title: Sunil asks for her help.

choices: Vinnie gives up for real and leaves.
Vinnie doesn't give up his search after Sunil.
121211112221111.content:
Keeping an eye out for Sunil, Pepper suddenly spotted someone coming closer to their corner.

It was Vinnie, the always dance loving gecko and Sunil's best friend.

Pepper got worried as she saw him walking towards them, knowing that if he was looking for his friend he would not be giving up that quest in a long time.

Trying to keep a good face (and pretend nothing was happening.) Pepper just smiled and said "Hey Vinnie. What are you doing here?"

She hoped he wouldn't say "Looking for Sunil.", but that was exactly what he said.

But that wasn't everything. He also said that he wanted to search this particular part of the day camp centre after him.

"That will not be necessary Vinnie. I have already look through this place, and Sunil is nowhere near." Pepper said, and tried to sound as convincing as possible.

After hearing Pepper saying this Vinnie first said "Oh, okay. If you say so.", but then he added "But I still want to look through this place too."

"But since I already can tell you that Sunil isn't here, what is the point of you even looking it up?" Pepper said, sounding a bit more irritated this time.

"Maybe he left a small clue somewhere over there." Vinnie said, sounding more determined then ever to pass by.

"Like what?" Pepper asked.

"I don't know. Maybe a half eaten cookie or something?" Vinnie responded, before bending over to Pepper's ear and whispering. "Not to sound mean, but Sunil has been having a bit of a eating habit recently. I think he might even have packed on a few pounds."

"If only you know just how much it is." Pepper thought to herself.

"So can I go over there and look or not?" Vinnie asked one final time.

"No you can't Vinnie! So just go away! Don't make me get my rubber chicken and smack you on the head with it!" Pepper threated, and this made Vinnie finally go away.

"I hate to be so rough on him, but at least I made him give up." Pepper thought to herself.

But had Vinnie really been giving up?
121211112221111.title: Vinnie.

choices: She manages to break them up.
She can't make Vinnie stop dancing with Sunil.
1212111122211112.content:
Given that it was Vinnie Pepper should have known that nothing really could make that hard headed gecko give up on his "mission".

Since he was a reptile he had the gift of using his sticky lizard paws to climb walls, so that's exactly what he did.

Having no problems getting a grip on the wall, Vinnie took and got high up before he started moving towards the direction he wanted.

He knew that Pepper would see him while doing it, so climbing on the great height as he did he made sure that she wouldn't be able to reach him.

As Pepper saw Vinnie crawling above her she got both upset and scared over him getting to see Sunil soon. She hated to say it, but she had to admit it. For being Vinnie, that was pretty clever.

"No, stop Vinnie!" She shouted, but he didn't seem to listen to her anymore.

She started to try and run faster then he could crawl (And he could crawl really fast), and try to warn Sunil that he was coming.

Knowing that he was going faster then her Pepper tried to warn Sunil about Vinnie coming, but she was to late.

She could see Vinnie round a corner, and hear him say "Wow Dude!", before hearing a the sound of something hitting the ground hard.

Coming around the corner she saw Vinnie laying on the floor (after the shock of him seeing Sunil's body made him loose his grip of the wall.), and Sunil covering his body with one arm covering his chest, and one covering his crotch. (Like he was a fatter version of the Venus statue.)
Then Vinnie got worry for him and said that some dancing might help get rid of the fat.

Getting up from the floor it still looked like Vinnie's jaw was still left there, given how much he was staring and gaping at the sight of Sunil.

"Dude. I know you looked a bit unfit when we played soccer earlier, but not this much!" Vinnie said.

"We can explain it Vinnie!" Pepper said, but Vinnie didn't seem to listen.

"I know exactly what to do in order to fix this." Vinnie said.

And before either Sunil or Pepper had a chance to guess what it was, Vinnie grabbed Sunil's hand and said "A good old fashion dance break."

Then without warning Vinnie took and pulled Sunil out to the middle of the floor, and started forcing him into a routine that involved both Polka, Tango, Street-dance, and River-dance. (All in his good way of trying to help Sunil lose his weight.)

But what Vinnie didn't know was that the original failed spell that Sunil had put up had made his whole metabolism was reversed, and doing exercise was only going to increase his weigh!

Since the dance was much more sweat given then the soccer Sunil could feel his weight gain like crazy! His flabby belly felt like it was stretching down and getting bigger. His chest was starting to feel much more ticker, and his butt was feeling like it was growing even more outwards from his back.

Looking on Pepper could in horror see how her Mongoose friend was turning more and more into a slob the more he and Vinnie danced. She know she needed to break up the dancing, but given that it was something that Vinnie was so passionate about that would be easier said then done.

She was going to try, but would she succeed?
1212111122211112.title: Vinnie doesn't give up his search after Sunil.

12121111222111121.content:
Rushing in and breaking them up, Pepper managed to stop Sunil from "exercising" himself to full blown obesity.

"Hey. What did you do that for?" Vinnie asked, annoyed over Pepper stopping him when he was so in the groove.

"Because your dancing wasn't helping Sunil. In fact, it made him even more fatter then he was before you started." Pepper said, and pointed at the now much fatter Sunil sitting down and catching his breath.

"Wow, how did that even manage to happen?" Vinnie asked confused.

"You see, Sunil accidently gave himself a spell that completely turned his whole body around. So when he does stuff to try and lose his weight (like your dancing) it actually does nothing else but helping him GAIN weight instead of losing it." Pepper explained. "Do you get it?" She asked.

"I think so." Vinnie answered, before asking "Does that mean that if he just sits down and eats ice cream all day, he would actually lose weight?"

"I don't know, but I'm sure the answer is no." Pepper said.

"In that case, I don't get it." Vinnie said, and shrugged his shoulders.

"Hey, you two." Sunil said, getting the two's attention. "I will try out another spell to see if this one can fix it, and I would like you two to stay quiet as I concentrate."

"Okay." Pepper said.

"Sure thing." Vinnie said.

Then Sunil started to meditate for a moment before swinging his wand, and a light smoke cloud appeared.

The question was still, did the spell work out?
12121111222111121.title: She manages to break them up.

choices: He doesn't want to try it.
121211112221111212.content:
After the smoke disappeared all three of them could see that nothing had happen to Sunil.

That is except that he was gaining weight even more faster now!

While his stomach had been stretching out very slowly before, it now was growing out almost a few inches in the minute!

Starting to panic for real now Sunil asked Pepper what he was going to do about it, and she just said that she didn't know either.

"Have you tried eating some?" Vinnie asked, while eating from a bucket of ice-cream.

"What?" Pepper asked confused.

"Like I said earlier if Sunil gets fatter the more exercise he does, maybe eating some junk food will make him lose it?" Vinnie said, while taking another scoop into his mouth.

"Why would that work? It doesn't even make any sense!" Pepper said.

"Since when has magic made any sense?" Vinnie asked back, and Pepper was about to say a comeback line, but realized he had a point there.

"Or what do you say Sunny?" Vinnie asked Sunil. "Do you want to have a scoop and see if it helps?" He then scooped up another spoonful of ice-cream and held it out for his quickly gaining friend.

The question is does Sunil try to see if the Ice-Cream help?
121211112221111212.title: It doesn't work.

1212111122211112121.content:
"I'm already as big as a house, so what do I have to lose?" Sunil said, and grabbed the spoon from Vinnie and took a mouthful.

The Ice-Cream did taste very well and he was enjoying eating it, even though he knew it would only do bad things to his already huge weight.

After he had finished the big spoonful Sunil sat down, and let the ice-cream settle in his stomach.

That's when Pepper noticed something. After the latest magic blast Sunil's body had been starting to gain weight so quickly that it was even possible to see it grow with the naked eye, but now with the eaten ice-cream Pepper noticed that the growth had stopped!

"Sunil! Your weight! It has stopped!" Pepper said overjoyed, and even hugged Sunil. (Which both surprised him and her.)

"It did?" Sunil asked, and looked down and felt his belly.

For a short time (About 30 seconds.) Nothing has happening, but just when they where about to say that Sunil finally had broken the curse his stomach started to grow out again.

"Oh no! It was only temporary!" Sunil said.

"What do we do now?" Pepper asked worried.

"Have him eat more ice-cream of course." Vinnie said, and handed over Sunil the entire ice-cream bucket that the Mongoose started to eat from very quickly.

"Not to rub it in to you, but what was it I said?" Vinnie said to Pepper in a way to brag, and she responded by hitting him in the head with her rubber chicken.

"Ouch! What was that for? I was helping you." Vinnie asked, as he rubbed his head.

"That was for how unnecessary the way you said it was." Pepper answered, before both of them heard a huge burp coming from behind them.

"Looking back they saw that Sunil had emptied the entire ice-cream bucket, and if he had been having a huge stomach from the spell before, then he now had a big one thanks to all the ice-cream he had stuffed himself with.

"Urp! This should keep that spell in check for me in such a long time that I will be able to give that counter spell a new try." Sunil said.

"Are you sure that it will work this time?" Pepper asked worried. "You have tried that about 2-3 times before, and all the times it has only made this thing even worse!"

"I'm about 99% sure that it will work this time." Sunil said, and cast the spell.

Once again a huge cloud of smoke appeared, and once gone they all three could see that the spell...
1212111122211112121.title: He tries it out.

12121111222111121211.content:
After the smoke was cleared Sunil still looked as fat as he had done before the spell.

"Did it work?" Pepper asked.

"We just have to wait for some time and see." Sunil answered.

They had all learned by now that after about a minute of time his stomach would have stretched out about an inch of length, and after staring at Sunil's belly for 5 minutes they could all be sure now that it had finally worked!

"It worked! The counter spell finally worked!" Sunil said, and was jumping up and down of joy. (With his body jiggling a lot because of it.)

"I'm so glad that you managed to fix it!" Pepper said, and hugged him hardly.

"And I'm happy that my best friend is happy!" Vinnie said, and join in on the hug.

Sunil and the others where so happy over the moment that it wasn't until Pepper and Vinnie let go and Sunil looked at himself when he noticed that he still had all that extra weight.

"Oh, there's also this." Sunil said, and poked his fat belly. "What am I suppose to do to get rid off this?

"Maybe you should do some exercise and diets? It would probably only take a week." Pepper said.

"And we can be right next to you, and help you in every step." Vinnie added, putting his hand on Sunil's shoulder.

"Or...Maybe I can use another spell to make myself thin?" Sunil asked, and he got immediately answered with Pepper and Vinnie both shouting "NO!"

"I was just kidding." Sunil said and laughed a little, before seeing on Pepper and Vinnie's looks that they didn't took it as a joke. "Sorry." Sunil then said.

............................................................................ ...........................................................


During the following week Sunil went into his hard training. He had Vinnie help him with preparing weights, and building obstacle courses. He was also the one ready to give Sunil encouragement and water when he needed it. Pepper's role was to create Sunil's diet, and watch over him to NOT break it. (Something that Sunil thought Pepper enjoyed doing a little to much, as she seemed to like it when she got to use a big bicycle horn to honk him with every time he was about to not follow it.) Despite all the hard work he was being put through Sunil still was happy, cause he knew that his two friends where pushing him, without ever trying to hurt him.

After a whole week of constant workouts and diets Sunil could show everyone that he finally had managed to get rid of all that extra fat he had been packing on. (He had even managed to get rid of the small extra pounds he had wanted to loose in the first place.)

As he was admiring his new body Pepper and Vinnie walked up to him, and Pepper asked "How are you feeling now Sunil?"

"It feels great to be this thin now." Sunil said, then he had a small pause, and then he also said "But it feels even more great to know that I have you two friends that always was there to help me when my bad problems only got worse, and to finally help me get back to my normal self again."

"Oh, Sunil:" Pepper said, and she and Vinnie went up to him and hugged him again. (The only difference this time being that they both managed to reach around his waist this time.)
12121111222111121211.title: Finally worked!

12123.content: How about a story when Sunil was just a child? (A la "In the Loop")
12123.title: Some other reasons.

choices: He want's to impress Pepper, and gets tricked by Vinnie to eat a lot.
121231.content: What WG story will happen to Sunil when he (And the rest of the pets) are kids?
121231.title: Yes.

choices: Sunil goes on with Vinnie's plan.
Sunil doesn't follow on Vinnie's plan.
1212311.content:
It was an ordinary day for the young pets at Littlest Pet Shop, with Sunil (The Mongoose) having a bit of a dilemma.

He happen to be very interested in talking to the lovely Skunk girl named Pepper, but he was to shy to do so. Every time he tried to get her attention she always seemed to just miss that he even was right next to her. He really would want to do anything just so that he could at least have her see him.

"I just wished someone could help me talk to her!" Sunil said out into the room, in hope that someone would answer him. And luckily (Or maybe in this case, unluckily.) somebody had heard him.

The one hearing him was Vinnie the Gecko, Sunil's best friend. And while he always was prepared to help his friend, he could also be a bit of a trickster at times who likes to play jokes on others. And this was one of those times.

He walked up to Sunil from behind him and said "Hey Sunil.", making him jump up in shock.

"Ah! Don't sneak up on me like that." Sunil said, not liking surprises like that.

"Sorry for that, but I heard your problem and I want to help you." Vinnie said.

"Really? How?" Sunil asked, filled with joy over the thought of having his problems fixed.

At this moment Vinnie knew that he could tell Sunil any lie he wanted, and he was going to have much fun with that.

"From what heard Pepper say to the other female pets she likes Pet boys that are Big." Vinnie said, and Sunil at first didn't get what he meant.

"What do you mean when you say big?" He asked the Gecko, who quickly had a new lie to explain that with.

"Pet's that are big in size. You know, big." He said and held his stomach in his hands to show what he meant. "Haven't you seen the way she has been looking at Russell lately?" Vinnie added, making a bit of jealousness appear on Sunil's face.

"She did?" He said, barley able to believe what his friend was telling him.

"What shall I do so that she will look at me instead of him?" Sunil asked Vinnie, who calmly answered "Get bigger then him."

"And how will I do that?" Sunil asked. (he wasn't know to think a lot for himself when under stress.) Thinking that this was almost to easy Vinnie told him to simply "Eat. A. Lot."

"So you mean I shall get fat?" Sunil asked. "Yes. That is the same thing as getting big my friend." Vinnie said to him. "If you get bigger then anyone else you will have nothing to fear, and you will ha no problems talking to Pepper." (Vinnie almost thought he should work as some kind of professional encourager, given how good he seemed to be with Sunil.)

Even thought Vinnie had sounded super confident when he said all this Sunil still wasn't sure. He wanted to dare talk with Pepper, but did he really need to change his body so much for that?

What does he choose?
1212311.title: He want's to impress Pepper, and gets trick...

12123111.content:
Trusting his best friend Sunil said "Okay." to Vinnie's idea.

"Awesome. I'll start making it all ready for you." Vinnie said, and walked over to where the food bowls where.

As he did that Sunil looked over at Pepper, and thought to himself that no matter how much he would need to eat, and no matter how big of a tummy ache he would get, he was going to do it for her.

"Okay, I'm finished." Vinnie told Sunil, who came over to see what his friend had planned for him.

What he saw was the Vinnie had filled two bowls with pet food. "Thanks Vinnie, but I think that I will be able to eat more then just two bowls filled with food." Sunil said, sounding a little bit cocky over his own ability.

Vinnie was prepared for that as he said, "I know. And that's why as soon as you are finished with one bowl and goes to the second, I will fill up the first bowl again." Hearing that made Sunil regret a little opening his big mouth.

Looking over at Pepper playing with the other female pets Sunil knew he still wanted to do this, and he decided to start eating.

As he eats the first two portions nothing was a problem for Sunil, it wasn't until he started on his third portion when he started to feel like when he had eaten enough. Still having his eyes on the prize (That was Pepper) Sunil continued pushing his limits. At the fourth bowl his belly started feeling a bit hurtful, on the fifth a small lump was starting to be made on his waist, and after a sixth bowl he now had a smaller potbelly.

Sunil was starting to feel pretty stuffed now, and was clutching his belly with both arms to try and make it feel better. He didn't want to eat anymore, but he also knew that if he stopped he wouldn't have a chance with Pepper either.

So what does he do?
12123111.title: Sunil goes on with Vinnie's plan.

choices: He orders him to continue eating.
121231111.content:
Wanting nothing more then a chance to speak with Pepper Sunil continued eating, despite what his body was thinking of it.

He had already starting to feel the pains, but now he also was starting to have his gut expanding out!

On his seventh food bowl it grew out 3 inches, and after his eight it was now twice as big. (6 inches!)

It both looked and felt like he had a smaller beach ball stuffed inside and inflated inside of him, and he wasn't having much fun with it.

Someone that actually had fun right now was Vinnie, who really had to try his best to keep all his laughter inside of him. He never thought that his friend would actually go so far into his prank, and for each bowl he ate the more fun it became.

At this point Sunil had to make a new break from eating, and he asked Vinnie if he was big enough now and could stop eating.

Looking at him Vinnie did love the image of the super stuffed Sunil, with his HUGE belly, begging him to end this pain he has.

How does Vinnie respond to this?
121231111.title: He keeps eating.

choices: He get's to scared and runs off.
1212311112.content:
"No! If you want Pepper to even look at your direction you need to be even BIGGER!" Vinnie said, and being know to not speak up against others Sunil went back to continue eating more.

At his ninth portion his stomach was starting to hang low from his body, and when it finally touched the ground the Mongoose had cramped in ten portions of Pet Food into himself!

Vinnie had to try his hardest to not burst out laughing (and revealing his prank to Sunil) as he saw his friend make himself into a belly with a small body next to it.

After finishing off the last of the tenth portion Sunil had made up his mind. He was not going to eat anything more, no matter what Vinnie had to say about. He would most likely have his big dome explode if he tried eating anything more, so now he thought this must be enough to impress Pepper.

"So you are finished now?" Vinnie asked, as he saw Sunil not eating anymore.

"Yes I am. I feel like I should be able to make the cute Skunk girl named Pepper be impress on my body now." Sunil said while sounding super confident on himself, but that quickly faded away by him adding the question "She will like this right?" and shaking his belly fat to show what "this" meant.

"Of course she will Sun. In fact ALL the girls will love it!" Vinnie lied, barley able to keep his own laughter hidden under it.

"Vinnie knows best." Sunil thought as he made his way towards Pepper.

But as he was walking he started to feel even more unsure about this thing. It wasn't that he didn't believe Vinnie when he said it would work, it was just his own natural shyness that was stalking him. As he took each step closer, he got more and more scared to do it. He just felt for running away and hide. (Or maybe eat some more before facing her.)

He still wanted nothing more then to talk to her, but would he dare to do it?
1212311112.title: No mercy here.

12123111121.content:
Believing Vinnie's words Sunil made his way towards Pepper, and even thought with each step he felt more and more unsure about it, he just thought about his friend telling him that this body would do the trick and continue walking.

As he was only a few feet away from her, he could see that the Skunk girl was once again not looking at his directions. Giving a slight cough Sunil got her attention.

When she turned around to face him he was prepared to have her be amazed and find him "attractive", but as soon as she saw him all she did was laughing out loud!

"Oh my god! I knew that you where always FULL OF YOURSELF Sunil, but this is ridiculous!" Pepper said, and rolled on the floor laughing hard.

Sunil wanted to go away (as he was hugely embarrassed right now.), but Pepper wasn't going to let the funniest thing she had seen all day escape that easy.

"Oh no you don't. I still got a few jokes left." She said, and then started rambling them. "People has always wonder if Mongooses' actually hibernate, but I think we now have the answer to that question." She said, and patted on his belly a typical "Ba Dum Tsshhh" sound that comedians gets after telling a joke. "How about this one? I've heard you are a Mongoose, but now you should be called a MOONgoose!" Pepper said before slapping the belly again, and laughing at herself. "But I think I shall quit now. I don't want to be PADDING out this thing!" She this time found her joke so funny that she only hit Sunil once on the belly, before falling down on the floor again.

At this point Sunil didn't try to escape anymore, and instead just started crying because of all the jokes he got about his fat belly. As soon as Pepper saw the tears she immediately stopped with her act, as she saw that she had been hurting Sunil's feelings. "Sunil, I-I'm sorry for making you cry. I was just trying to be funny, and it sorta backfired, I guess." She said, while using her tail to whip his tears away.

"I'm sorry for crying. It's just that I thought that you where going to like me more if I was like this." Sunil said, and jiggled his big belly with his paws.

"Why would I like you more then usual if you where looking like this?" Pepper asked confused.

"I was told that you like pets that are "big", and therefore I thought this was the kind of big you meant." Sunil explained.

"And who told you that?" Pepper asked.

"Vinnie..." Sunil said, and first now realised how much pranked he truly was. "Vinnie! He sat this whole thing up for me!" Sunil said upset.

"The gecko guy? Yeah, he truly doesn't get when a joke is being pushed to far." Pepper added, sounding just as angry over the little guy's actions.

"I'm so upset about him right now that I could just, just..." Sunil said, trying to find the right word.

"Get revenge." Pepper added for him.

"Yes!" Sunil said raising his arm, and when he was putting it back he slammed right into his big belly. "Oh, there is still this." He said, looking down at it."

"Do you want to get rid of your extra weight before getting your revenge?" Pepper asked, and Sunil answer to that would be...
12123111121.title: The new source of comedy.

121231111211.content:
"Wait! Don't you think that revenge might be a bit to extreme?" Pepper asked Sunil, but before he could answer her they both heard the sound of laughter.

Looking back they saw Vinnie, laughing hysterical and laying on the floor while tears of joy came out of his eyes.

"On a second thought I think that I can stay behind this whole "revenge" thing with you Sunil." Pepper said, and started moving closer to the laughing gecko, with a rubber chicken in her hand.

"Haha! I can't believe that gullible Sunil actually believed in that story I made up of Pepper liking "Big Pets"!" Vinnie said in-between laughter's.

While Vinnie had his back turned away from the others Pepper gave him one good knock in the back of his head, and knocked him unconscious.

As he was still in a heavy sleep Sunil and Pepper carried the knocked out reptile over to a place where nobody would look. Inside the big Fire Hydrant.

Once in there they also got a chair and some ropes to tie him up. Once he was completely trapped Pepper asked Sunil how he now wanted his "revenge" to go, and Sunil answered by saying that "I have an idea.".

He went out, and came back after a while with a big water bottle that the Pet Shop was selling for hamster cages. (It was pretty huge to them, given their size.) He placed the bottle so close to Vinnie that it got his mouth stuffed with the opening of the bottle. (And given that he is tied up, he can't get it out even if he tried.)

Next thing he does is to get a long hose that he puts one end into a tap in the wall, and the other into the big hamster bottle.

When everything is set and done Sunil turns the tap and let the water flow. Pepper just watches in amazement on the construction her big bellied Mongoose friend has made. As the bottle gets filled with Water it starts to pump it through the opening, and into Vinnie's mouth.

He had given Sunil a big food belly, so now he was giving him a big water belly.

The question is, does Vinnie wake up as the water starts to seep in?
121231111211.title: "Revenge first!"

1212311112111.content:
After only a few moments of his drinking starting Vinnie regain his conscious, and open his eyes. And when he saw just where he was and what was happening, he started to panic a little.

"MHPNS!!!!!" He tried to say, but with the big Hamster Water Bottle end in his mouth he couldn't muster any real words. And as he was forced to continue drinking he looked down, and saw that he already had a water ballooned filled belly as big as Sunil's was after 6 bowls of pet food.

He tried his hardest to break free from the ropes that held him captured, but to no avail.

As he desperately tried to escape he felt a paw on his shoulder, and moving his big eyes around (Since he couldn't move his head.) and that the one standing next to him was Sunil.

"Do you like the tricky situation you are in now?" Sunil asked, and even though Vinnie tried shaking his head as an answer Sunil wasn't actually listening to him. "Since you thought it was so funny to have me eat until I was almost ready to explode, me and Pepper thinks it would only be right to have you get a water inflated belly that is just as big."

"Or maybe even bigger." Pepper added, poking a finger into the taunt Lizards skin.

They then had a good laugh together about Vinnie's unfortunate condition, and then it all got quiet for a while. (With only the sound of the water pouring down the bottle and through Vinnie's body to be heard.)

"So, do you want to take a walk around the Pet Shop together?" Pepper asked Sunil, who in return answered with a simple "Sure."

So they then left the Fire Hydrant, leaving Vinnie alone with his inflation punishment. (At this point his belly was so big that it had grown the rope he was tied with to move over and under it.)

As they made their way on their walk Sunil asked Pepper if Vinnie might actually pop if they leave him like this, and Pepper calmed down his worries saying that if anything would pop it would be the ropes holding him together.

With that Sunil immediately felt more calm, and told Pepper that he had been having some "Feelings for her", and that he thought she would like being with him if he had a bit more bulk on him. Pepper answered by saying that while she did find it a little cute that he now had a belly, she told him that she would still find him very "attractive" no matter what. This made Sunil blush slightly, and he and Pepper hugged each other, knowing that they could always tell each other what they had in their mind without ever being ashamed of it.

(Epilogue)

SNAP!
SNAP!
SNAP!

That was the sound of the ropes bursting as Vinnie's belly finally grew so big that it broke the ropes holding him down. (Just like Pepper had predicted.)

As he was laying on his back now, (gasping for air) Vinnie thought of how it all could end like this for him. "Oh man. I swear that I will NEVER, EVER, try to play pranks on Sunil again!" Vinnie said to himself, before feeling some big rumbles happening inside of him. "Oh, what now?" Vinnie asked, as he felt a big air pressure rush up towards his mouth.

BUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !!!!!!!
1212311112111.title: Vinnie wakes up.
