1221.content: Will she gain weight by herself, by someone else wanting her to, or by cheer accident?
1221.title: Penny Ling

choices: Mrs. Twombly gives her fattening pet-food by misstake.
12213.content: How does she "accidently" start to gain weight?
12213.title: By accident.

choices: Penny Ling eats it, just thinking it's the normal kibble
She's suspicious about it, so she just eats one piece
122131.content:
At the Littlest Pet Shop, things were at their usual. Pepper was performing her newest routine to Sunil, Zoe, and Minka. Vinnie was practicing his dance moves to Penny Ling's ribbon dancing music because he couldn't help himself when music came on. And Russell was reading a massive novel on his favorite bean bag chair.

Blythe was at school, so Mrs. Twombly was watching the pets as usual when Blythe was away.

It was nearing noon, the pets' lunchtime. So she went to get some food for them. He approached the huge kibble bag they always used to feed the pets. But this time it was empty!

"Well, that just won't do! This is the only bad we've used to feed them for two and a half seasons-I mean years! I guess we'll just see if we have any other bags lying around in stock."

She didn't want to take anything that was for the customers because then she'd lose money. There had to be another bag around there somewhere!

When she was just about to give up, the last place she checked was where she found one. In the storage cost they hadn't used in years, there was a small bag that had collected dust.

She checked for an expiration date, but couldn't find one.

"Well, I guess this will tide them over until I go out and buy some more!" She reassured herself.

There was only enough in the bag for one pet. She decided she'd give it to Penny Ling because naturally, as the largest, she'd need more food.

She cut it open and poured the contents into Penny Ling's bowl. Then, she left for the provider to buy more pet food.

But what she didn't see behind the dust on the bag, was that this was extremely fattening kibble.
122131.title: Mrs. Twombly gives her fattening pet-food by mi...

choices: She continues eating the rest of it.
She stops eating, but someone else has watched her and wants her to get bigger.
1221311.content:
Hearing the sound of the food being filled in a bowl immediately got all the pets attention, and they all rushed over as quick as possible.

"Oh dear." Mrs Twombly said as the all the pets where gathering around her feet. This wasn't going to be easy to say. "Listen!" She said, and all the pets stopped to pay attention to her. "We happen to be short on pet food, and there was only enough food to fill the bowl of Penny Ling. You others have to wait while I'm out buying some more." Mrs Twombly said, before taking her purse and leaving the pet shop.

The other pets felt disappointed and irritated that Penny Ling to all the food that was left to herself as they walked away to do other things. Penny Ling know for her kindness and generosity would gladly have shared her food with the others, but the other thing she was known for was that she liked to eat a lot, and that had to do with her having a large appetite. And right now she had a very big hunger inside of her, so all she could think of was to start eating the food that was in her bowl.

As she sat down and shoved the first kibbles into her mouth she felt that the taste was a bit different, but nothing that really bothered her for the moment. She continued eating and could feel as she ate that the kibbles felt more different then the one she was used to. They had a much more "sugar filled" and "fatty" texture to them. Not that she complained, but it was very different from the much more nutritious kibbles she and the other pets where usually feed with.

When she was about halfway through her portion she could strangely feel like she was already very full. Taking a break from eating she looked down and got shocked by what she saw. After only having been eating a half bowl of food her stomach had grown out half a feet in diameter! It was so round and wide that it looked like if she had been eating two full bowls of food. (Which she had done one time in the past.) "That's strange, I usually doesn't get that full that quickly." Penny Ling thought, while stretching out her hand to feel her belly. "But I guess that those kibbles where even more filling then I thought..."

As soon as she had put her hand on her belly she stopped thinking about everything. She had been expecting the skin of her belly to feel hard and taunt because of the food, but what she instead felt was soft and flabby. There wasn't any food inside of her anymore, all of it had been turned into body fat!

This sudden surprise made Penny Ling scream of shock for a short moment, before she covered her own mouth, not wanting to make a scene. Had she seriously gain so much weight from just half a bowl? Looking down she poked her belly, and shaked it around a little to prove that she wasn't making this up. She then looked over at the still half filled food bowl and wondered what to do. If she had gained so much by only eating half of it, she didn't want to know how big she would get if she ate it all. But she was also feeling a little bit hungry still, but was it worth it when it did such strange things to her?

What will she do.
1221311.title: Penny Ling eats it, just thinking it's the ...

12213112.content:
Thinking that what the food does to her is "to weird", Penny Ling decides to leave the rest by her bowl and do other stuff.

But little did she know that hiding behind the big fire post house in the corner was somebody that had seen it all. The pet in question had only been spying on Penny Ling in the first place because he/she had really strong feeling for her, but when the sudden weight gain with the food happen the pet almost flipped out.

The only thing it adored more then Penny Ling was FAT Penny Ling, and the food in her bowl was a quick way to give it what it wanted. Since Penny Ling seemed not interested in eating any more of it, he/she would have to find a way to trick Penny Ling into eating it. It would all be worth it for the sight of the pet's lover getting even more round.

How was this pet planning on feeding Penny Ling the second half of the portion?
12213112.title: She stops eating, but someone else has watched ...

choices: She Over eats and become overweight.
One of the other pets decides to fatten her so she gets laught at.
1222.content: She wants to be the biggest pet comedian.
1222.title: Pepper Clark

choices: Show the other pets her size and weight.
Go on an eating spree across the city.
12221.content:
One fateful day Pepper began overeating to try and become the biggest pet comedian ever seen and of course as luck would have it she came across a hot fudge sundae that was indeed bigger than her or anyone else for that matter.

Soon enough Pepper dove into the hot fudge sundae and began overeating like no tomorrow, as she was eating her weight and size doubled until she finished off the hot fudge sundae and couldn't help but notice her new found size and weight.

Pepper Clark: "Well you do know, i'm huge and fat!" Pepper excitedly said after noticing her new size and weight. "Now that i'm huge and fat I should either show my size and weight for the other pets to see or maybe go on an eating spree across the city" Pepper thought to herself.

Then afterwards she decided to....
12221.title: She Over eats and become overweight.

122212.content:
Pepper decided to go out and try more delicious food to gain some more weight for her goal to become the biggest pet comedian. Currently after the sundae she ate, her body a pretty fair amount of fat. Her legs were thicker and her face was puffier. The largest part of her was her belly. It was as round as a ball. That how she was now. Now it was time to get a little bigger.

Pepper started by walking down the street. She happen to see a hot dog stand. By the look of it, the stand owner wasn't there. So the hot dogs were unattended. Pepper was hungry enough. So she climb up to the top of the cart and open the door revealing several red hot dog on one side and steamed hot dog buns on the other.

"I'm sure they wouldn't mind if I helped myself to a few hot dogs." Pepper said to herself.

She then began to eat some of the hot dogs. She didn't even bother assembling the hot dogs. She just gobbled them down. Dogs and buns. She was eating them as if she was in an hot dog eat contest. Her belly starting getting bigger from each hot dog she ate. Before she knew it, she had eaten all the hot dogs in the cart. Her belly was defientily larger than before. Pepper than got down from the cart and back to the ground. She looked at herself. She admired her roundness and lefted up her belly and dropped it to watch it bounch.

"Heehee. I got quite the belly now." Pepper said.

She was now thinking if she should find more to eat or show the other pets her new size.
122212.title: Go on an eating spree across the city.

1222121.content:
Pepper continued on her eating spree across the city. She decides to got to more small food stands, little diners, and cafes. Pepper started at one cafe and scarfed down some leftover croissants and muffins. They were high in carbs, so in made it easier to gain some weight.

She then goes to a preztel cart and ate a few of those. Gaining more of a belly with the amount she was eating. She would go eat from place to place to eat more and more food from all over.

After a hour, Pepper belly swelled to twice it's size and as round as a beach ball.

"Woah! I'm pretty big for one day." Pepper said to herself. "Should I call it a day and see the others or keep going?"

Pepper decides to....
1222121.title: More eating.

choices: Finish what you started, take a little responsibility. Eat it all, and find more
Not worth it, go home and show the other pets who's the biggest in town
12221211.content:
"Eh, what's the worst that could happen if I were to have just a little more?" Pepper shrugged and smiled, "besides, I'm still a little hungry." She decided she'd go to a convenience store, and see if there was anything good she could manage to get for free.

When she got there, she waddled her way through the automatic doors, she looked around and smiled. There was nobody else in the store, except the guy behind the counter, and he was just sitting there reading a magazine with headphones on. She smiled wider, before looking down at her massive belly, which protruded at least two feet in front of her. It grumbled with a strong hunger. She patted it with a pudgy paw, promising to get it something filling. Of course, she had no money, but stealing food is ok when you're as hungry as she was, right? Right. She waddled over to a big display box full of donuts. She couldn't quite tell how many there were in there, so she decided she'd just count them as she ate them.

One, two, skip a few for the sake of the reader,

Sixth-two, she thought as she rolled onto her back and licked her frosting-covered lips. There were Sixty-two sugary, frosted, cream-filled, delicious donuts in that display case. And now they were all in her huge bloated belly. She glanced over to the behind the counter guy, and yep. Still distracted. Good.

She grunted, and rolled herself up off her back into a standing position, and panted a few times from the effort. She then made her way over to the slushy machine, and put her mouth on the spigot, and turned it on. As she felt the sweet, chilled, sugary liquid run down her throat and into her stomach, she felt it expand slowly as she drank. Filling up like a water balloon. She didnt stop when she got a brainfreeze, and only took her mouth off the spigot when the whole tank of slushy was empty. She sloshed her massive body to the ground, and began to pat and rub her stomach while panting. Her shape could be described as spherical, as her entire body was a big ball of fat with about a two and a half foot radius. Excluding, of course, her big sloshy belly, which protruded three, maybe four feet in front of her now. She was also starting to notice two big squishy fat deposits on her chest, and two more on her backside. Of course, her newfound boobs and butt looked a little small compared to the rest of her. Just to be safe, she looked over to the counter guy and yep, still distracted.

"*huff...puff* Hoo boy," she said. "Im pretty huge right now... And I feel a bit tired out for some reason." She looked around at all the food left uneaten in the store. She bit her lip in consideration, and felt her five chins bunch up as she thought about it.
12221211.title: Get some more food.

choices: Eat him whole, get even fatter!
122212111.content:
Pepper shrugged and smiled to herself. "Well if you're gonna be big, ya better be the biggest!" and with that assurance, she got to work. She placed her large, soft paws on the ground, grunting as she hoisted herself up. She strained under her own weight, lifting one leg and slamming it back down in front of her, her obese nearly spherical body sloshing and wobbling from the force of her stomping foot. Repeating this process, she managed to waddle forwards, her gut gurgling and sloshing all the while, as she made her way up and down the aisles.

She ate everything in the entire store. It was truly a sight to behold, the sloshy slovenly skunk stomping around, stuffing everything she could get her greedy little paws on down her throat. She would swallow up dozens and dozens of candy bars, of each and every variety. Probably more than a hundred, and definitely more bags of chips than that, ripping them open and pouring them into her waiting mouth with gusto. Her bulging stomach groaned as it churned all those calories she chugged down into pounds and pounds of flab, which only served to make her even rounder, and bigger. She chased all the snacks down with a ton of liters of soda and energy drinks, And all the coffee she could get out of the coffee machine. Good thing too, she needed the energy from the caffein to keep lugging her fatty frame around, as it continued to grow with every indulgent gluttonous bite as she gorged and gorged. As she stomped her way to the last aisle, her body having grown enormously as she had started to sweat from the effort of moving her huge mass, she found to her delight that this was the freezer aisle. Her eyes widened with delight as she licked her lips eagerly, tasting some of the crumbs and chocolate left over from her messy eating, She had become so round that she could barely bend over, but for ice cream she managed, her fat sausage fingers pulling open the door of the freezer. She shoveled cartons of ice cream of every flavor along with like fifty cakes into her muzzle, slurping and snorting all throughout her binge, so wrapped up in her eating that she barely even noticed when she kept growing, and growing, and grew so big that her gigantic fat ass bumped into the shelf behind her. She cringed as she heard the crashing noise of every shelf behind her falling over, crashing into the next one, like a lot of big dominos, so loud it even drowned out the sounds of her own eating. She quickly slurped down the last cake, and wobbled clumsily up to a standing position. She slowly, laboriously turned around, stomping one big fat foot at a time, until she could see the damage. Twenty shelves, once all lined up, now all on the floor.

All....empty.

Pepper smirked, rubbing her gargantuan body and letting out a loud, satisfied belch. "Talk about prop comedy- This new gimmick's a knockout! It'll have everyone on the floor! Man- I should write that down." She mused to herself- before remembering something. She turned to look at the counter, her seven chins and soccer ball sized cheeks jiggling from the speed of her head turning. But no, that guy was still just sitting there, back turned, reading with headphones. Now this was getting silly- there's no way he didn't hear that. Pepper stomped over to him, raising her big fattened up footpaws and slamming them on the ground, sloshing her huge ball shaped body side to side as she slowly waddled forwards. She was about as big as a smartcar, except her body was a big orb- just noticeably wider than she was tall, so packed full of food that she looked inflated, aside from some notable outliers which made it clear that it was all just fat, like her soft wobbling chest or bouncing love handles and massive rump, though they were all rounded and bulging in their own right, so they fit cleanly onto her sphere like form. Her footpaws hand grown fatter too, to the point where all of her toes looked like big soft baseballs, and her soles were sweating as much as her armpits, butt crack, and all her folds. Even for a skunk, her body odor was bad- In eating so much and becoming so fat, she'd totally let herself go and had also become a huge slob. Not that she minded- if anything it just gave her more stage presence. Besides, flatulent humor is always funny.

She approached the guy at the counter- and he still ignored her! If he didn't hear her, or smell her by now, he should've at least seen her massive rounded dome of a shadow looming over him. That's when she realized why he was so unresponsive.

"Sleeping on the job, huh?" she laughed to herself, shaking her head with a smirk. She wobbled and stomped her way into a closer position- confirming that yes, he was in fact asleep. "Now that's some bad work ethic- And look where it got him, his whole stock got eaten!" Pepper licked her lips. She was so big now, she felt like the only things about her that didn't get fatter were her eyes, nose, mouth, ears, and tail. And those almost looked out of place now, a small normal sized skunk face buried in such huge cheeks and so many sweet sweet chins. Not to mention her tiny little tail next to those gigantic butt cheeks. She looked back at the sleeping guy, smirking to herself. Someone'd have to punish him for doing such a bad job of scaring away thieves...
122212111.title: Empty the shelves!

1223.content: How about the artistic spider monkey Minka. Or our Diva dog Zoe Trent. Or more.
1223.title: How about those?

choices: She gets into an eating flow and wants to see how far she can go.
12231.content: What would make the monkey girl start packing on the pounds?
12231.title: Minka mark

choices: She want to have a big tummy so she can create art on it.
122312.content: What other reason could she have?
122312.title: Some other reasons.

choices: The fat had been spreading to the rest of her body.
Her Pot Belly had been shrunken down while sleeping.
1223121.content:
Minka was having a bit of an "Art-Struggle". No matter what she did or tried to do, she wasn't making any kind progress with her art making. In fact, she wasn't making any art at all. Looking at the empty canvas in front of her she thought of the time Sunil had challenged her in a painting challenge, and had ended up with nothing painted at all.

"I'm not turning into Sunil now, right? I can't imagine myself ending up having no more inspiration left!" Minka though, having a small panic attack inside her head.

Just as she thought of either put something on the canvas or completely give up, Mrs. Twmobly called "Lunch Time all pets!". Suddenly hearing a loud growling sound coming from her stomach Minka realized that she was so busy trying to find her inspiration, that she had forgot to even have something to eat.

Thinking that she probably would think better if she got some food inside herself, Minka decided to take a break and join the other pets for lunch.

While all the other pets had their bowls filled with the usual pet food, Minka found her to be the only one without any. "Huh, what?" Minka asked, and turned to Mrs. Twombly for answers.

"Oh Hello little Minka." Mrs. Twombly said as Minka walked up to her. "You are probably wondering where your food is, right?" She asked the little monkey, that simply nodded back to her. "Well you see, I actually got a special thing in the deliverance today..." She said, and turned around to get something for Minka. "And I think you will like this." She said, and handed over a bunch of bananas to her.

If there was anything Minka loved to eat it was bananas, and Mrs. Twmobly knew it. So when she happen to get a bunch of 10 bananas, she knew the little primate would like it. Getting a hold of the bananas Minka hugged it like it was a stuffed teddy bear, and Twombly couldn't help but smile at the sight. "Your welcomed, my little friend." She said, before leaving her to eat in peace.

Wasting no time to start Minka immediately started to scale one of them, and fill her mouth with it. Then she chewed a few times, and swallowed the whole contest down. It took two of these routines to take down one banana. After having only 3 she could already feel how it was starting to feel her up, but she wasn't done yet!

Being pretty rare for her to get such treats to eat, Minka wanted to take them all in. No matter how stuffed she would end up.

For each banana she ate up she could feel how her midsection was expanding out, and once she was all done she felt like she was carrying a whole lot of baby monkeys. (And she also looked like she was carrying little ones.)

Still knowing she had "trying to make art" to go back to, Minka took and carried her big monkey belly back to her art corner. Once there she dipped a paintbrush and was about to try drawing something when she fell backwards by her huge weight, and got the brush right on her belly. As she grabbed the pencil and dragged it of her body, she got up and looked in the mirror how much damage it had done. That's when she saw it.

The paint pattern on her belly looked like the start of a real art piece! And using it on her own expanded body meant even more room for her to paint then what any of the flat canvas could give. It looked more beautiful then anything else she had done before, and she needed to try to do more.

Finding her true inspiration now Minka immediately started drawing even more things on her food filled belly. Once she had covered every inch of her well rounded middle with paint Minka had one of the pets take pictures of her with Blythe's phone. (She had asked Blythe for permission first of course.) Once the picture was taken she washed all the paint of her, just so she could draw something else on it, that she could take a picture of, and so on, and so on.

After doing this for while Mink started to get very tired, and decided to take a "quick rest". This quick rest turned out to become several hours of sleeping, and when she finally woke up she found out that...
1223121.title: She want to have a big tummy so she can create ...

choices: Eat even more, and make her stomah even bigger.
Use Russell as her new art belly.
12231212.content:
When she finally woke up she found out that her big belly as almost gone!

"Wait, what?!" Minka asked shocked, and felt her hands on her limited flab. "What happen to my huge belly?" She asked to pretty much no one, but someone did answer.

"I could tell you what happen." A certain hedgehog said, and walked up to her.

"You know where my recently HUGE belly has disappeared?" Minka asked, while lifting her fat flab to see if it was hiding under it.

"Actually, Minka..." Russell said, before pausing slightly at the sight of Minka trying to get her face in under her belly skin. "Your extra food storage has not disappeared as you think, but simply...How's the best word to describe it? Reallocated." Russell tried to explain.

"Reallocated?" Minka asked confused.

"Yes. Doing so much paint working all day, and not having anything else to eat while doing it has lead you to burn almost all of those extra calories you consumed." Russell explained, and he could see that Minka understood it, but didn't like what she heard.

Holding her small fat lump in her paws and staring at it, she suddenly gets an idea of how to regain (literally) it all.

"But isn't it dinner soon? Maybe I could eat some more there?" Minka asked hopefully.

"Well, about that..." Russell said, and looked slightly uncomfortable about what he was about to say. "The dinner was..." Russell said, and saw how Minka was looking at him with her full attention. "About an hour ago." He finally said.

"What?!" Minka asked shocked. "But why didn't you (or anybody else) wake me up?"

"I tried to do it, but you where sleeping so heavily that nothing made you even flinch." Russell explained. "Plus..." Russell said, sounding even more uncomfortable then before.
"What?" Minka asked, wondering what more could have happen while she was asleep.

"Mrs. Twombly did fill your bowl with pet food just like with everyone else, but I must have been more hungry then I thought, cause once I was done with my bowl I was still hungry and..." Russell said, and paused once again.

"And...?" Minka said, in a tone that sounded like she was getting where this was heading.

"And I ate up your portion as well." Russell said, and was looking down on the floor in shame.

Looking at Russell Minka could see that he actually looked a bit more chubbier then he usually did, so she knew he was telling the truth.

"Could you ever forget me for letting my own stomach tell me what to do?" Russell asked, and after thinking for a short time Minka said "I can't really get upset on a friend like you, Russell. So yes, I forgive you for eating my food while I was sleeping."

"Oh thank you so much Minka. You really let a huge weight of my back." Russell said, and patted is his well feed belly before walking away.

As he did an idea formed inside Minka's head, and that idea was.
12231212.title: Her Pot Belly had been shrunken down while slee...

choices: No time for that. Art needed to be made!

But the question was "Should she ask for permission from him first?"

1223121222.content:
Knowing that she was an artist who always took her art before anything else, Minka couldn't let a chance like Russell's big belly pass her by. She had to make something with it! (No matter what Russell himself thought about it.)

So when Russell wasn't looking Minka picked up a hard ball toy for cats, and tossed it right onto Russell's head, knocking him unconscious.

"Perfect hit." Minka said, while having a bit of an evil smile on her face.

When Russell woke up he found out that he was in a dark place, and tied to a small chair. But not only that. He was only having his arms tied around his back and his legs tied next to the chair's legs, leaving his belly completely bare.

"Where am I? And who has done this to me?" Russell asked sacred, and almost immediately a certain someone sneaked up next to him and whispered in his ear "I did it."

"Ahh!" Russell screamed by surprise, as Minka got herself in front of him with a paint brush in her hand. "Listen Minka, if this is for me eating your dinner portion I'm sorry! I can give you both my lunch AND dinner tomorrow if you let me go." Russell plead, but Minka was not taking his offer.

"Sorry Russell. It's nothing personal, just art." Minka said, and started to get closer to him with her brush. She was just about to put her first draw, when she thought she heard something.
1223121222.title: No time for that. Art needed to be made!

122312122221.content:
"Why is there a sheet covering the fire hydrant?" Penny Ling asked as she got inside, and that's when she saw the scene of Minka and Russell in front of her. "Am I interrupting something?" She asked carefully.

"Not at all." Minka said calmly, like there was nothing wrong with what she was doing. "Russell is just helping me with some of my arts."

"He is?" Penny Ling said happy.

"I am?!" Russell said surprised.

"Say Penny Ling. Would you like to also help and be a part of my creations?" Minka asked. "Just like with Russell you do have the right shapes for it."

"Oh yes. Yes! I would love that!" Penny Ling said, and rushed over excitingly to Minka.

"Just make me into something great!" Penny Ling said, and open up her arms to have her belly be more open to Minka.

Not wasting a moment Minka took and started to make something on the panda's belly. After only making a few simple draws Minka told her that she was finished, and suggested for Penny Ling to look over at a small mirror to see the result. (There was also a small mirror that Minka had put up, so that both she and her "models" could see the result.)

Looking in the mirror Penny Ling loved what she saw. She had gotten a nice little pink could painted on the middle of her white belly. "I look just like one of those Be Aware Bears on TV!" Penny Ling said, with glee.

"And Penny Ling, what is it those bears usually do in each episode?" Minka asked playfully, knowing full well what the panda girl would do now.

"Aware Bear Stare!" Penny Ling shouted, and pretend that her stomach was shooting out beams formed like the cloud on her.

"That was fun." Penny Ling said, sounding more happy then she had ever been before. "Can I do anymore things like this?" She asked.

"Could you just get over here first before we do that?" Minka asked, and lead Penny Ling over to Blythe's camera. (She had gotten permission from her to borrow it from her.) "Just stand here and look pretty, and I will take an image to immortalise it." Minka said, and got behind the camera.

"Oh, I can always look pretty." Penny Ling said, and looked just as cute as she always would. (While also making sure that her painted belly got the biggest focus for the image.) Once the image was taken Minka took and washed the paint of Penny Ling, and then turned away to prepare her equipment.

While she was doing that something was happening behind her back, but what?

122332211.content:
It was another day in Littlest Pet Shop. Except the only pets in were the girls. Russell, Vinnie and Sunil were not in yet. Which means it was just the girls. Currently they were just doing their usual girl talk. It was getting around lunch time so they decide to get some of the pet kibble.

"Well, the boys aren't here. You girls want to have some kibble?" Pepper asked them.
"Sure. You know how the boys can be." Penny said.
"Yeah! They tend eat most of the kibble themselves. Leaving us with the small amount." Minka said.
"At least I'm able to keep my figure because of it." Zoe said.
"Come on, Zoe. Live a little." Pepper said to her friend.
"Fine. Maybe a little extra wouldn't hurt." Zoe said.

The four girls went to the pet food dispensers and drop the food into their bowls. It was a regular amount of kibble in each bowl. They each ate at their own pace, but they all still lead to empty bowls. Afterward, Penny decided to have another bowl.

"Well....we do have plenty more." Penny said.
"Yeah and it's not like the boys will have much." Pepper said.
"If you say so...." Said Zoe unsure.

The girls then had a second bowl of pet food each, since they all could still eat. They still ate the same amount like last time and still at the same pace. After their second bowl, the girls were all starting to feel a little full.

"Ok. I think that's enough for today." Zoe said. "Don't want to lose my figure."
"That figures." Pepper said.
"What does that mean?" Zoe said.
"You are so worry that if you eat to much, you lose your Zoe-ness."
"Zoe-ness?" Zoe shouted.
"Oh no." Minka said.
"Pepper, please don't." Penny said.
"I'll still be Zoe even if I was twice the size I am now." Zoe said.
"Then a few more bowls should hurt." Pepper said.
"I...guess you're right." Zoe admitted.
"I wouldn't mind having another bowl." Penny said.
"I'm kinda full, but I don't want to be left out." Minka said.
"Alright girls, let's have some more." Pepper said.

So the girls decide to have some more bowls of pet food.
122332211.title: The girls' big gain

1223322111.content:
After eating five more bowls of kibble, all the girls decided to stop due to the fact of being waaaay too full for any more. The girls belly were now a bit bigger from all the eating.

"Urrrk! So full!" Pepper said. "I think we had a bit too much."
"You think?" Zoe said.
"My belly feels like a tight drum." Minka said.
"Mine too." Penny said.

All four of the girls layed down to the ground with their bellies out. As they lay their, Blythe came in.

"Hey pets! What's.....WHAT THE HUH?" Blythe shout as she notices the pets.
"Hey Blythe." Said the girls as they were still full.
"What happen to you girls?" Blythe asked.
"We...kinda of went overboard with the pet food." Penny said.
"By four or five extra bowls." Pepper said.
"I can tell." Blythe said. "Anyway, I'm her to tell you that Russell, Vinnie, and Sunil have all gotten sick. So they won't be here for the next few days."
"So....they not coming?" Minka said.
"Ugh! So we didn't need to eat that much food." Zoe said.
"Well, I hope you girls feel better." Blythe said as she left the pet.

So, Blythe left the girls to rest.

"So the boys aren't gonna be here few the next few days." Pepper said.
"What should we do?" Penny said.
"We can still have girl time." Minka said.
"We can lose this extra weight." Zoe said.
"Or....." Pepper said.
"Or...." Said Zoe, Penny and Minka said.
"Or we can do the same thing again." Pepper said.
"Seriously?" Zoe protested "Haven't we had enough?"
"Come on. It's not like we can't handle more. It will be fun to have some extra weight." Pepper said.
"It could be fun." Penny said.
"I guess don't mind." Minka said.
"......Fine. But this is just because I don't want to be left out." Zoe said.

So the girls decide to eat more for the next couple of days.

1231121.title: They make a bunch of bets with each other.

12311212.content:
Sunil and Vinnie where bored. Things had been going slowly today, and outside it was raining so Blythe couldn't take them out for a walk. (Not that she could any way since she was in school.) And while the other pets seemed to have funny things to do, these two dudes where just hanging alone. It wasn't until an idea popped inside Vinnie's mind when things started to get interesting. He loved his idea so much that he just had to tell Sunil immediately.

"Sunil!" He said excited. "What is it?" Sunil asked, sounding as bored as can be. "I know something really funny we can do." Vinnie said. "And what's that?" Sunil asked, sounding more interested this time. "We should do a series of small challenges against each other..." Vinnie started. "Yes?" Sunil asked curiously. "And the one that loses a challenge..." "Yes?!" Sunil asked really excited now. "Have to eat an extra bowl of their pet food!" Vinnie finished.

He expected to hear Sunil say something like "You are a genius Vinnie!", but all he got was a confused "What?". "Don't you understand?" Vinnie asked Sunil, who only responded by shaking his head from side from side. "The looser...Has to eat...An extra bowl...of food." Vinnie said, trying to be as clear as possible when saying it. "But what's the punishment in that?" Sunil asked, "If anything all it would do it to pack on a few extra pounds on our frames." "EXACTLY!" Sunil said loudly, almost making Sunil fall over by surprise. "So you're saying that it's either the honour of winning," Sunil started, "or getting fat? Yes." Vinnie finished.

"I still don't get what's the point of it." Sunil said, "And I don't think I want to be a part of it." He started walking away until he heard Vinnie say. "In that case I win on walk-over. Chicken." That made Sunil stop dead in his tracks. He really didn't like when somebody called him "chicken". Just as Vinnie wanted Sunil was walking back to him, and first when he was up close face to face to him he said "Bring. It. On."

"Let me se if I had understand this now." Sunil said. "We both do a challenge, where the one lose has to eat an extra portion of their regular food portion, and then directly after that one has to choose the new challenge both pets has to do?" "That about right." Vinnie said. "Can the one how has to eat take a moment to rest before the next game?" Sunil asked. "Nope. No resting in his hardcore fight." Vinnie said, making Sunil have some doubts that he quickly tossed aside. "Then so it will be." Sunil said.

"Since you got the idea for this, I'll let you pick first challenge." Sunil said to Vinnie, who started immediately to think out something good.

So what will their first challenge be?
12311212.title: The loser has to get fat each time.

123112121.content:
"A burp contest!" Vinnie finally said. "A burp contest?" Sunil said a bit surprised. "Yeah. One burp. One chance. If you blew it, you lose. Simple as that." Vinnie said, trying to make it sound like a really awesome thing.

"I only got one question." Sunil said. "And what's that?" Vinnie asked. "Is it the one burping loudest, or the one hold his burp out for longest that win?" Sunil asked. "Loudest. When it comes to burps, the volume is always the most important. You can easily hold out a burp longer the small you make the sound, so the louder the better." Vinnie said, sounding like he was an expert on how burps and competing with them works.

"One last question." Sunil said. "Oh, what now?" Vinnie asked, starting to get a bit annoyed over Sunil asking so many questions. "How are we suppose to make that loud burps? It's not like I can make myself do it on demand." Sunil asked. "No problems bro. I just so happen to have exactly what we need to fix it right here." Vinnie said as he dragged Sunil with him to another room.

"And voila!" Vinnie said as he unwrapped a drape that was covering something big. Under it Sunil saw two big bottles of soda. Each one carrying half a gallon of its bubbly consistence. "Have you been keeping those hidden for a long time?" Sunil asked. "I planned on using them when we where having a horror movie marathon night, but I think they will come to good use now." Vinnie said. Sunil walked over and placed his hand on one of the big bottles. "And how much of these are we suppose to drink? Are we going to share one half each from the same bottle?" Sunil asked. "Nope." Vinnie simply answered. "You can't seriously mean that we are suppose to chug down a bottle each of soda?!" Sunil said, to which Vinnie simply said "Yup."

"Listen. I can try to drink at least half of what's in it, but you can't really believe that our bodies can store it all?" Sunil asked, while Vinnie was making his bottle fall over so he could easier drink from it, plus the pressure it was building up inside would make it quicker for him to drink it. "Suit yourself, if you don't want to really win it's your choice." Vinnie said before knocking the capsule of the bottle, and starting taking in all the soda. Once again Sunil had a hard time being called a quiter by Vinnie so he quickly tipped over his own bottle, knocked of the cap on it, and started to take in the soda as well.

Even thought if Vinnie or Sunil would ha wanted to quit right there, they couldn't. The sheer force of the soda pushing itself down their throat, made them forced to stand there and drink until it was all gone.

Once the soda stopped coming Sunil stepped back to get some free space to breath, and started to noticed a "slosh" kind of sound coming from him. Looking down he saw that he was now carrying a large water balloon for a belly. It stood out about half a feet, and it felt like he was a part of a waterbed, with it jiggling with his every movement. Looking over at Vinnie he saw how the gecko was trying to get every single drop of soda from his bottle into him. It wasn't until he literally licked the top of the bottles neck cleaned when he decided to join Sunil.

"And now what?" Sunil asked, while putting his hands on his soda filled belly. "What do we do with this?" "What do we do? We create one heck of a burp with this." Vinnie said, and shake his own inflated middle. "And how are we suppose to do that? "Sunil asked. "We need to do a lot of exercise to build it up inside. To make the soda a part of our system, and lose all the extra fluid inside." Vinnie explained. "And what kind of exercise do you suggest?" Sunil asked. "I don't know what you will do, but I'm going for something like...this!" Vinnie said and started doing what looked like a rumba dance.

Sunil got all lost in how Vinnie's big round stomach moved by the dance. How is swinged from side to side, how it was all shaking like a massage chair by Vinnie's moves, and how it seemed to shrink a little by all the sweat Vinnie got out of his dancing. Sunil pretty quickly snapped out of it, knowing that if he just stood there Vinnie would win for sure. So he started too to try and do the same thing Vinnie did, but since he wasn't a self trained dancer like Vinnie he just focused on moving his belly a lot. He even used his hands to grab and shake it, trying to move it as quickly as possible.

Vinnie speed up the moves to swing his belly around, and Sunil did his best at shaking his own like mad. It didn't take long for the pressure to build up inside both of them, but it was Vinnie how got his one starting first. Releasing a huge sound burp that made the whole room shake a bit, and could even be heard by the other pets in the other room. It only lasted for ten seconds, but it was enough to leave its mark.

Looking over Vinnie, could see that Sunil still hadn't got his burp started, and that was putting even more pressure on him to do better then Vinnie. It wasn't going to be easy, since Vinnie's burp almost seemed to be able to break glass. But he was still going to give his best, since he never gives up.

Finally he could feel something click inside of him, and he could feel the great pressure inside rise up and travel towards his mouth. With almost no time to prepare himself Sunil gave out his try in the burp contest.

But is it enough to beat Vinnie?
123112121.title: Biggest Burp contest.

choices: A stand up competition. (With Pepper helping to judge.)
1231121211.content:
Sunil's burp started promising, reaching really high levels of volume as it went on. Things started to shake a little, and the sound of it started to hurt Vinnie's ears. Still both of these things happen as well when Vinnie had his go at it, making it very hard to distinct who had the loudest one.

Sunil's burp was getting louder and louder until suddenly the sound...disappeared! Must to Vinnie's surprise he took his hands of his ears to see that while Sunil looked like he was still giving away his burp no sound seemed to come out.

This went on for a short while before even Sunil's burp came to an end. "What happen?" Vinnie asked. "I don't know. I gave my all, and still no sound came out." Sunil said. "Well, I guess that make it pretty obvious who won then." Vinnie said cocky. "I guess so." Sunil said disappointed over himself, and he was about to go and have himself a punishing extra portion from his bowl when the other pets arrived into the room.

"What's going on in here?" Russell asked as they walked in. "Oh, we're just having a little burp-off between us guys." Vinnie said casually. "So that was the strange sound we heard coming from this room." Penny Ling said. "Wait you all heard Vinnie burp from the other room and with closed doors?" Sunil asked, surprised that Vinnie managed to make his that loud. "Yes. It. Was." Vinnie said, loving to rub it into Sunil's face. "I made the one that was that loud, and Sunil didn't even manage to make a sound with his." "Oh, but he did." Zoe said. "What?" Both Vinnie and Sunil asked surprised. "Zoe is right. While we all clearly heard your burp Sunil, Zoe started to shout in pain of something high volume bothering her ears. It seems that Sunil managed to burp so loudly that it reaches supersonic levels " Russell explained. "And I'm the living proof that Russell is not making this up." Zoe added.

"So your saying that Sunil actually managed to be louder then me?" Vinnie asked shocked. "It seems so yeah." Russell simply answered. "Vinnie felt really stupid now, bragging so much to Sunil over him beating him, and now it turns out Sunil is the one who beat him.

"Say, are you not feeling a little hungry Vinnie?" Sunil teased, really loving how the tables had turned for Sunil. "What does he mean? Didn't we have lunch just recently?" Minka asked. "It's a part of the game that the loser of each challenge has to eat an extra bowl full of their own pet food." Vinnie said. "Wait a minute, did you say each challenge? Is there more then one?" Russell asked confused. "Oh yes! And if Vinnie loses again he's forced to eat another bowl of food immediately." Sunil said, grinning over the thought of Vinnie losing several challenges in a row, making pretty much a blob of himself. "Can't he just say no?" Penny Ling asked. "If he do he loses the whole game." Sunil said.

"So let me see if I get this straight." Russell said. "You two compete in a bunch of challenges where the loser of each one will be force to eat a whole food bowl full of the representative own pet food, and the whole thing will go one until one of you two can't stuff your bodies anymore?" "Pretty much, yeah." Vinnie and Sunil both said. "That's probably the most un-intellectual and the most nonsensical thing I have ever heard. Plus it's a good waste on pet food." Russell said. "Yeah...Can I be in the audience?" Pepper asked. "What?!" All the three male pets said surprised. "I think it would be really fun to see how this ends." She said. "I would like to see how wins as well." Penny Ling added. "I myself would prefer to see two hunky men fight for a beautiful girl's hand, but seeing two boys stuff each other until one gives up could work to." Zoe added. "And Russell could be the referee." Minka said, which came as a surprise to Russell. "ME?" He asked at first, but then said "Well I guess being in charge of making sure that all the rules in these games are being followed correctly seems like the most fitting position for me to have." "Dude. How did this little thing that was only about us doing some fun, now involve every single one of the other pets?" Vinnie asked Sunil, who only could shrug his shoulders as a response.

"So what happens now?" Vinnie asked. "I think you where about to go and eat your punishment." Sunil answered. "Oh yeah, I forgot that for a moment." Vinnie said, before noticing all the other pets putting all their focus on him and Sunil. "So I guess I should do it now." Vinnie said, as he started to walk over to his food bowl with all the other pets following him. Once there Russell started to order Minka and Penny Ling to refill Vinnie's food bowl, he even took and measured with ruler to make sure it was just around the edge of the bowl. Once everything was done he stepped back and let Vinnie make his way to his bowl. It felt really weird having everyone staring at him while eating, but he couldn't pull out now so he started to eat.

At first things didn't seem so bad. He always love to eat, and he felt he had a little room left inside since the lunch. It wasn't until he was halfway through when he started to feel full for real. His eating pace got slower, and it really started to feel like his stomach was starting to run out of room. Still he continued eating, as it was a part of the game. As he was eating he could hear how at first Minka and then the other girls and Russell started to do a chant for him. "eat, eat, eat," they all said in a way to show their support to him, something he gladly took in.

Finally he had managed to finish his bowl, and he had to sit down to fully take in what had happen. His stomach now stood out four inches, and felt as full as ever. If there was one good thing about it, it was that the soda from earlier and the dry and hard pet food from now was mixing together nicely inside of him. Making it easier and quicker for it to digest, and some of it was already starting to become fat.

"Hey! Remember how you said no breaks in-between?" Sunil said to Vinnie, who was stroking his well filled belly. "Since you lost you get to choose again what the next challenge will be, so what will it be?" He asked.

Vinnie really didn't want to force down another portion of food inside himself again so soon, so he needed to make sure to pick something that he definitely would win.

After some thoughts Vinnie decided to choose...
1231121211.title: A burp above most pets hearings.

12311212112.content:
"A stand up competition! I'm hilarious" Vinnie said, still smug as ever.

"Oh yes!" Pepper exclaimed, "Russell, can I help judge this please!!!!!!"

"I don't see why not. Your knowledge in the craft will help me significantly in my decision" Russell agreed.

"Hoho, yeah! You've got ten minutes to write some material. Go!" Pepper started them off.

Sunil, not one for being timed, panicked for one of those minutes before he finally calmed down and started to think rationally about this. What did he notice around the pet shop that was odd or amusing to him?

Meanwhile, Vinnie was coming up with joke after joke after joke. And about eight minutes in, he looked like he was practicing some sort of dance for his act.

Russell, stopwatch in hand, gave it a little 'click.' "Time is up!" Russell called out.

"Who should go first?" Penny Ling asked, while preparing herself a seat on the ground to watch the show.

"Let's flip a coin" Russell said.

"There are coins up in Blythe's room" Sunil suggested.

"OOOOR we could use the one I have!" Minka said excitedly, pulling a coin out from behind her back.

"I'm scared to ask, but...why?" Pepper inquiried.

"I found this on the sidewalk when we went to the park and I like shiny things so I picked it up and looked at it and played with it and just saw how shiny it was and-"

"We get it!" all of the pets said in unison.

"Ugh, whatever" she shrugged it off, tossing the coin to Russell.

"Thank you, Minka" he thanked her politely. He then asked the two contestants which side of the coin they wanted.

"I will take heads because I am the one with the brain rather than Vinnie" Sunil said, taking smack to Vinnie.

"Oh, ok. I see. I guess I'm tails then" Vinnie responded.

Russel flipped the coin. Heads.

"Who goes first, Rusty?" Vinnie asked.

"Sunil. And you know I hate it when you call me Rusty!"

"Whatever, Rusty" Vinnie rubbed it in.

Russell shook it off, only knowing that if he got angry again, it would only egg him on.

"Take the stage, Sunil! Can't wait to see what you've come up with" Pepper said encouragingly.

She placed a microphone next to him and gave him a thumbs up.

"So, um, hi." Sunil started. "Well, I guess I'll get right to it. Um. You guys know how Blythe bakes cakes right? Oh, haha, that rhymed. Well, anyways, I saw that on her apron, there's a huge pocket for placing things on her torso. And may I ask, what is the purpose of that? If you put anything in it, you'll either have too dirty of hands to pull it back out, or it will just rub up against your face! What an I supposed to do? Put my salmonella laden spatula in there so it can coat my face with raw germs?"

Sunil actually got a pretty big laugh from that joke. He gained more and more confidence as he went on, with more and more observations that he made funny!

As he made his way off the stage, Vinnie followed him as overconfident as usual.

"Why did the chicken cross the road?" Vinnie paused, waiting for someone to ask. Realizing nobody would, he kept going. "He didn't! His brother crossed the road!"

There was a moment of dead silence before the crowd laughed hysterically. Sunil was at a loss for words. They laughed at THAT?

"That joke was so bad that we laughed at your failure!" Pepper said through chuckles. That's a form of comedy!

Vinnie kept going on like that, with each terrible joke being laughed AT rather than actually being funny. Then he closed it with a dance and him falling right on his stomach. Which hurt really badly because his overstuffed stomach was not happy to be compressed against the floor.

"And that concludes our little comedy competition" Russell said, putting the microphone away with the rest of Pepper's things.

"So, Pepper, who won?" Penny Ling asked.

"Well, Sunil's observations were interesting and dead on about how funny the world can be. A lot of intellectually and thought went into that. Good job." Pepper then turned face Vinnie. "And you were just so bad that we laughed. And your physical comedy was spot-on too! The winner is...
12311212112.title: A stand up competition. (With Pepper helping to...

choices: An art challenge. (With Minka guess judging.)
123112121121.content:
"Sunil!" Pepper said.

"Yes!" Sunil shouted for his victory, while Vinnie felt absolutely defeated.

"In the end I went after the one who would do best at a real comedy club, and while we laughed at you a lot to Vinnie I think we did it mostly cause we're friends. If you where to perform your material I don't think they would have liked anything...except for the belly flop, they would have loved that." Pepper said, to comfort Vinnie.

"And I think our dear friend Vinnie will be able to do that even better soon because he's up to eat again." Sunil said mockingly.

"You just had to remind me about that?" Vinnie said, holding his stomach that was still a bit upset over the contact with the floor earlier.

"That is the best part of it all, isn't it?" Sunil said, patting Vinnie gently on his stomach.

"Just you wait! Once I'm done eating you will get it!" The gecko said, before storming of towards the food bowl.

He asked for the others to quickly fill up his bowl so he could get it done quicker. When it was all set and done he started to eat, and with great speed to. Being so furious over Sunil's taunting's Vinnie was so determined to win the next challenge that he didn't even seemed to notice how ridiculously fast his stomach was bulging out because of his fast eating. It wasn't until he was almost done and had to bend down into the bowl to reach it when the pains hit him. By using his long lizard tongue he managed to grab the last couple of food bits, before falling back clenching his now four time bigger then normal stomach.

"You can still give up if the pains are to strong." Russell said to Vinnie, who just said "No! I'm still in!"

"Fine then. Since you lost the previous challenge you get to choose the next one." Russell said.

Knowing how hard it was to do most things with his very large middle Vinnie knew he had to choose something that would require little effort and something that he was good at.

After thinking for a moment he choose...
123112121121.title: Sunil!

1231121211211.content:
"An art making challenge." Vinnie finally said.

Everyone of the other pets was very surprised by what Vinnie choose. They never saw him as the "artsy" type.

"An art making challenge?" Russell said surprised. "I myself wouldn't call myself an expert per se, but I think I know someone here that would be perfect for the job as guess judge for this."

"And that person is Zoe." Minka said suddenly.

"Actually I though about having you as the guest judge." Russell told the monkey girl. who just looked at him strangely and said "But Zoe know everything there is about art, and isn't fashion art to you?" in an almost upset tone.

"What? No! I'm not saying that! But I think that when Vinnie said art he meant painting art." Russell said, trying to explain.

"OOOHHH, that kind of art...Okay I can help judge on that." Minka said, finally accepting her role as guest judge.

"Finally." Russell said, before going of with Mink for a second to talk out the rules for it.

While they did that Vinnie struggled to get up on his two feet again. Having been eating two times in a row now really made it difficult for him to not have his stomach taking complete control over him. He really felt he needed to win this, or he wouldn't even want to think about how big he would be after three meals.

After he manages to finally get up Russell and Minka returned to tell the rules. "The rules are this. Both of you will each have half an hour to make a real piece of art for us. You will both have the same amount of paint and cloth to work with, and there's nobody that can help you in any way during the challenge." Russell started, sounding as professional as he could. "After the half hour is gone we will both take a closer look at your final paintings, and after our own taste and judgement decided who is the winner." Minka added, trying mimic Russell's way of standing and talking when he said his part.

The other pets prepared the two competitors stations with paint, brushes, and an easel with cloths to paint on. Sunil and Vinnie both made themselves ready and was standing next to their stations as Russell and Minka told them to start.

As they started both of them had plan thought out for it. Sunil was planning on making something of traditional kind from his home country India, while Vinnie was trying to get that raw and gritty look from spray-painted urban city walls on his.

As they where painting Minka and Russell took the time to walk around them, and get a closer look on how they both where working. Looking over at Sunil they saw that he was working in a calm pace, and the movements in his painting seemed to be with much confidence. "Looks pretty promising Sunil." Minka said. "Thank you so much Minka." Sunil said, glad to hear that he seemed to be looking good for victory already. "Any certain plans for what it will be?" Russell asked. "Oh, nothing special. Just some fine memories from home." Sunil said, as Minka and went over to Vinnie while he continued painting.

Over at Vinnie they saw a completely different situation. While Sunil was working with elegance and calmness, Vinnie was much more chaotic in his painting. Much of it had to do with his food filled stomach sticking out so much that Vinnie had to paint with his arms stretched out to be able to paint with out his stomach touching the sheet. Still he seemed to get the kind of motive he was looking for to his painting, and Minka and Russell decided to not interrupt Vinnie as he was already under so much hard work.

As the two judges where in the middle of discussing who seemed to be the best painter they all heard a loud "CRASH!" coming from Vinnie's station. Looking at it they saw the big bellied lizard laying on top of his painting that was smashed on the floor. Apparently what had happen was that during his stressful painting Vinnie must have trip over a paint tube he had dropped on the floor earlier, making him loose his balance and fall right on top of his unfinished painting.

"OH NO!" Vinnie said, as he quickly tried to get up and see just how ripped apart his painting was. "I can't put something like this up!" He said loudly to himself. "Does that mean I win on walk over?" Sunil asked the judges, with Minka saying "No. Vinnie still has some time left to put up something quickly for us to judge." "But he has to do it quickly since there is only five minutes left of the challenge." Russell added, showing the small amount of time left on stop watch.

Vinnie was unable to know what to do during the small time left. He had very little paint left, but most importantly he had ruin the sheet that the painting where suppose to be on. He just looked around stressfully, hoping to find something to work with, and it wasn't until he looked down on his big paint splashed belly when he got an idea.

"Quick, give me full size mirror!" Vinnie shouted, and immediately Zoe was standing next to him holding a mirror that manages to catch all of Vinnie's body. "Hold it perfectly still." Vinnie said as he started painting. "Hey, isn't that against the rules for Zoe to help him?" Russell asked, with Minka quickly replying "No, not here. I think Vinnie is making something very interesting.

As time started to end both pets really made those last minutes count as they would soon be judge on it. "5,4,3,2,1, and stop!" Russell counted down and shouted, making both Sunil and Vinnie drop their paintbrushes to shoe they where finished.

"So lets start this by having a look at Sunil's painting." Russell said, and Sunil quickly lifted off his painting and turned it around to show them what he had done. On the painting the other pets could see a lot of stuff going around in it. There was Pets, people, markets, buildings, cloth lines hanging out from the windows. There was pretty much a lot of things looking very Indian in this picture, and it also had a frame around it that looked like window frames. "Wow, so many different colours!" Minka said, sounding really impressed. "And what exactly would you call this piece?" Russell asked Sunil, who simply answered. "A window to India." "Very good Sunil, very good." Russell said, before he and Minka decided to move over to Vinnie.

"And what do we have here?" Russell asked, as all they could se was Vinnie standing with his back turned against them and no painting in sight. "Well, at first I was planning on painting something in the same way as Sunil did. But when a little accident happened I had to improvise with something of my own." Vinnie said, before turning around dramatically. "And that something was my own body." Vinnie said, showing all of the pets that he had used the last minutes of his time to paint his artwork on his belly. It was filled with all kind of cool symbols and catchphrases, painted in a neon like purple colour. The natural green of his own skin made for a nice contrast to the coloured words, and given it's size it might even be a (literally) bigger piece of art then Sunil's. "And check this out." Vinnie said before he started to give his belly some small shakes. The shaking of his body made the words and symbols move in pattern that gave the impression that his art was coming alive. Sunil didn't look to convinced of winning this any more.

"Well, I'm pretty speechless at this point." Russell said, while Minka just starred at Vinnie's belly like it had the answers to all the questions of the universe. "Come on now Minka. We need to go away and decided who wins this challenge." Russell said, as he had to drag the pink monkey away from the gecko gut.

"Okay, we need to decided who will win this art making challenge..." Russell started before getting interrupted by Minka shouting, "Vinnie! Vinnie must win!" "Yes. I know that you really admired Vinnie's...art piece, but there's one thing about it that I think you may have overlooked." Russell said, which made Minka confused. "What? He had the most original, and amazing work of the both of them." She said, with Russell quickly saying "Yes, but he also had help making it." "What?!" Minka asked shocked. "He had Zoe holding up the mirror so he could easier paint himself, and the rules clearly said that they where not allowed to have any kind of help while making it." Russell explained, which made Minka pretty sad. "I guess that's true, but does it really have to be so?" She asked, "Vinnie was the one that was in disadvantage during the whole thing. He had a big food filled gut that was just in his way, and when it even made his original panting get destroyed he didn't let it stop him but instead made one heck of an amazing thing to show us. Are you really going to let all of his hard work not count?" Minka asked in a great speech to Russell.

This made Russell very unsure of what to do. He was the one to always follow what the rules said no matter what, but Minka's passion for wanting Vinnie to win made him feel like this might be a time to actually go against them. How will it end?
1231121211211.title: An art challenge. (With Minka guess judging.)

12311212112112.content:
After some waiting Russell and Minka returned to the others to give their decision.

While waiting everyone had already made up their minds on who they thought would win, and that was Vinnie. Even Sunil thought that Vinnie's unique belly art was worth winning, and he was mentally preparing for himself to have his first meal.

Returning to the group Russell looked as neutral as he could to keep it a secret, while Minka looked very, very sad over their decision. "Before giving our decision we would like to say that both contestants made some really amazing art, especially you Vinnie." Russell said looking at Vinnie, "But still this is a competition with rules, and you Vinnie broke the rule about not letting anyone else helping you in any way."

Hearing this made Vinnie's self-confidence of him winning drop in a second, and everybody else could also quickly guess where this was heading. "And having Zoe help you holding the mirror for you made you automatically lose the contest, and therefore gives Sunil the victory." Russell said.

Everybody got both very shocked and very disappointed over the decision they had made, even Sunil couldn't feel completely happy over him once again winning. Feeling sympathy for them Minka told them "I really tried to make him change his decision, but he wouldn't listen to me." in a try to make Russell feel guilty, but to no avail.

"Are you coming to the food bowls?" Russell asked Vinnie, who just answered (sounding very defeated) "Yeas, but I seriously think I might burst if I eat anything more."

As he was on his way to go and do something he was used to by now, Zoe suddenly grabbed is his arm and said "It's my fault you lost this challenge. Let me do it for you." "You would?" Vinnie said, taken by Zoe's sacrifice. "Just look at you, there's only so much your poor body can take. I can survive getting a few pounds extra, I'll just go on a short diet afterwards." Zoe said and walked over to the bowls, and asked for her bowl to filled to the brim with dog-food.

The other pets did that, and she was about to have her first bite when Russell suddenly said "Stop!". "What is it Russell?" Zoe asked, felling a bit irritated over being interrupted just when she was mentally prepared to do it. "I just realized that eating Vinnie's food for him also is classified as a rule break, and therefore the most fitting thing for you to do is to eat two portions of food as punishment for Vinnie."

Hearing that made Zoe regret a bit more that she took Vinnie's place, but it was to late to go back now and she would just have to swallow it. (Literally)

She started eating, and find it not to difficult at first. She ate at a steady pace, and as the food disappeared she didn't feel too much of a resistance from her body. But just like with Vinnie earlier the pain where just around the corner, and when she was about three fourths done she felt her body starting to ask her to stop. She understood first now that Vinnie hadn't been overreacting earlier with how bad pains he was feeling, and as she ate up the final pieces from her bowl she remembered she still had one more portion to eat.

With even more force this time Zoe continue stuffing herself with the dog food, as she ate her second round. Many of the pets where just looking in awe that Zoe, the one thinking about her figure the most now was getting belly about the size of Vinnie's. With small breaks for breathing and burping to give room Zoe pretty much gave up any attempts of keeping her dignity while eating, starting to eat more and more "messy" just to make it end quicker.

After ten minutes of nonstop eating Zoe feel back with a one foot tall, 4 pounds heavy, filled to the limits belly, and gave the biggest burp in her life to all of them. Feeling to tired to even move she looked over at Vinnie and said, "Please Vinnie, win the next challenge. I don't think I have the power to come in and help you again."

Feeling responsible for Zoe taking that bullet (or rather buffet) for him, Vinnie felt he needed to now once and for all beat Sunil in something. And after some thought he decided to pick.

Feeling more regretful of taking Vinnie's place Zoe forces two portions of food into her small Chihuahua body. Leaving her very, very stuffed, and Vinnie to chose the next challenge.
12311212112112.title: Vinnie loses. (And Zoe has to eat)

choices: The blue shell wasn't sent fast enough and Vinnie wins
The blue shell hits and Sunil takes home the victory! (Resulting in a tie)
1231121211212.content:
"A video game challenge!"

He knew that would only involve his hands rather than athletic skill right now, he wasn't very close to athletic.

"I'll set up the consoles!" Russell exclaimed, "I have an idea of how this will work. I have an Xbox and a Wii here. Each competitor will pick a game from both consoles and they'll compete against each other in all four games."

"Sounds good" said Sunil.

"Since Vinnie picked the challenge, Sunil will pick first." Russell said.

"Hmm. Let's keep it simple. Mario Kart Wii and umm Skate 3."

"I see," Russell stated, "and you, Vinnie?"

"Super Smash Bros Brawl and Modern Warfare 3!"

Sunil cursed under his breath. He hated first person shooting games.

"Then let the gaming begin!" Russell announced!

First was Skate 3. They would show off their best skills and Russell would decide who was better.

Sunil went first, doing some average ollies and sometimes a flip or a grab.

Vinnie was utterly astonishing. The combinations he pulled off looked like button mashing, but in reality, he just seriously knew what he was doing in this game!

Vinnie won it hands down.

Next was MW3. Sunil knew he'd lose this one.

They played a capture the flag match against each other. Vinnie expertly shoot every CPU on Sunil's team that came his way, nabbed the flag within the first minute, and ran back even faster. Everyone was impressed.

Next was Smash Bros. Vinnie picked Solid Snake and Sunil was Pit. Vinnie was spamming harder than ever, as he want really a Nintendo person, but Sunil went to town on Vinnie. With a couple masterful smash attacks and well timed shielding and recoveries, Sunil won by two kills.

Finally, it was time for Mario Kart Wii. Vinnie picked Wario and Sunil was Koopa Troopa. The random course which was selected was Daisy Circuit and they both stated off evenly. The CPUs were set on hard and Vinnie was barely maintaining a lead over the 3rd place Sunil. Vinnie was on his third lap and nearing the end, but Sunil got a blue shell. He sent it off as fast as he could, but Vinnie was pretty close to the finish line. What happened?
1231121211212.title: A video game challenge.

12311212112122.content:
"NOOOOO!" Vinnie screamed dramatically, throwing the controller down in a fit.

"Looks like I won! You can go eat now, for it is I who does not need to overindulge myself this time!" Sunil rubbed it in.

"Actually, each of you won twice," Russell explained, "so I believe this calls for either another game or you both eat half a dish. What do you think, audience?" He asked the four (more like three because Zoe was still unhappily full thanks to the previous round) girls sitting and watching.
12311212112122.title: The blue shell hits and Sunil takes home the vi...

choices: Next challenge: Ribbon dancing with Penny Ling as a guest judge!
123112121121221.content:
"Well, we came here to watch them eat, right?" Pepper asked

Penny Ling responded with a soft spoken "Well, yes, but-"

"But nothing!" Pepper interjected, "I pick eating."

"I ALSO pick eatying eating stuffing yourselves silly!" Minka voted in her unorthodox way. That monkey was never coherent.

"I guess I do too then".Penny Ling said.

"Then it's settled!" Russell stated, "You both eat half a portion!"

"Another half!? Why am I losing so much!? I'm clearly more talented!" He grumbled as Russell filled up two bowls half way with even more kibble.

"I believe I can take another half serving," Sunil prepped himself, "It is nowhere near as much as Vinnie has eaten.

"Here you go, boys," Russell said, sliding both bowls towards their respective eaters.

Sunil began eating. He finished it fairly quickly with only a slight stomach ache. It was his first loss after all. So his stomach only protruded a slight bit. It was small, but still noticeable.

Vinnie however, was having a far worse time. After just one more piece of kibble was swallowed, he felt like he couldn't eat anything else ever in the world ever, according to his hyperbolic brain's wording.

Although, his ego wouldn't let him quit. So he ate, with his stomach pushing farther and farther outwards. It hurt, but he kept eating until it was finished. He fell on his back, his scaly stomach, stretched beyond his comprehension. His belly was pushing out a good 6 inches of pure stuffed food. Anymore, and it would start converting into fat...
123112121121221.title: They picked eating

1231121211212211.content:
"Lets start the next challenge!" Sunil shouted. "Yeah! Lets do it!" Vinnie responded.

"There's just one problem here." Russell said, interrupting the two competitors. "What?" They both asked. "Well, since the last one ended in a tie, there isn't any way of knowing who should get to choose." He explained.

The two rivals where pretty struck by this. If nobody got to choose, then what would it be of their contest?

"Then what should we do?" Sunil finally asked. "If there is anyone else here who has a suggestion for a challenge, then perhaps we can that pet choose." Russell said, and looked over at the rest of the group who had previously only been observers.

They all got a bit unsure on what to suggest. None of them was even prepared for this to happen, so they where all without ideas. "Doesn't anyone of you have at least one suggestion?" Russell asked irritated by the lack of imagination from his fellow pets.

After a long pause Penny Ling carefully stood up and said, "Maybe a Ribbon dancing challenge?" She looked at all the attention she got, and was afraid that she had made a bad suggestion. But to her own surprise she first heard Russell say "I nobody else has anything better to give then I think Penny Ling's suggestion will be the one to choose.", and then "And would you Penny Ling be prepared to take on the job as guess judge?"

She had never in her life been in the position of judging others so she was kinda afraid at first, but then said "Okay. I'll do it."

"Excellent." Russell said happy, and then asked "Could you then first teach the two of them the bases of Ribbon Dancing, before they build up a routine?". "Oh dear. This thing give me more responsibility each minute, but I think I can do that as well." Penny Ling said, before walking out onto the floor.

She took her orange coloured ribbon, and gave Vinnie and Sunil (As well as the other pets) a simple lesson in how to try and find a fitting combination of body movement and ribbon twirling. And while Sunil looked like he was trying to catch every single step and movement Penny Ling made, Vinnie had a bit more harder time keeping his attention to her. (If wasn't that he didn't care, he just preferred to discover his dancing skill on his own.)

"And most importantly don't forget to find a routine that fits your style." Penny Ling said, before taking a bow for her lesson. As she got applause from the other pets, Sunil and Vinnie walked away to start practicing their routines.

As Sunil was trying to do all the things Penny Ling had done when she showed, Vinnie was just sitting down thinking on what to do. As he saw Sunil jump around and do pirouettes in the air he knew he wouldn't be able to do anything like that as long as he had a 2 and a half food portion filled belly. If he tried he would just fall forward on his first try. "What to do, what to do?" He thought and looked at his tail, (shaking to a tune he was having in his head) and then suddenly had an idea. As he was practicing Sunil suddenly heard a loud "Ripppp!!!", and looking behind he saw that Vinnie had ripped off the ribbon from the stick it was suppose to sit on. "What have you done?! Do you want to lose?" He asked shocked, and the gecko answered back cool. "Just wait and see."

It was now time for the ribbon dancing contest to start, and first up was Sunil. He started doing his dance and the judges seems to like it, or rather half of them. While Russell thinks that Sunil's dancing is almost as good as Penny Ling's was, Penny Ling realized that it WAS just as good as hers, because he had copied it! Every movement and every grace he did was mimicking after what Penny Ling had done to show them what she wanted to see. It was very impressive technically, but it was just much unoriginal. It made number very boring to Penny Ling, and at one point she almost yawned

Once Sunil was done it was time for Vinnie, and as he entered nobody could see where his ribbon was. It wasn't until he turned around when they could see that he had taken the ribbon and tied it around his tail, making it look like it was six feet long. He then started his routine and unlike what Penny Ling and Sunil had done this was as far from traditional ribbon dancing that you could come. Vinnie's act had much more of a street groove going on, and it was much more focus on him swinging his tail then moving the rest of his body. (Mostly because of his stomach.) Giving his tail had such great flexibility he manage to give a pretty impressive and unique show. This time the roles where reversed as Penny Ling loved what Vinnie had done with her act, while Russell looked really upset.

After both of them had preformed Penny Ling and Russell went of to have a discussion. "I don't know about you, but I think it's pretty obvious you should win." Russell said, which Penny Ling saying. "I also know who it is.". They then decided to both say it loudly to each other.

Russell: "Sunil."
Penny Ling: "Vinnie."

They both got very surprised that they bot had chosen the opposite pet to win.

"I'm sorry Penny Ling, but I think it should have been pretty obvious for you as a ribbon dancer to see that Sunil did the most authentic ribbon dance." Russell said, sounding like it was preposterous for Penny Ling to think otherwise. "He did, but he also did it exactly like I did mine during the lecturing." Penny Ling explained.

"Doesn't help! He was still miles above that freak show Vinnie was giving. I mean how can anyone look at that and be expecting to call it a ribbon dance?!" Russell said loudly, expecting Penny ling to join him in his critic. "At least his show looked interesting! It really looked like he had taken what I did, and made it into his own act." She shouted back, almost wanting to leave the room because of her partners stubbornness.

"We can't just argue all day, we need to decided now which one it is that wins." Russell said. "I'm not changing my vote!" Penny Ling said with crossed arms, and Russell did the same saying "Neither will I!"

But they both knew that one of them would have to, and after a long time there was a winner. And the winner was...
1231121211212211.title: Ribbon dancing.

12311212112122111.content:
"Sunil." Russell said, sounding very straight forward.

"Oh, come on Russell! Can't you let Vinnie win this one?" Penny Ling pleaded.

"Sunil." Russell said, in the same stern tone as of before.

"That poor lizard guy has already been forced to have two and a half bowl of pet food. Can't you give him a break?" Penny Ling asked, to no avail.

"Sunil." Russell once again said.

"Would you change your mind if I gave you a hug?" Penny Ling asked, and was about to hug him when he pushed her away.

"I'm sorry Penny Ling, but when it comes to rules you know I can NEVER break them." Russell said, before he started to go back to the others.

"Sigh" "He has to be so bound to his books at times." Penny Ling thought as she followed him.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------------------

As they came back out the rest of the pets where waiting for them. (Especially Vinnie and Sunil, wanting to see the other one suffer some more.)
