"Pets! After some time debating Penny Ling and I came up with a very easy desision!" Russell said, with Penny Ling mumbling something angrely to herself.

"And the winner in the Ribbon Dancing contest is...Sunil!" Russell annouced, much to Sunil's joy and Vinnie's despair.

"Yes!" Sunil shouted, and Vinnie just sighed as he made his way towards his bowl for a third time now.

"Might aswell get this over with." Vinnie thought and started to dig in.

The glutton Gecko's belly wasn't liking it, but he was still forced to send even more food into it. He could feel how his insides where doing their best at digesting as much of it as possible in order to give room for the new food coming in, and that had the effect of Vinnie's body taking on a few "Changes". His otherwise small and slick body structure "That only a very big belly had been ruining so far) was now getting a bit of a fat layer put on it. His arms, legs, chest, neck and butt where all places that was getting more expanded now. But his belly still was his main attraction, as it still decided to keep it's 7 inches long stretch on him.

After finishing his bowl (And feeling more like a pudgy toad then a thin Gecko.) Vinnie was up to pick a challenge to completely annihilate Sunil in, and he choose...
12311212112122111.title: Sunil.

12311212112122112.content:
"I'm sorry Penny Ling but I'm not going to change my mind, and there is nothing you can do to make me." Russell said, crossing his arms. "Are you sure there isn't any way for you to change your opinion?" Penny Ling asked pleading.

I'm positively sure." Russell said, sounding just as solid to his opinion as before. "Are you sure there isn't anything that could make you change your mind?" Penny Ling asked, this time sounding much more seductive.

Russell immediately felt his heart starting to melt when he heard Penny Ling speaking to him in such a flirty way. "That Panda girl knows I can't resist when she talks like that." Russell thought, as her tried to look as confident as he did a moment ago.

"Well?" Penny Ling asked, blinking her eyes cutely. "Oh, dang it!" Russell thought. While trying to tell himself not to get affected by Penny Ling's weird acting, he had forgot to answer her question. "Shouldn't be that hard to tell her." He thought, before looking straight into her beautiful eyes.

"Well?" Penny Ling asked again, remanding the otherwise punctual hedgehog to answer her question. "I-I-I..." Was all Russell could say, being to lost into Penny Ling's eyes. It didn't make things better that she was walking up closer to him.

"You know, I think we both know that Vinnie's act was the one that had much more excitement." Penny Ling said, while putting one of her paws on the chest of Russell once she was close enough. (Russell was to stiff to even try and resist.) "And the way he moved was so much more masculine, despite that he might have a bit of a gut." She said while dragging her hand across Russell's chest, and patting a little at his own gut. "And finally I think he has by making his own routine proved to be the smarter pet." She said, making her comments on Vinnie to on purpose match a strong sides of Russell.

"Don't you agree?" She asked, having her face being really up close to Russell now, making him blush more then ever. "I-I-I..." Was once again all Russell could give as a respond, as Penny Ling took and put one of her fingers on his cute little nose and gave him a light push. Having no control over his body at all Russell just feel back onto the floor, with Penny Ling standing over him and looking down. "I guess that means I managed to convinced you to let Vinnie win?" She asked, with Russell just giving a light nod as a respond.

Later both of the judging pets returned to the group to deliver the news. "A-After much discussion we both finally agreed on that the winning pet is..." Russell said, being a bit nervous that the other pets would know what happen when he and Penny Ling where all alone. "Vinnie!" Penny Ling filled in happily.

Vinnie took the news with big sheer, while Sunil felt so disappointed over himself. "Oh, oh, oh, Sunil has to eat. Sunil has to eat." Vinnie chanted around Sunil, who was trying his best to ignore him. "Soon you will also have THIS!" Vinnie said, lifting his big belly and shaking in front of Sunil's face. "I know, I know! " Sunil said, being both upset and a little nervous about doing it.

He wasn't known for taking big portions, and having eaten that half portion before felt for him like enough for a dinner to his body. So having to eat two more half portions felt like more then he had ever tried before. Not wasting any time Sunil started eating from his food filled bowl, and could already feel how his somewhat full stomach was already asking him to stop. "This was not going to be easy." He thought sadly to himself.

He ate and ate, stuffing his face as full as he could, chewed with great force, then swallowed it all down to get stored inside of him. He was really regretting that he said yes to this stupid thing. Getting three fourths done he started to feel his stomach getting so big that it was giving him pains, and as he finally ate the last bits he had now a two feet big furry belly. It wasn't as big as Vinnie's four feet scaly belly, but it still felt abnormally big.

Resting on his back while clutching his stomach like he had seen his comrade do after eating, Sunil could hear the sound of Vinnie walking up to him. "So?" The giant gut gecko said. "Are you giving up weakling?" He asked mockingly. "After eating less then you have? Never!" Sunil responded. "Fine, then pick the next challenge." Vinnie said and waited.

After thinking for a moment Sunil decides to choose...
12311212112122112.title: Vinnie.

choices: More hits on Sunil in total! Vinnie wins!
More hits on Vinnie in total! Sunil wins!
123112121121221121.content:
"A paintball challenge!" He announced.

The entire pet shop was confused by this. Sunil? And something that had to do with physical skill?

Sunil realized their confusion and decided to elaborate, "Paintball requires a lot of strategy, as well as the physical part I'm not particularly good at, BUT Vinnie isn't looking too good in that physical department either, is he? He will also be a much LARGER target than I" He said, rubbing it in Vinnie's face that Vinnie was overweight.

"You know what, dude? I don't care about your stupid insults! I'm actually starting to see that I can do anything even with a gut like this!" he said, lifting it up from the bottom for emphasis.

"Oh really? I guess we'll find out during this challenge, then!" Sunil countered.

"I guess we will!" Vinnie said loudly as the two both strode over to Russell.

"RUSSELL!" They both screamed at him.

Russell naturally finched, dropping his clipboard. Normally, he was used to the two's crazy behavior, but he was still on edge about the events that previously occurred...

"Jeez, Rusty. Chill out" Vinnie said.

"And we would like the rules to the competition now so I can crush this-this-idiot of a reptile!" Sunil insulted Vinnie.

"Hey!" Vinnie retaliated.

"Boys! Calm down!" Russell ordered.

They immediately stopped bickering. They were used to Russell having a sense of authority over them. They had found it best in previous times to just listen to him.

"First of all," Russell began now that he had their attention, "Don't EVER call me Rusty. You know I hate that. My name is Russell and it should stay that way. And second, the rules are very simple. The both of you will have one gun filled with exactly six paintballs. The one who's been hit the most loses. And we can tell who's been hit the most because there will be different colored splatters where you got hit."

"Makes perfect sense to me," Sunil agreed.

"You're going down, mongoose!" Vinnie taunted.

"Ooooo, I'm so scared, fatso!" Sunil said with mock fear.

"Hey, you're on your way too," Vinnie said, placing his hand on Sunil's new, food filled stomach and patted it twice for emphasis.

The patting on his stomach upset it and hurt, as it was still unhappy from being fed so much, but Sunil ignored the pain. If he showed it, he showed weakness in front of his competitor.

"Pepper, if you'd please find some toy guns in your prop box. Minka, go get your paint. And Penny Ling...." He got mentally blocked by the reminder of what happened earlier. He stood as stiff as before, his eyes unintentionally locked on her, and wide eyed as well.

Penny Ling picked up on what he was getting pretty fast. Russell was an open book and everyone knew it except Russell himself.

"I'll go fill up some water balloons with paint, right?" she asked, knowing full well that he would freeze even more when she talked to him all seductively. And she'd heard Russell be in charge enough that she figured out his train of thought and what he would have said.

Russell was indeed going to tell her to do that, but again, all he could do was nod stiffly. He hated it when his brain wasn't functional.


Later, the guns were all set up and the two pets had taken shelter behind the fake fire hydrant and under the small slide that came out of a 'hiding place box' as Sunil always called it.

Russell had gotten over his dysfunctional state when Penny Ling had gone off and done what he WOULD'VE told her, but it worked out anyways. He paid it no mind anymore. Now was the time to be a logical referee.

"Are you two ready?" He called out.

The two pets stuck out a visible thumbs up sign since they didn't want to give away their hiding spots with sound.

"Then you'll begin in 3..2..1..GO!" Russell shouted.

Pepper had found an airhorn in her prop box when she was looking for the guns and she got a mischievous idea when she found it. She put get idea in to action right after Russell said go.

She blared the airhorn directly behind him, causing him to scream and curl up into a ball and roll away.

Unfortunately, this caused Sunil to scream too (all the while, Pepper's laughing uncontrollably at how well it worked) and that gave away his position to Vinnie.

"Oh, I've got you now" Vinnie spoke quietly to himself.

Sunil knew what he'd done, so he had to find a new hiding spot fast! He ran out from where he was looking for a new spot.

That was when Vinnie peeked out from his hiding place and saw him out in the open, Sunil's back facing him.

"This is going to be too easy..." He said as he lifted up his gun and took a shot.

It hit Sunil right on his rump.

It scared him so much, he jumped a good foot in the air (even with his added poundage) and sped to another hiding spot. He was better at finding then faster when he was scared.

He peeked out to see where Vinnie was. Vinnie was far too fat to hide behind the fire hydrant, so half of his belly was open for him to shoot. Vinnie didn't know this however, still used to being lithe and able to hide behind anything.

Sunil aimed his shot and fired. It hit Vinnie directly on his gut. Dead center of it.

"AW MAN!" Could be heard throughout the pet shop. Sunil knew he scored a perfect point.

Vinnie waddled out from the fire hydrant, knowing he wasn't safe there. He bounced over to where the hamster tubes were. He put his top half in, but the bottom of his belly wouldn't fit. He pushed harder, but all he got was more resistance from his enlarged gut.

Sunil saw his chance. He lifted his weapon and shot Vinnie right on his back. Sunil shot two more, each hitting one of Vinnie's buttcheeks dead on.

Vinnie blushed heavily while Sunil smiled of confidence and payback.

Vinnie gave up on the hamster tubes. He squeezed his way out and began to run behind his bed. Most of his stomach was still visible. Sunil took another shot and it hit right on Vinnie's three chest hairs.

Vinnie knew that was five shots that hit him out of six, but then, he saw the tire swing and got a great idea.

He quickly waddled to the tire swing and climbed atop it. He began to sing back and forth fairly quickly, using gravity's pull on him as an advantage to get the swing going faster.

Sunil took his last, blind shot at Vinnie. He couldn't tell if it hit or not. But while Vinnie was swinging, he could get Sunil from one of three different angles at him, which meant he really couldn't hide.

Vinnie shot all five of his remaining paintballs at Sunil. He was moving too fast to see if they hit, but they were both out of paintballs. So he hopped off the swing while it was still moving and landed right on his belly. It was a soft landing, but embarrassing nonetheless.


After getting the two right next to each other for examination, Russell began.

Despite being scared out of his spikes, he had seen the hits to their bottoms. Being a good judge, he walked behind Sunil and saw an orange splatter on his backside. That was one for Vinnie. He walked over to Vinnie. He saw the shot on his back in blue paint. He also saw the pink splatter on his left rump cheek. But Vinnie's task was deliberately covering the right one.

Russell, not one for personal etiquette, just wanted to see if the point counted and to be a good, factual judge. So he simply grabbed Vinnie's tail and lifted it very far upwards, exposing his other purple splatter.

Vinnie however, was not as green in the face as bright red with embarrassment. Russell just grabbed his tail, which was kind of a private area for him and was looking right at his rear.

Thank god Russell left to look at their fronts again. And he saw...
123112121121221121.title: A paintball challenge.

1231121211212211211.content:
On the front he could see Vinnie had two more colour splats on him, giving Sunil a 5 score in total.

As for Sunil he was covering his front slightly with his arms, as if ashamed of showing something.

Russell asked Sunil to lover his arms so he could see the result of Vinnie's score, and as he did Russell got surprised by what he saw.

Vinnie had managed to hit all the remaining 5 shots all over Sunil's chest, (Almost making it look like he had some kind of flag tattoo on his chest) and that meant that Vinnie had managed to hit him with all his six shots.

"This was a really close call, but amazingly Vinnie managed to make a perfect run and therefore wins this challenge!" Russell said, and lifted Vinnie's arm like in victory just like in a boxing game.

"I'm starting to get pretty used of winning now." Vinnie said, and smirked on Sunil over what was awaiting him. "Or what do you say Sunil? Feeling hungry?" He asked mockingly.

"No." Sunil said, but that's when stomach started to growl. (Apparently all of that paintball action had made him a bit hungry.)

"Seems like your stomach isn't agreeing with you." Vinnie said, and instead of talking back to him Sunil decided to just get the eating over with.

Since he was a little hungry it wasn't hard for him to eat his portion, but he still felt like it was more food for a day then he was used to.

He had now eaten 2 and a half portions in total, which was the same amount as what Vinnie had been eating. But while most of the fat that Vinnie had got from eating had been settled inside his huge stomach, Sunil's fat seemed to have decided to go more to his "backside", giving Sunil a real pear shaped backside with two big round butt checks.

After eating Sunil had the job to pick the next challenge, and he chooses...
1231121211212211211.title: More hits on Sunil in total! Vinnie wins!

12311212112122112111.content:
Everybody was once again very surprised by what Sunil had chosen. "Every time I think these guys have come up with the strangest thing yet, one of them says something like this." Russell thought to himself.

"A rap battle?" Vinnie asked cocky. "Do you even know who you are challenging? I do street dancing all the time."

"And...?" Sunil asked, not getting where his opponent where going.

"And that means that the rapping is never that far away from the dancing." Vinnie said, sounding as confident as he usually did before each challenge.

"You on the other hand seems to have forgot that you are facing an opponent that contains a very large vocabulary that he now will use to disintegrate those puny defences you call verses." Sunil said dramatically.

"Wait, am I suppose to face Russell in the challenge?" Vinnie asked confused.

"I was talking about me!" Sunil said annoyed over his foe not getting his previous taunt.

"That's to bad, since if it was Russell I could have made a bunch of good rhymes about how big his belly is." Vinnie said, and Russell being not so far from them didn't seem to like Vinnie's comment.

"You mean like that big hanging gut you have Vinnie?" Sunil said mockingly.

This angered Vinnie and he responded by saying "I might have a bit of a belly, but at least I don't have a big blubbery butt like you!"

"W-What are you talking about? My butt isn't that big. Is it?" Sunil asked, and felt on his very enlarged butt checks.

"Well...you are maybe a little wide on the back." Penny Ling said, and giggled a little on how big Sunil's two rump half's was compared to his hands.

"Looks like I just found out what to make rap parts about." Vinnie said, looking at Sunil's enlarged behind.

"And I have found mine." Sunil said, staring at Vinnie's big hanging stomach.

"Okay every pet! Listen up cause I have to tell the rules!" Russell said. "The rules here is that each side gets Three verses each to try and beat their opponent, using nothing but pure words. After both sides have finished up I as the judge will decided who the winner is."

"Zoe." Russell said, turning to the small dog. "I would like you to stand for the music, if that is okay?"

"Why, Yes Russell. I can do that." Zoe said, and Russell was just about to start the rap when she added "But only if you could let me be guest judging this one."

Thinking he was going to go solo on this one Russell turned back and asked, "Excuse me for asking, but why?"

"Don't take this wrong, but since music of all kind is a bit more of my alley I thought you might need my option in this in order to get the most fair result." Zoe said, and Russell was pretty impressed by her very logical reasoning.

"That actually sounds pretty right. Sure Zoe, you can co-judge me on this one." The hedgehog said.

"Why thanks, Russ." Zoe said, and Russell had to admit that while he hated when Vinnie called him "Rusty" from time to time, he did like the way "Russ" sounded.

"Okay, if there is no more interruptions I would like to start this now..." Russell said, and just in that moment Minka jumped down from the swing tire she was sitting in and landed right in front of Russell, scaring him slightly.

"AH! Don't do that Minka!" Russell shouted.

"Oh, sorry for that. I just wondered if I could start the challenge. I saw this on the internet once, and I really want to try doing it." Minka said, sounding very excited.

"Urgh, fine. Just make it quick." Russell said, just wanting to get the whole thing started.

"Great!" Minka said, before making herself ready for the big presentation.

"Epic Rap Battles of Pet Shop History! Sunil! VS Vinnie! Begin!"

Vinnie.
"Have you seen Sunil, the wide loaded goose?
He's butt is so big it should be called the dark side of the moon!
His trunk is so thick, it could blockad a storming moose.
And it stands out so far you would think it was from a cartoon!"

Sunil.
"Who're you calling a goose,
do you have a screw loose?
You're the one who's huge,
That's an absolute!
I may have a big butt,
But compared to you, I'm a runt!
You're so fat, you're bigger than a straw hut!
And everyone shields their eyes so they don't have to see your ugly gut!"

Vinnie.
"I might have a big gut, but it will hurt you!
It will smash, and dash, mash you!
While my weight can be used in sports like Sumo, your behind would more work as a model of two Pluto.
My belly is a prize, much more then your booty.
Showing both grace, and strenght and beauty."
(Vinnie walks over to Penny Ling and have her stroke his belly, as a way to show off to Sunil.)

Sunil.
Graceful? That's blasphemy!
Not a single bit of your belly's worth a penny!
You call your belly a prize,
Sorry to break it to you, friend of mine,
But they call it booty; use your mind!
And I have the real treasure right here on my behind!"

Vinnie.
"You call your butt some kind of reward? What a joke!
If you want to feel a real award, you should give this a poke.
A belly can be used as a pillow, a weight, a snuggling tool.
Anyone who prefers butts must be some kind of fool.
Everyone agreeing with me turn up your thumbs.
And after I have kicked your buns, I will use them as Bongo drums!"

Sunil.
"Rears can do a lot other than just being superior,
Your incompetent gut, I'm afraid is just inferior,
My butt's attractive, people constantly eyeing my rear or,
Wanting to touch more Sunil rump, disgusted if they feel yours!
I'm the better looking one,
There isn't anything it hasn't done,
With it, you all will have more fun,
And so I'll leave you with a pun.
Potential mates are bread, with my BUTTer they're fed.
And so I'd say I won!"

HOW WON?

YOU DECIDE!
12311212112122112111.title: A Rap Battle.

123112121121221121111.content:
Russell and Zoe spent a moment of silence to simply take in all the well thought out burns and self compliments. Then, once they felt they'd taken in everything, they began to discuss in whisper to each other to determine the winner.

"I thought both sides did a great job, but I did say it was a words only match. Vinnie got Penny Ling to rub his belly" Russell paused for a moment to give.a grimace of jealousy before continuing "and with that being an insult to Sunil, and it wasn't words, I think Sunil should win by default."

Zoe considered all he said, then responded "My personal opinion is that Sunil took more fun liberties with his raps. It made it fun and interesting instead of straight forward wording and rhymes. Different is always appreciated in the music industry, darling."

"So it seems we both agree Sunil should win" Russell added.

"Exactly, Russ" Zoe agreed.

Russell was still sort of neutral about how Russ sounded. Eh. It was much better than Rusty.

The two turned around, ready to give their verdict. "We both agree that the winner of this rap battle is Sunil!" Russell announced.

"Yes!" Sunil shouted, "Sounds like a certain fat bellied gecko will need to be eating another helping of food!"

"Yeah, yeah" Vinnie pushed him off, feeling inside like he knew he was supposed to win that.

He waddled to his bowl, it having been filled with yet another serving of pet food. He wasn't as disappointed of eating more as he was that he could now stomach it. He was so fat now, that his belly was used to food intake, and it was 100% ready for more. He sighed, finishing the portion surprinsingly quickly, his already sumo sized gut flopping outwards into an even larger dome than before. His stomach was now covering his.knees fully, all while rounding out in front of him to the point where he couldn't reach around himself anymore. And his newfound chest could easily warrant a bra at this point in time.

He needed to win something. Something that'd get Sunil fatter and eventually fatter than him. Then he'd feel better. Besides, Sunil's fat was distributed much less flatteringly than his own...or so he thought.

Vinnie was sure that Sunil would be as embarrassed about his fat as Vinnie himself was. But Sunil, although still crazy embarrassed if anyone pointed out his big behind, was beginning to show a bit of affection for his enlarged butt.

Anyways, Vinnie needed to win a challenge. So, surprisingly, he chose...
123112121121221121111.title: Sunil won.

choices: Chubby Bunny Challenge. How many marshmallows you can fit in your mouth
123112121121221121112.content:
After considering all that just went down, Russell and Zoe huddled up with each other to determine the winner.

"I'm very impressed by both. I didn't know either had it in them!" Russell exclaimed

"I agree, but I believe Vinnie was the winner here. His rhymes made much more lyrical sense in terms of cadence" Zoe said.

"I'll agree with you there" Russell agreed, "Vinnie it is."

The two turned around, ready to announce the winner.

"Zoe, would you please do the honor of the announcement as guest judge?" Russell asked

"Indeed, Russ. The winner of the rap battle is Vinnie!!" Zoe said with great grandeur.

"YES!" Vinnie yelled, "looks like that huge butt's going.to get bigger, loser!"

Sunil grew redfaced. "Hmph. I still think I won that...But I will accept defeat graciously" he said. But in his head, he wasn't happy at all with these results.

He looked down embarrassed at his large behind. It was already pretty pronounced...now it had to get bigger. He made his way over to the bowl, pseudo-confidently. He ate, feeling very full, but it was less painful this time. It seems his stomach had been stretched out to it's limit already,.so it was becoming used to it's new size and intake.

With each swallow, it seemed the blue mongoose's rear would gain a little more definition, wobbing outwards ever so slowly. Once he had finished, his blubbery rump was the size of his huge head, if not bigger. It was round, yet at the same time drooping from its own weight.

Sunil once again looked at his bottom, cheeks getting beet red again from embarrassment. It was so big and fat! There was no way it couldn't be noticed. Even from the front!

He needed revenge on that gecko. Making him grow so unflatteringly like this! He decided, he'd go for a
123112121121221121112.title: Vinnie won.

1231121211212211212.content:
After seeing that the score was Sunil-3 Vinnie-1 from the paint shots on their backside Russell knew that it was most likely for Sunil to go winning out of this as he made his way to see the two competitors fronts, but he was still slightly surprised by what he saw.

The result showed Sunil as the winner (just like he had predicted), but the surprise was that Vinnie was nowhere near Sunil's final score.

Looking at the front side of their bodies Russell saw that while Vinnie had three colour splats all over his belly, Sunil's belly and chest area was completely clean with zero trace of colour. (Except for his natural fur coat of course.)

"Sunil is the winner!" Russell said and held up Sunil one arm like it was the end of a boxing match.

"Great shooting Sunil. Who know you had such a good aim?" Russell asks Sunil, who just blushes slightly over the compliments given to him and answers. "It's actually not so hard to aim when your opponent is literally as wide as a Barnyard Door."

"I have to admit that a bigger belly indeed makes a easier target." Russell added.

"Not to mention that trying to aim while swinging in the tire probably wasn't Vinnie's smartest idea." Sunil added.

"That's true, he isn't really the sharpest knife in the draw." Russell said, having a really good time talking about everything wrong Vinnie had done during the paint ball challenge. (Not notching that Vinnie was still standing there, and they where saying all of this with their backs turned from him.)

"Uhm, I'm still here." Vinnie said, making Russell slightly embarrassed for making fun of Vinnie while he was still present.

"That's funny that you are still here, since you should be over there!" Sunil said, pointing towards the food bowls. "That's where you punishment is after all." He added in a cocky way.

As he walked over Vinnie was REALLY upset over Sunil now! It was one thing losing again, but having to get mocked also was to much. Next thing he WAS going to win!

As he got over to his food bowl he could see that the other pets had filled it up for him. With this eating he would have had three and a half portions of food since this started! "I just hope I don't burst once I'm done." Vinnie thought half kidding, and half serious.

Being used by doing this now Vinnie wasted no time chowing down on the pet food. He could already after a few mouthfuls that his body didn't want more, but he know he had to go against what it said and continue eating. His belly was already standing out four feet, and he could just feel it grow even bigger. "How can it even store so much food?" Vinnie thought as he ate, and the answer to it was that not all of the food he ate was still in his belly. It was there, but just not in his stomach sack. All of the activities he had been doing in-between eating's had lead to him digesting large parts of the food inside of his stomach. Now instead some of it had been made into fat that was now being put onto his body.

Had he stopped to look at himself in a mirror he would see that he was now had...several chins, a chubby chest, a blubbery butt, timber tights, a thick tail, and finally a stomach that was now so used of carrying so much food inside that the fat had made sure to keep the same big round shape permanently. (Even if Vinnie had no food inside of it, it will still look like it does now.) He was defiantly not the same slim and slick gecko as he used to be.

But Vinnie didn't think about any of that. All he had in his mind was to finish eating, and then win the next challenge against Sunil. "Just wait Sunil. You will soon be the one eating!" Vinnie thought, as he ate mostly out of anger now instead of him just having to. (Which proved to be a good motivation to make him finish without any breaks.)

Once he was done eating Vinnie stood up, now having a gut that stood out at an incredible 5 feet! (And some of that back fat he also had was adding up a couple of extra inches.)

Looking more determined then ever to win Vinnie decided to skip all tactics, and instead go for something that he know he would win. (Even with his size.)
1231121211212211212.title: More hits on Vinnie in total! Sunil wins!

12311212112122112121.content:
"Sunil! I now challenge you to a sumo fight!" Vinnie said, sounding very determined.

Sunil got a bit scared seeing the pumped up lizard (pumped up with fighting spirit, not in body.) challenging him in a game of sumo.

Vinnie might not know it, (Or maybe he did) but he had the perfect body of a sumo wrestler now. His big hanging gut, his wide waits and hips, his thick arms and legs, and massive butt and tail made him one large lizard to bet. He was easily three times Sunil in pure weight, and his added pounds even gave the impression of him being slightly taller then Sunil. (But that was just Sunil's own fears making him think that.)

"Okay. Time for rules." Russell said, starting to like doing this before every challenge. "In sumo the rules are really simple. The two challengers steps inside a small circled formed area, and it's the first one that pushes out it's opponent from the ring that wins. You are both fully allowed to do what ever it takes to get the other one out, just try to not be to violent." Russell explained.

"And don't forget your Mawashi." Penny Ling added.

"Mawa..what?" Russell asked confused.

"A Mawashi is a belt/loin cloth like accessory that all sumo wrestlers wear during matches." Penny Ling answered.

"But why would they need that for the game?" Russell asked still confused.

"To give them both something to take a grip on to easier push of drag one of them out." Penny Lign explained, before leaning over to Russell to whisper. "And also since it would look really weird seeing them do a sumo fight naked."

Russell was REALLY confused now over Penny Ling since Sunil and Vinnie had done pretty much everything else in the nude (Not to mention that they are all without clothes all the time.), but he decided to not ask any further but just roll with it. "Could you and the other girls help put on those Wamashi's...or what you called them on the boys?" Russell asked Penny Ling, who simply gave a nod in response and walked over to the two fighters together with the other girls.

With Penny Ling showing how to do it Zoe, Pepper and Minka all helped in putting on a Mawashi on both Sunil and Vinnie. For Sunil Penny Ling could do it on her own, but with Vinnie's big size he needed the help from all the other girls to reach around and strap it on his frame. (Both Sunil and Vinnie also felt it was pretty awkward having the girls putting on these thing on their crotch areas.)

Once they where dressed for sumo Russell draw several lines to make the ring. (Going after an image in a book he had in his hand while doing it.) Once done both fighters where told to stand in the centre of the ring to prepare for the start.

Standing there Sunil could once again see that Vinnie was much more "equipped" for this challenge then he was. By only standing ready for the fight Sunil could see that there was no way his tiny arms could reach around Vinnie's waist and grab his Mawashi. "If I can't figure out some smart way to beat him I will lose for sure!" Sunil thought scared, looking at the huge creature that was his friend, ready to take him down.

Was it going to be an easy victory for Vinnie, or would Sunil in some strange way actually win?
12311212112122112121.title: A sumo fight.

123112121121221121211.content:
As Sunil was desperately trying to think of a plan, he couldn't do it in time, as Russell shouted "Begin!"

Sunil decided to get in close range and try to think of something then. So, he ran at Vinnie with a war woop. Then, he made contact with Vinnie's blubbery belly. He bounced right off of it and landed on his back on the ground in front of Vinnie. Vinnie gave a cocky grin, he had this one in the bag. Vinnie turned around. Sunil was extremely confused. All that did was provide him with an unflattering view of the gecko's massive derriere.

Then Vinnie began falling backwards. Then Sunil understood. He tried to scramble out of the way, but Vinnie was falling too fast. The huge, green mounds of fat he called a butt landed right on Sunil's face.

All the watching pets elicited a simultaneous vocalization to sympathize with how unpleasant that had to have been.

Sunil squirmed frantically, and muffled screams could be barely heard by the spectators.

Vinnie felt the vibrations of the scream on his behind. It was surprisingly like a massage to his behind. He could relax there all day. But he had a contest to win.

"Give up?" Vinnie asked conceitedly.

A muffled scream.

"Are you sure?"

Another muffled scream.

"Ok." Vinnie said, lifting a buttcheek for Sunil.

The blue mongoose frantically scrambled out and ran out of the ring at lightning speed, horrified with his previous experience.

"Vinnie wins!" Russell called out. The pets cheered for the gecko who'd finally amassed a victory.

"Guess what that means?" Vinnie asked Sunil pompously.

Sunil sighed, "I suppose that was a legitimate win, Vinnie. I will eat" He then dejectedly walked to his bowl with another portion in it.

He hesitated a little. As he reached for it, he had second thoughts about going through with it. But he knew this is what he signed up for. "Bottoms up" he thought, as he flipped the dish upside down, letting it fall down his throat. His bloated stomach surged directly outwards with the food and he now sported a belly as big as a basketball. Little did he know that if he ate again, the fat wouldn't particularly go to his stomach...his destiny was a bit more pear shaped...

Now Sunil got to pick the next challenge. "I say we compete in a-
123112121121221121211.title: Easy victory for Vinnie.

123112121121221121212.content:
Sunil knew that as soon as Russell told them to go Vinnie would come at him with full force and send him flying out of the ring. Unless he could think about something this would be over very quickly.

That's when he noticed something. He noticed that the Mawashi Vinnie was wearing looked to sit a bit loose around him. "Since I had Penny Ling doing mine and Vinnie had the other girls doing his, his one must have not gotten as tightly strapped as mine." Sunil thought, feeling just how tightly his own sat around both his front and back. That's when a light started to come up in his head. "I think I just found a way to beat Vinnie, even if the method I will use could be a bit below the belt."

As soon as Russell shouted "GO!" both fighters grabbed the sides of the other ones Mawashi, but instead of doing what Vinnie was expecting him to (Pushing and/or pulling) Sunil took and dive for the floor. While still holding the belt/loin cloth tightly in his grip Sunil managed to pull the thing of Vinnie's body, and leaving it dangling around his ankles.

Vinnie's first reaction to this was to release the grip of Sunil's Mawashi and start covering his "private parts" with his hands. (Even thought just like we said in the last chapter Vinnie and all the other pets where mostly "naked" all the other times.) While doing that Sunil took the chance to untangle the knot the Mawashi had, making it one long belt instead.

With it Sunil then took quickly and made a new smaller, tighter, knot around Vinnie's ankles. With it finished Sunil backed away to really see what he had done. He had managed to successfully tie together Vinnie's legs so that he couldn't even move from the spot he stood in. Thanks to his large belly he couldn't bend over and untie it either. What's worse was that he was standing very close to the edge of the ring, and it wouldn't take much for Sunil to make him lose.

With just a very carful push Sunil sent Vinnie tumbling backwards and out of the ring. The force of the heavy Vinnie hitting the floor actually made the ground around them shake a little.

"I can't believe what just happen, but Sunil is the winner!" Russell announced, both he and the rest being very taken by the "David beating Goliath" story that they had just witnessed.

The one having the hardest time believing what just happen was Vinnie, who was so sure he had picked a challenge only he could have won. "How did that Sunil even do that?" He asked himself, as he got help getting up and getting untied. "You can think about that while you take your fourth portion." Sunil said, as Vinnie made his way to the bowl.

Almost getting used being here now Vinnie went down eating, getting more food stored in his stomach, that was being turned into more fat, that was making his already heavy body even heavier.

It felt even more humiliated then before since this was the game he had been having all the odds for him to win, and just because he lowered his guard that mongoose came in and made him lose. But he was going to show him. This time he was prepared for that trick.

Once finished (And having gained about another feet of belly length.) Vinnie said that he wanted to challenges Sunil to another game of Sumo, but that's when he heard a Russell saying that he couldn't.

"Wait, why not?" He asked, both upset and confused.

"Because that goes against rule 48 in the "Sunil VS Vinnie: Food Fight" rulebook." Russell said, and hold up a small book with a cover picture of Sunil and Vinnie in a fighting pose against each.

"Uhm, when did you have time to make that one?" Penny Ling asked Russell, who calmly answered "I did some writing on it in-between challenges. Minka helped me with the cover.".

"Always ready for any requests!" Minka added.

"And what was this rule 48 thing?" Vinnie asked, still not being answered to why he couldn't pick Sumo again.

"Rule 48 says, and I quote. In a game of Food Fight a competitor can't pick a game that either he/she or his/her opponent has picked before, but must in stead choose a completely new game. This in order to keep the game more interesting as time goes on." Russell said while reading from the book.

"So I can't pick Sumo, or any other stuff that I know I'm good at?" Vinnie asked.

"If it has been chosen before then no." Russell said plain and simple.

"Ah man." Vinnie said, having to think out something else now. Something neither he or Sunil had done before.

After some thinking Vinnie think's he has found something that hasn't been done yet, and says...
123112121121221121212.title: Sunil finds a way to win.

123112121121221122.content:
"I choose...Extreme Rock, Paper, Scissors!" Sunil said trying to make his suggestion sound really cool, but all the other pets seemed just confused over what he said.

"Extreme what?" Zoe asked confused.

"Uh, I like extreme things as much as the next guy, but Rock, Paper, Scissors. Really?" Vinnie said, sounding disappointed over his opponents choice.

"Since I have never heard about this before could you please tell me what this thing is?" Russell asked Sunil, who looked like he didn't know what he had just suggested.

"Well...You all know how in typical Rock, Paper, Scissors you just use your hands to do the items, but in Extreme Rock, Paper, Scissors you use real items." Sunil said trying to sound as convincing as possible.

"Interesting." Russell said quietly to himself.

"And instead of doing the ordinary way with the rock beating the Scissors, the Paper beating the Rock, and the Scissors beating the Paper. In my game you instead take an item and uses it on the item where it would be considered the weak one. Meaning that if you choose the Rock you must use it to beat the Paper, the Paper will try to beat the Scissors, and the Scissors will try to beat the Rock. And it is the one first beating their stronger item that wins." Sunil said as he finished his explanation.

He really hoped that what he had just made up would work, because he couldn't for the heat of the moment figure out anything else that he and Vinnie could do for challenges. At first it didn't look like nobody was going to get it, but then he they heard Russell speak up saying "I think this is pretty genius." It was just what Sunil needed to hear, since Russell's words made the other pets go from "unsure" to "liking" Sunil's challenge.

"We need to give Sunil and Vinnie each a rock, a paper, and a couple of Scissors." Russell said, as he once again took upon himself the role of the judge for the contest. it didn't take long for the other pets to gather around a two similar size and shaped rock, a equally large piece of paper, and two couple of scissors that was in the right size so the pets could use them.

"You both first choose one item, and then on my signal you both start to like Sunil said beat the stronger item." Russell said, before letting Sunil and Vinnie walk over and choose.

Even though Sunil had been the one choosing it, he was still as clueless as Vinnie was. He just wanted to choose something unexpected and make it sound awesome, and that had now made him standing next to a rock, a paper, and some scissors wondering what to do with them. Seeing that Vinnie had already chosen the rock. To thinking more then that "Paper beats Rock" Sunil picked up the piece of paper.

"You both starts on my signal." Russell said, before giving the count of three to them. On three he also said "GO!!" and both Sunil and Vinnie hurried towards the opposite items.

Vinnie was quick to attack the paper, hitting the paper with the rock until he had managed to cut it into two pieces. "I WON!!!" He shouted, celebrating his second victory in a row. But his cheers where quickly broken by Russell saying "I don't think so." "WHAT?!" Vinnie shouted. "If it was so simple as cutting it in two it wouldn't be much of a challenge, wouldn't it?" He asked Vinnie, who answered with half mumbling "No it wouldn't'." "But what do you think would be enough of a challenge?" He asked, with Russell picking up a very small piece of paper. "If you can make all the pieces this small I would say you are the winner." Russell said, giving Vinnie the small piece. "Oh, man." He said, knowing how much work it would take for him to get the whole paper like this.

Sunil on the other hand was just stunned. Looking at the pair of scissors and then on the paper in his hand he had no idea how to be able to "break" them. "It would probably have been easier to cut through a rock with the scissors." He thought as he tried to figure out what to do. Literally minutes went by, and while Vinnie was doing his best to cut down the paper into tiny bits with his rock Sunil still wasn't any closer on find the solution to his challenge. He walked over to the scissors and tested how good the jaws would work when something finally striked him! The screw. The screw holding the two scissor blades was the key to winning. "If I just stick a corner of the paper in and uses it as a screwdriver I could separate the blades and make the scissor useless." Sunil thought and finally got the motivation to start.

Just like he planned he stuck a corner of the paper into the screw of the Scissors and started trying to unscrew it. But by this time Vinnie had managed to get about 90% of the paper cut down into pieces that was tiny enough for Russell, so it was still a tight race.

Sunil started to feel the screw getting loser, but could also see Vinnie being almost done and having Russell controlling his pieces. Was he going to be finish first, or would he lose it to Vinnie?
123112121121221122.title: Extreme Rock, Paper, Scissors.

1231121212.content:
As Sunil started he felt that he didn't got his best shot on it since the level of sound wasn't anywhere near the volume that Vinnie had made. He wanted stop and try again, but he heard Vinnie remind him, "You only get one shot at this! If you stop now you lost."

Sunil understood that he needed to keep going and try to push himself to go louder, even thought nothing seemed to change. While Vinnie's had lasted only about ten seconds Sunil got his going for about a minute before feeling the pressure drop inside.

Once finished he understood that he had still not manage to be anywhere near Vinnie's level of burping. "I'm impressed man." Sunil said, while putting his hand on Sunil's shoulder. "That was probably the longest burp I've seen anyone do. But we both know that we said that it was the loudest one that would win." "And that means I lost." Sunil said depressed. "Don't take it so hard Sunil. I choose this game because I knew I was good at it, after you have had your meal you will be the one to choose what we will do next." Vinnie said. "Yeah, you're right." Sunil said, sounding more positive now. "So go over to your food bowl, eat up, and then choose something that you know you are good at." Vinnie said to encourage Sunil.

With much more confidence in himself Sunil walked back to his food bowl to eat an extra portion of his lunch, and then find something to kick Vinnie's butt in. His confidence didn't feel as good once he stood in front of his bowl, and felt how his fullness from drinking the soda was coming back. Still he knew the rules, and if he didn't eat now he wouldn't be able to challenge Vinnie later.

He gave it his first bite and felt that it could still go. He still like the taste of his food, and if he just continue to take these small bite he might get it all down rather painless. He didn't feel the same when he was halfway through. Now he really felt like he was getting as full as can be. All he wanted was to quit right there, but seeing Vinnie watching him (and waiting for him to give up) was good enough reasons to why he had to continue.

Forcing the last part of food inside his mouth Sunil laid back rubbing his painfully round belly. It felt like he was going to explode if he did anything that would involve to much movement. "Well Sunil, what kind of challenge will you choose?" Vinnie asked, looking like he could take on anything right now.

Sunil know that in his current state he wasn't going to be able to do much physical things. Maybe if he got to rest until a third challenge his stomach might become calm enough. So first thing to do should be something that wouldn't involve much work on his parts, and it being hard for Vinnie.

After some thinking Sunil decided to choose...
1231121212.title: Always louder then longest.

12313.content: What other combination do you choose?
12313.title: Other choice.

choices: Sunil continues to dream after he gets back to sleep
123131.content:
"Russell and Sunil's Romantic Dream"

It was a peaceful morning as the Pets were arriving to The Littlest Petshop, they waddle into the building,  Miss Twombly greet their owners, Blythe leads the pets to the playroom; as they get to the door they get wedged in the doorframe. "Blythe dear could you help us get free please" Zoe asks her good friend. Blythe sighs as she tries to push the pets through to the door. "Sure guys, but it's going take me a while guys" Blythe responds to Zoe. the pets groan in unison; Blythe starts to push the pets through the doorway, as they get out of the door they roll into the playroom screaming and crying.

They tumble into the wall and each one fly in every direction, when they halt they were all dizzy, they all stumble around. they bump into each other; they fall over onto the floor,they all are grasping for air to get their breath back."Is everybody ok..." Russell asks the others, the others try to get up as they help each other up, they look at each other they thank the ones that helped them up "Thank you Pepper" Zoe said to Pepper, "No problem Zoe, anytime" "Thanks Vinnie" Penny-Ling says to Vinnie. Russell and Sunil fell together, the two collapse on the floor Sunil fell first behind the lazy boy, Russell soon follows as he falls Sunil catches his friend, they blush at the situation "Oh, sorry Sunil... are you ok?" the FUDGEhog asks the Blue BUBBLEGUM Mongoose. "Yes...Russell, Thanks for asking are you... ?" Sunil asks his friend. Russell looks himself over, "I believe so Sunil" he responds to the Mongoose.

Sunil had always dreamed of this very moment about Russell, he wanted to tell him how he about him but he was to shy too actually tell Russell. "Russell..." Sunil starts to talk to Russell. "Yes..." the hedgehog says to the mongoose. "Russell i uh..." "Yes Sunil..." "I love..." as Sunil was about to confess too his lover the playroom and everyone start to fade away. 

Sunil wakes up in his pet bed at his house "Wait wheres Russell, oh c'mon, another dream why am i having these dreams about Russell?" He asks himself as he gets up. He climbs up onto his owners bed and wakes her up, "Oh Sunil, can't sleep baby?" his owner asks him, Sunil walks to his owner and whines. "Ok, you can sleep up here baby" his owner cooed.

Sunil curls up in his owners arms and gets back to sleep.
123131.title: "Russell and Sunil's Romantic Dream"
