1233.title: Straight Couples.

choices: Tell Penny Ling how he feels.
Wait until he's more sure that it is love.
12331.content:
Inside the littlest pet shop Sunil was practicing out on of his magic tricks for himself. His goal was to make the water inside a glass he was holding in front of him with on hand to levitate over his head, and then down into another glass he was holding with his other hand. Standing silently in a corner away from everyone else, Sunil took a deep breath and started focusing. As he focused he could feel the water rise from the glass, and start moving over his head. Just as it was right above him, he heard the voice of someone who had been walking up to him. “Hey Sunil, what are you doing?” Taken completely out of his mediation the water above his head fell down on him. “Oh my god, I am so sorry! I didn’t mean to disrupt you when you where doing something important!” The voice said with lots of guilt. Rubbing the water out of his eyes Sunil saw that the one speaking was Penny Ling.

Had it been anyone else Sunil would have told them how angry he was that they interrupted him while he was doing some complicated tricks, but as soon as he saw that it was Penny Ling his whole anger over being disturbed seemed to just disappear. Seeing her beautiful eyes and hearing her cute giggle over seeing him all wet made Sunil laugh a little at it as well. “I only come here to tell you that its time for Mrs. Twombly to feed us. I didn’t know that you where busy practicing your magic.” “Oh, that’s nothing to apologize for.” Sunil said blushing slightly. “I-I’m just gonna clean up my act here first, and then I will join you and other pets for feeding.” Sunil said slightly nervous. “O-Okay. See you soon.” Penny Ling said, also sounding slightly nervous and walked away.

While cleaning up the water from the floor Sunil thought about why he always acted so strange when Penny Ling was around. When all the other pets where near them to he didn’t feel anything but when it was just he and her, he felt so strange inside. He felt like a fire started had started up inside of him. He got all sweaty and nervous too, and felt like he was about to faint whenever she got really close to him. “I think I remember my mommy telling me about these feelings when I was just a kid,” Sunil thought to himself, “She told me that she had felt the same way when she meet my father.” “She told me that this thing is called…” Sunil paused as everything became clear to him. “Love” He said to himself.

What should he do now?
12331.title: Penny Ling and Sunil.

123312.content:
Was he in love? He hadn’t ever thought about it. All those times when he and Penny Ling had been close to each other, or he had even just stared his eyes at her he had felt love? Thinking about it more another thought entered his head. “Was Penny Ling also in love with me?” looking back at it there had been times when Penny Ling had just walked up to talk to him without any real reason, and every time she had always looked just as nervous to speak as him. She had also looked a bit sweaty to speak and seemed to have problem keeping her eyes on focus on him, just like he had with her. Putting two and two together, Sunil finally saw the great picture in front of him. He was in love with Penny Ling, and she was in love with him.

After cleaning up Sunil went to join the others to get his food. They all had there own individual bowl where they would get their food in. when Sunil got there he saw that almost all of it was eaten. “What? But who would do something like that…” was all Sunil manage to say before getting interrupted by a small burp. Looking behind him he saw Penny Ling sitting there rubbing her slightly outlined belly. “Oh, I’m sorry! I had just eaten my own food but felt I needed some more so I looked at your bowl and thought he wouldn’t notice if I took just a little but when I started eating I lost control over myself and just eat and eat and managed to stop just when there was only very little left and I hoped that you wouldn’t notice.” Penny Ling rambled in panic, tears starting to form in her eyes. “Take it easy Penny Ling. It’s no problem.” Sunil said trying to calm Penny Ling down. “I’ve actually…thought about going on a diet.” “R-Really?” Penny Ling asked sweeping her tears of her eyes. Sunil took and put her hand into his, and as they did this Sunil could feel this warm feeling start rising again. “Yep, we are definitely in love.” Sunil thought to himself.

Feeling all mixed up by the emotions going through him Sunil thought about what would be the next step to do with his and Penny Lings love. “What I remembered my mum told me was that the first thing my father did when they had seen each other was to take her to a date. He had taken her to a place to eat, and once their eating was done he told her his true feeling about her. So the logical thing to do is to do the exact same thing, the only questions is where can I find a place to take Penny Ling out for a dinner date?” Sunil though just as the answer came jumping straight into him.

Who was it that could help him?
123312.title: It can't be love, can it?

choices: The pantry room in the Sweet Delights Candy store.
1233122.content:
Being to lost in his thought Sunil didn’t notice that their next-door neighbor Buttercream Sunday had come to visit (Buttercream is a yellow and brown colored rabbit who lives in a candy shop that’s right next to the pet shop.), and jumped right into the unsuspected mongoose. They both hit the ground and Buttercream was the first one to apologies. “Oh, I'm sorry! I thought about all kind of sweet, elite, flavors of candy I could create when I jumped right into yourself Sunil." She said in a very fast rapid pace. (Both being a rabbit and having a huge consuming of sugar made her whole persona very hyperactive and fast talking.) "I'm the one to apologies to you, since I was to busy trying to think out some good place for a dinner date." "A dinner date? Oh! Who are you having feelings for?" Buttercream asked curiously. "What? Me? No, no, I-I'm not having a lover. I'm doing this for a friend." Sunil tried to lie, but he could see that Buttercream wasn't buying it. "Oh, why did I have to tell her my secret plans?" Sunil thought to himself. "Fine. It's Penny Ling." Sunil said, finally giving up trying to hide it. "The Panda?" Buttercream said in a some what surprised tone. "What? Is it something wrong?" Sunil asked. "No. No. It's just that I saw you becoming pared together with Pepper instead. You know your looks, your personalities. It just felt more right." Buttercream said blushing a bit. "Pepper? I like her as a friend don't take me wrong, but I don't feel the same for her as I do for Penny Ling." Sunil said.

"Right, right, but do you have a plan for how your lovery-smugery dinner will be?" Buttercream asked Sunil. "I haven't got very far since sadly there isn't many places for pets to date." Sunil said sadly, feeling like this date would never be able to work. Buttercream too felt sorry for Sunil's sake until she got an idea so bright and good that it made her jump around Sunil like crazy for getting so excited to tell him. "I guess by your behavior that you have figured out a way for my plan to work?" Sunil said knowing his friend's behavior well. "I figured out the bestest most perfect place for two love-bonding mammals like you and Penny Ling to hang out in." "Oh, tell me. Tell me please." Sunil asked excited to hear it. "The place I'm thinking about is..." Buttercream said, dragging it out for suspense. "Yes?!" Sunil said, almost not able to contain himself.

The place Buttercream was thinking about was...
1233122.title: Buttercream to the rescue.

choices: Some pets wonders where they are going.
12331221.content:
"The pantry!" Buttercream finally said proud.

Sunil got from being excited beyond belief to both disappointed and confused. "The pantry?" He asked. "Yes." Buttercream answered without any doubt. "The pantry in the candy shop next door?" He asked a bit slower. "Yes." Buttercream answered still as sure. "The same one where we all got locked inside and almost turned insane in?" Sunil asked really slowly so she wouldn't hear wrong. "The very same one." Buttercream said like if he was still asking her in a normal tone. "Is there something wrong with it?" She asked confused, as she saw Sunil looking like he was not able to handle the information. "How is a place that reminds both me and Penny Ling about being trap with no way out a romantic place?" He asked. "Because that is the romantic part of it silly." Buttercream said like it was obvious to the clueless mongoose next to her. "Just how is it suppose to work?" He asked, really wanting the answer to it. "Just imagine this." Buttercream started. "You take Penny Ling to come and see some brand new sweets that I have prepared on a dinner table for you. As you two walk in I acts like I have forgot something for your date, and that's when you two get trapped. I tell you through the door that I will go and find a way to fix it, and leave you alone. With Penny Ling knowing that I'm out there trying to find a way to fix you out she will be more clam down about the situation, and you two will both be able to have the most cuddly-duddly date you want without the worries of someone interrupting."

"Do you like it?" She finished asking. "Like it? I think this is a GENIUS PLAN!" Sunil said so loudly that he almost got the other pets attention. Quickly calming himself down he said to Buttercream in an almost whispering tone. "In that way Penny Ling and me would be all alone all night if we want to." "And since I will be preparing the whole thing I will be fixing all the settings and the food for also." Buttercream added. "All you need to do is to ask her out to follow you to it. Think you can do that?" She asked a bit cocky. "Oh believe me. If you fix up for tonight I will make sure to have Penny Ling with me for the evening." Sunil said back in a very similar tone. "Then make sure to have her by my so called private place at around 19:00, and I will be having almost everything done. "No problems, Buttercream." Sunil said with much confidence.

Later when he actually was standing near Penny Ling (Who was having her back turned against him) he didn't feel as much confident anymore. "Come on Sunil!" He thought to himself," You can do it. Buttercream is taking care of everything else and you only need to ask her to join you." With all his inner strength he took and carefully tapped on Penny Ling's shoulder. She turned around and looked at Sunil with her cute eyes. "Yes? Was it something you wanted?" She asked and gave Sunil a cute wink. "I-I..." Sunil stuttered, unable to say a single word. "Come on Sunil!" His inner voice said. "You can't back away, so just say it!" "Would you..." Sunil said before taking a quick pause. "Yes?" Penny ling asked curious. "Want to.." He continued before taking another quick pause. "Yes?" Penny Ling asked even more interested. "Followmetothepantry?" Sunil said quickly. Penny Ling had to think for a moment to separate the words from Sunil's rushed ending before asking. "Why do you want me to go there?" "Well, there's a..." Sunil said before feeling his nerves grab him again. "Don't stop now, Sunil! You have already asked the question. Tell her!" "A...Surprise." Sunil finally said. "A surprise?" Penny Ling asked. "Yes a surprise, and if you follow me you will see it." Sunil said and reached out his hand to Penny Ling. Without any second thought Penny Ling took his had and was being lead to the pantry. "Well, I guess this could work." Sunil thought to himself. "This whole thing was technically meant as a surprise for her, and when I tell her my feeling for her it will become another surprise."
12331221.title: A romantic evening in the pantry.

choices: Stay at Sunil and Penny Ling's dinner.
Cut to Buttercream and the other pets.
123312211.content:
Once there Buttercream was waiting for them outside the pantry's giant metal door. It stood wide open and was revealing the huge stockings of candy in all its forms waiting there. "Is the surprise waiting for us inside?" Penny Ling asked, getting a bit scared remembering the past memories of it. "Yes Penny Ling. If you follow me in we can see it together." Sunil said and took her hand and lead her inside. On the way in Buttercream leaned over to Sunil and asked "Haven't you tell her about the date?" "I will tell her very soon." Sunil said quickly before getting inside with Penny Ling.

Once inside Buttercream went on with the plan and gave the door a light push and had it slam shut behind Sunil and Penny Ling. Sunil was prepared so he kept himself calm, but Penny Ling got taken by surprise and remembering her previous experience of it made her start having a panic attack, and seeing it made Sunil think that this might not have been such a good idea. "Calm down Penny Ling, calm down." Sunil said and got himself closer to her trying to calm her down. "We are locked inside again! And nobody knows we are in her, AGAIN!" Penny Ling shouted, almost starting to cry. "So, so Penny Ling keep it together. This time we aren't forgotten. We have Buttercream outside knowing we are inside." Sunil kept saying to comfort Penny Ling. "Hey!" They heard Buttercream's voice say from the other side of the door. "I'm sorry, the door seemed to have been slamingly dangily again. I can't open it myself, but keep calm I will get some help for you. Just stay where you are and I'll get help."

"Stay where you are?!" Penny Ling said, sounding a bit more upset now. "Where else do you think we would be going?" She asked, but Buttercream had already left so she was left without any answer. "Great, what are we suppose to do now while we wait?" Penny Ling asked still a bit upset over the whole thing. "Oh, I think I know something we can do." Sunil said and pointed to where there was a nice small table with two nice small chair and some small plates with some delicate sweets served up. "And if you still would be feeling a bit hungry I think Buttercream or her owners wouldn't mind if we took some of this." He said and pointed at all the stocked up candy that was surrounding them. Before Penny Ling got a chance to answer she heard he stomach make a growling noise. "I guess we can eat a little while we wait." She said as she stared walking to the table. "I just fed her up a bit, and then when she's feeling a bit more softer inside I'll take and tell her I love her." Sunil thought as he started following her to the dinning table.
123312211.title: A plan that "locks" in place.

choices: Penny Ling wants to know what that "something" is.
1233122111.content: At the dinning table Sunil and Penny Ling could see that Buttercream had prepared a real feast for them. The table was twice as long as they where tall and half as wide, and filled to every corner with little snacks. There was hard candy, soft candy, sour candy, filled candy, and tons of different chocolate dishes. All with a huge barrel like container carrying several gallons of soda to wash it down with. For almost a minute they both just stood there admiring the huge amount of food there was just for them. It wasn't until Sunil looked over at Penny Ling and said "Well, shall we?" before they decided to sit down and start eating. Penny Ling was about to grab a piece and eat when Sunil stopped her. She was about to ask why when she saw him carrying something that was hidden behind the table. It was a couple of small (small for a human) plastic cups that he placed down with the backs up next to the table. He then took on of them and pulled it back a bit, and gave Penny Ling a hint of coming over and sit down. Penny Ling understood and walked up to him and as she started sitting down Sunil took and pushed the cup back into the table like he had seen people do to at dates in movies. "Oh, such a gentleman." Penny Ling said, surprised to see Sunil act so super nice to her. "I couldn't let myself let a lady have to sit on her own." Sunil said, trying to put on the charm. "Oh Sunil, you have been acting so polite lately." Penny Ling said being back at her normal happy self again. "It's like something wonderful must have come into your life." "You could say that it is something like that." Sunil said, and got once again lost in the beauty of the panda girl's eyes.
1233122111.title: The start of a great dinner date.

choices: After several more tries he still can't say it.
12331221111.content:
Back in the pantry Sunil and Penny Ling was having a wonderful time together. They both enjoyed all the different kinds of sweets there was, and Sunil wanting to looks at his best took every moment he could to help Penny Ling enjoy as much as possible. Every time she seemed interested in tasting something that was out of reached for her he wouldn't just get it for her, he would go so far as to hand feed her personally so all she had to do would be to lean back and enjoy the sugary richness of it. As Sunil was feeding her he thought that this would be the perfect moment to tell her he loves her, but as soon as he was about to tell her he could feel his words disappear, and before he could find courage to speak he heard Penny Ling say "Okay thanks. I don't think I need any more of those."

"Okay, maybe next time you can say it." Sunil thought to himself.
12331221111.title: They start to eat.

choices: He eat more food to calm his nerves.
123312211112.content:
Sunil's second chance of telling his feelings to Penny Ling had also failed. Just like his third, and his fourth, and his fifth... He had been given so many chances to tell Penny Ling about how he feel for her while feeding her, and he had flunked every time. He had even started to hand feed her things that was just right next to her just for another chance to try and speak, and even thought it didn't make any different in Sunil it definitely made a different in Penny Ling. While Sunil had been eating based on how big his own hunger was, Penny Ling had been eating both based on how hungry she had been and by her own polite of not wanting to say no to Sunil's offer to feed her. Even as time went on and Sunil started to feed her things she hadn't even asked for she didn't have it in her heart to tell him no when he was putting down so much effort to please her. She was know for being able to store a lot of food inside of her, but even she felt like she was reaching her limits!

Her otherwise slightly potbelly that she had been carrying was now stretched out to half a feet in length, (Which was huge for someone her small size) and it wasn't just expanding straight out but to the sides as well, making it even more clear of her new "rounder" body shape. With all this food still being digested inside of her and with Sunil right next to her prepared to feed her another cinnamon bun Penny Ling said something she wouldn't have want to say during this whole day, "No please, no more. I'm feeling so full." She really didn't want to say it since she didn't want to appear as mean to him, but she had to know where her own limitations where. "Oh okay." Sunil said a bit surprised, but looking down at his lover's swollen middle he could clearly see that she should have told him off a long time ago. "I'm actually starting to feel a bit full right now as well." which was true, Sunil was also sporting a slight out rounded belly by now. Looking over at the table he could see that he and Penny Ling had together been eating about a third of the huge buffet that had been given to them, so it would make sense that they both would feel a bit full now, but that came with a huge problem now for Sunil. With no more food to give to Penny Ling he wouldn't have no other choice then to...try and talk to her!
123312211112.title: A lot of opportunities, and none taken.

choices: Sunil dosen't know what to do.
1233122111121.content: Several minutes passed without anyone of the two saying anything, and Sunil thought that this was just getting to ridiculous now. "There is nothing else to do now Sunil, you have to talk to her NOW." His own thoughts told him. Taking extra long inhaling Sunil now know that once he had to exhale he was also going to say something to her, he didn't know what it could be but he was going to say it. Feeling he couldn't hold his breath in any longer Sunil exhaled and said, "Are you still feeling worried about being locked in?" Penny Ling looked surprised at him and Sunil felt like he had ruined just about everything. He put his face in his palms and was waiting to hear Penny Ling either cry or getting angry, but to his surprise all he heard was her calmly voice saying "No, I don't think so." Looking up he saw Penny Ling's cute face still being as happy as she always is. "I'm feeling a bit uncomfortable in my tummy because of all the food I ate, but except for that I feel fine." She said and hold her hands on it, trying to make it feel better.
1233122111121.title: The truth hurts.

12331221111211.content:
"You know, my mother used to use an old technique of massage on me, just for cases when I had hard stomach pains from eating to much." Sunil said, and got of the chair and on to his knees. "And if you want I can do the same thing on you to help your pains." Penny Ling felt a bit fluttered about having Sunil rubbing his paws on her stomach, but the pains was getting more annoying the more time went on, so she said "Okay, I'll give it a try."

Sunil had to once again take a few moments to build up some of his courage for this. He had been closer to her before feeding her, but this felt a bit more private in a way. Nevertheless he looked up and asked Penny Ling if she was ready and she said "Yes." back to him. After a few more seconds of concentration Sunil took and placed the fingertips of his paws on Penny Ling belly. Starting slowly and with almost no force in his pressing Sunil wanted to first feel just how thick the pains where before going further, and when he had a idea of what was the right level to work on he started for real. Once he started to think more about Penny Ling's stomach instead of her Sunil started to work like an almost professional massager. He let his paws move softly all over her wide round middle, poking at any soft spots he could find, and doing some grabs and shakings with it to help work out her digestions of the food. After a while he could her Penny Ling staring to make some moaning sounds, and he could feel her middle parts getting more softer. Once he felt that he was done Sunil let go of Penny Ling's belly and saw how she slipped of her own chair, and laid herself on her back on the floor. Standing up and looking down at her Sunil asked, "How does it feel now?" "It feels wonderful!" Penny Ling said, as she was massaging her own belly, trying to do exactly as he had done. Looking down at her Sunil saw that her stomach hadn't changed size, but from how it was moving when Penny Ling was pressing her paws at it Sunil came to the conclusion that his massage had made all the food inside of her digest quicker, and was now all a part of this panda girl's frame. "Sunil." He heard Penny Ling say. "Yes?" He asked nicely. "Come down her and feel my belly." She said in a tone that sounded a bit seductive. Sunil could feel his whole body temperature rising with several degrees as he started to lower his hand to feel at her belly once again. But when he was just on his way to touch it he heard her say, "No. Lay down next to me."
12331221111211.title: An indian belly massager.

choices: Penny Ling is angry at him.
123312211112111.content:
At first he thought that he had misheard her, but he decided to guess he had heard right and laid himself down on the floor next to her. They looked each other in the eyes and Penny Ling said, "Put you hand on my belly." Sunil once again felt a bit shy, but Penny Ling decided to take his hand and guide it this time. She put it on the highest point of her sphere shaped stomach. "Do you feel it?" Penny Ling asked Sunil, who took a few moments to really feel on it until he said "No, what is it?" "You made my tummy happy." Penny Ling said sounding very happy herself. Sunil didn't answer, he just felt very happy himself being so close to the one he loves. "If only I could say it now, everything would be perfect." Sunil thought, and he was on his way to try and speak when Penny Ling interrupted. "Sunil. I want to tell you something, if it's okay with you." "Sure Penny Ling. What was it you wanted to say?" Sunil said, with a little bit of frustration inside. "I have been having this strangest feeling for a long time, and I think it has to do with that I like you." Penny Ling said. "Well...I like you too Penny Ling." Sunil said, unsure if she had just said what he thought she said. "No, I mean I like like you." She said this time a bit more shy. "You mean that you..." "Love you? Of course I do." Penny Ling said and hugged him. "Well, I have to say that I think I like like you the same way." Sunil managed to say, which was being hard, not only because of his shyness but also because he was getting almost no air when he was getting hugged by Penny Ling. "Oh Sunil, why haven't you said this before?" Penny Ling asked hugging him even harder. "It hasn't feel right until now so to say." Sunil answered with some force. "Especially now when you said it first." Sunil thought to himself.

As they continue to hug each other Sunil and Penny Ling felt that they where on their way to have their first kiss. Closer and closer their lips reached each other as Sunil thought "Wow, I can't believe this plan actually worked." to himself. But just as they where both on their way to kiss he felt Penny Ling pull back and ask, "Wait, what plan?" "Did I say that out loud?" Sunil asked, and the now very suspicious eyes of Penny Ling was evidence enough that that was just the case.
123312211112111.title: Things heat up. (In a good way)

choices: Penny Ling releases her grip on him
1233122111121111.content:
"Where you planning on having us trapped again?!" Penny Ling asked with a voice that sounded like she couldn't decided if she was mostly angry or sad. Sunil didn't know what to do now. He had planned on telling her about it, but he was planning on doing it much later when she wouldn't be thinking so much about it. "I-I..." Sunil tried to say nervously, before getting cut off by Penny Ling. "NO! You listen here!" She shouted, as she got up and walked a few step away from him before facing back. "YOU knew that I got really scared last time I got trapped in here, YOU knew that I felt really nervous of setting my foot inside of there again, and YOU knew that the only reason I did it was because I trusted you." She said saying the word "trusted" in a tone that made it sound like she had been betrayed by him. "Could you at least tell me why you did all this to me?" She asked while having her back turned to him and staring to feel tears forming in her eyes. "Well, it was actually a very strange way for me to show that I love you." Sunil said while giving a light chuckle at how silly it sounded when he said it, but pretty soon he saw that Penny Ling wasn't laughing at all with him, she was actually very, very quiet. "Uh, Penny Ling?" Sunil asked, while getting up as well and starting to walk up to her. He was about to put his hand on her shoulder when he saw Penny Ling's hand turning in to fists before she turned around, looked him in the eyes and shouted. "I'm gonna kill you!" Before jumping onto him.

Sunil had barley understood what was happening before he had the panda girl tossing herself over him, and knocking both of them over the food table, breaking it. All Sunil wanted to do was to shout "I'm sorry!" to Penny Ling as loud as he could, but that was a bit hard to do since she had her paws in a chocking grip around his neck. She was totally blinded by anger, and Sunil knew that if he didn't do anything now things might end really badly for him.
1233122111121111.title: Things heat up. (In a bad way)

12331221111211112.content:
Knowing his arms wasn't going to be strong enough to neither break her grip or get her off him, Sunil instead use them to pick up some of the leftovers that was scattered around them. He took a fist full of candy in each paw and shoved them both into the open mouth of Penny Ling.

Penny Ling got so surprised by this sudden counterattack by Sunil that she released her grip on his throat, so he could escape and get some air back into his lungs. Having her mouth full was still distracting, and instead of just spitting it out she got reminded by the wonderful flavours it contained and she decided to swallow it instead. Sunil could see that the candy turned Penny Ling for a moment back to that sweet happy creature he once fell in love with, and saw a new chance to fix his mistakes. But as he grabbed some new candy to use he could see Penny Ling getting back into her angry side, and instead of coming towards him with her full force she seemed to pick up some candy as well. Knowing that she could probably find a way to choke him with that as well Sunil didn't waste any time and started to charge towards her, just as she was doing towards him. Both pets knew that the candy would be the key to bring down their opponent, and they both needed to be first force-feeding the other.

As they both collide into each other they both started forcing as much candy as they could down the other once throat. They both had different advances in this fight. Penny Ling could take swallow bigger loads down easy and she could pick up bigger pieces with her paws, while Sunil could work his arms much quicker feeding the panda a lot more small pieces before she had chance feeding him. If they had been feeling stuffed before that was nothing compared to now. Sunil was starting to get a stomach that him look like he was in the nine month carrying a child (and it felt just as heavy as a child would to him), and Penny Ling had gone from being half a feet in belly length and slightly chubby to now a full foot (30cm) stretched out and being so round that it made her whole walk circle much more of that of an Sumo-wrestler. She was also getting her tights, hips, arms, and face in a much more fat filled state.

How does the fight end?
12331221111211112.title: Eat for your life.

123312211112111121.content: It finally reached a point where neither of their bodies could physically not store any, more, food. At that point they once again got so tired after eating that they didn't care about fighting anymore, and instead decided to lay down next to each other again. Turning her head over to Sunil Penny Ling said, "Sunil. I just want to say that I'm so sorry for what I did. I just got so angry that I couldn't control myself." "No, I'm the one that should be sorry." Sunil said back, "I know just how scared you where about going back inside there, and I use your feeling to make you wanting to get closer to me." "Yeah, we both made our mistakes today." Penny Ling said, before looking a bit further down at Sunil. "I see that I gave you a belly." She said, while stroking it slightly. "And it looks like I took and remade your whole body." Sunil said, while feeling on one of her newly fatted arms. "You know, where I come from the bigger a female panda is the more attractive we look." Penny Ling said while blushing a little. "That couldn't be more true." Sunil said and leaned forward slightly. Penny Ling was confused at first but realized quickly where this was going, and she wanted it to.
123312211112111121.title: The stuffed end of it.

123312211112111122.content: And how will win this "Candy eating fight"?
123312211112111122.title: One wins over the other.

choices: Things continue to be that easy.
1233122112.content:
Back at the pet shop, Buttercream was jittering with excitement. She'd never been asked to keep a secret before! She was having a hard time not telling anybody about Sunil and her cooperation to get Penny Ling to like him.
As a result, to keep the secret, she stood stiffly in the corner of the play area, eyes wide open and twitching every one in a while.
Everyone else didn't seem to notice how oddly she was acting, but it was Buttercream. They were used to 'odd' with Buttercream.
Vinnie was lying on his back, playing with a paddle ball game. He was bored. Usually, he had Sunil to do his crazy stunts with so he didn't know what to do with himself.
"Hey, wait. Where IS Sunil?" he asked out loud for everyone to hear. It wasn't really directed at anybody, but if they had an answer, he'd take it.
Buttercream tensed up. She started to freak out a little, but she calmed herself down. She'd have to keep the secret. It was for romance.
"Probably off practicing his magic again in some hiding place because YOU bother him a lot when he was trying to concentrate" Pepper said.
"Yeah, you're probably right." Vinnie said going back to his paddle ball game.
Buttercream relaxed. She didn't even have to explain anything! Hopefully, it would remain this easy to keep the secret the entire time they were in there. She wondered how they were doing. They were probably being all lovey-dovey bo-bovey right now.
1233122112.title: Keeping a secret isn't easy.

choices: It takes a long time before they ask again.
They all start looking for them almost immediately.
12331221122.content:
Buttercream began to relax. Nobody seemed to be asking about where the two love birds were. She breathed a sigh of relief, but she hadn't been calm for long when she heard Vinnie blurt out randomly, "Ugh! I'm so bored. I'm going to go look for Sunil."
"I'm actually beginning to get curious as well," said Russell, "but I guess he must be working awfully hard on one specific magic trick. When it comes to determination, Sunil even has my assiduous work ethics beat!"
Vinnie went into the dumb waiter and started pulling on the rope to lift himself up to Blythe's room, thinking he'd be there.
"I hope Sunil is up there," said Minka, "he's been gone for, like, ever!"
"He has been gone for an extended period of time...and now that I think about it, so has Penny Ling." Russell remarked.
Vinnie came back down from the dumb waiter. "He's not in Blythe's room." He said.
"Well, that's weird." Pepper said.
"Weird indeed," thought Russell, "where was the last place you saw Sunil, Vinnie?"
"I haven't seen him all day. I was sleeping when my owners brought me here. Remember? I slept in until an hour ago."
"Pepper? Russell continued, "When did you last see Sunil and Penny Ling?"
"When we all ate our lunch earlier today. It was when Sunil got all mad at whoever ate his food. I didn't see who ate it though, I was too busy eating mine." Pepper said.
"Hmm, how about you, Buttercream? Where did you last see them?" Russell asked unaware of her fear of the question.
Buttercream had a very hard time keeping the truth inside her. "Um-uh..." she stuttered as she began sweating heavily. Her ears were twitching which was a clear giveaway that she was nervous. "At lunch...yeah! Like what Pepper said! Definitely. Totes my goats! He was for surely absolutely positively definitely for serious at lunch!" she said hurriedly with a nervous smile.
"Ooookaaay" said Russell. He didn't expect anything less from Buttercream. He was used to her scatterbrained thoughts and jabbering.
"I guess we're going to have to search without a clue on where to start."
She was in the clear...for now.
12331221122.title: They start to wonder again.

choices: Buttercream keeps it a secret just a little longer.
123312211221.content:
"After 30 or so minutes of continuous searching, we still haven't found Sunil or Penny Ling!" Russell declared.
"Yeah, I know, right! I'm, like, seriously wondering where on earth they could be." Vinnie said.
"Is everybody absolutely positive that they don't have any idea on where you saw them last?" Russell asked for everyone to hear.
"Well, now that I think about it," Zoe thought out loud, "last I saw them was with Buttercream."
Everybody simultaneously turned their heads towards Buttercream who'd just froze in fear. There was an awkward silence fur a while before Vinnie broke the ice by prodding at her.
"So," he poked verbally, "where did you take them?"
Buttercream was a terrible fibber. She'd never been able to make a believable story. But she'd have to try her hardest because this was for romance! She needed to be strong! For Sunil and Penny Ling!
"Um, don't know! Yeppers! No clue-delly doodely!" she spat out.
Well, it wasn't a great lie, but it'd have to do.
"You sure you saw them with me last, Zoe-ster?" she asked putting the pressure on Zoe.
"Hmm, I guess I'm not absolutely sure...I'm sorry I blamed you, Buttercream. I was simply trying to help the search." Zoe apologized.
"It seems we did jump to conclusions..." Russell admitted although, he wasn't really sure that Buttercream wasn't to blame...
123312211221.title: Things starts to get serious.

choices: Buttercream lead them to where Sunil and Penny Ling is.
1233122112211.content:
Back at the pet shop, all the pets were searching frantically for Sunil and Penny Ling. It looked like a mad house with pets running back and forth checking under pillows and such, knowing fully well that there was no way that either one of them could be hidden there.
Russell however, stood in the center of the room with his clipboard he so loved. On it, he was making off items in a list of where everyone had looked. He had just marked off the last item in the pet shop.
"They're definitely not in the pet shop," Russell declared, "is everyone sure that they didn't see either one leave the building?" he asked frantically.
"I hate to be so accusatory, but darling, I believe that Buttercream was the last person I saw them with." Zoe said.
Everybody looked back at Buttercream who they'd just noticed hadn't been searching with the rest of them.
"Now that you say it," Minka said thoughtfully, "I think I saw them leave the pet shop with Buttercream!"
"Why didn't you say so earlier?" Russell asked very frustrated.
"I didn't think of it earlier." She replied.
Russell put his thumb and forefinger on the bridge of his nose. He always did that when he needed to calm himself down. Man, that monkey was awfully annoying sometimes.
"Either way, the fact remains the same. There are two witnesses, albeit only one of them being credible, who've seen you take them out of the pet shop." Russell spoke directly to Buttercream.
"Spill it, rabbit!" Vinnie attacked verbally.
Buttercream's mind was racing trying to think of another feasible excuse, but to no avail. They were going to find out! She hoped that Sunil and Penny Ling were doing well.
1233122112211.title: Busted.

142332.title: More

1423321.content:
One day at the littlest daycare, the girls themselves were having lunch unaware that the food they were eating was extra fattening until it was too late as each girl started becoming morbidly obese as their bodies were getting fatter until it stopped as each girl started heavily waddling towards the nearest mirror to see their reflections.

"Okay i'm how they say in human words, morbidly obese but well you know a girl can always enjoy being plus sized" Zoe said.

"No pun intended, but i'm living large and eh i always knew i'd lose my figure someday" Pepper said.

"Oh boy oh boy i'm huge, gargantuan, humongous, as in big!" Minka said.

"It's official, i'm big and fat now and i may as well get used to being big and fat and all that" Penny said.

"Goody Goody gumdrops i'm huge" Buttercream said while she tapped her foot on the ground causing everything to shake rattle and roll.

Soon someone entered the room the girls were in and it was none other than....
1423321.title: Littlest Daycare

choices: Blythe notice the girls are acting strange
14233212.content:
Mrs. Twombly. She looked surprised when she saw the super sized girls.

"Oh my goodness what happened here?"

Before anyone could answer Blythe came out of the dumbwaiter.

"Hello you guys I'm... What the... " She looked surprised at the morbidly obese girls.

She had seen fat kids before but not even near as fat as they were. In a few hours their parents came to pick them up. If the looked like this they need to answer some difficult questions. Questions she did't had a answer for. She had't an idea what was going on.
Suddenly the girls saw her. Happily they jumped at her and their combined weight pushed her to the ground.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------------------------------------

Blythe oped her eyes and rubbed her head. She moved so hard she rolled out of bed. Sleepy she opened her eyes. What a strange dream. Some people say dreams tell something about the future. She sure hoped that was't the case here. If all kids suddenly became obese. Then they would't fit the clothes anymore Blythe made for them. Yeah she made clothes for them and many people liked it to buy her clothes for their kids.
She looked at her clock.

"What this late already. I need to hurry or else I'm late."

She fast got dressed and jumped in the dumb waiter and entered the littlest day care.
You had Zoe Trent. White girl with purple and pink hair who had a great sense of fashion, and loved trying on clothes and wanted to become a model. Especially a model for the clothes of Blythe.
Minka Mark. A white, happy, active girl that was kind of artistic in her own way, and always wore colorful clothing. She had white hair in two tails.
Pepper Mildred Clark. A white girl with her white hair in a pony tail and also a lock of hair partly for her face who always loved telling jokes and do funny things. She wanted to become a comedian.
Penny Ling. The sweetest girl at daycare. White but with black hair that nicely fell around her face. She was very friendly helpful but also a bit sensitive and loved dancing with her ribbons.
Russel Ferguson. Small boy with spiky hair who loved hanging out with Blythe and tried to lead the others as good if he could.
Senil was a tanned boy with green blue hair who loved doing magic tricks, but it was easy to scare him.
And of course Vincent (Vinnie) Alfonso Terrio. A white boy with green hair that loved dancing. Not too bright but he was also a part of the group.

"Oh Blythe can you help me? My hair is a mess thanks to the wind. It's blowing so hard outside." Zoe said.

Blythe smiled and carefully combed Zoe's hair.

"There so good as new. Now I..."

She was suddenly cut of by a ripping sound and a loud scream. Blythe moaned she knew exactly what that mend and walked over to a corner of the day care. There was Minka. With a few yard of tape curled around her. This was't very unusual. It happened about once a week. If Minka used taped she ended on the ground, tape around her stuck in the strangest positions. Just like now. Blythe walked over to her.

"Really Minka? Again?"

"Me and tape have a hate-love relationship.

"Yeah. It loves you so much it does't want to get separated from you." Blythe mumbled.

She took a scissor and carefully cut Minka free.

"Careful. Don't get that stuff in your hair. Else I need to cut your hair. I used to cut the hair of my dolls and... I was't so good in it. Those poor dolls."

"Can I paint now?"

"Not without a apron." Blythe said clearly.

Minka was good in painting in her own style. But Blythe also knew that while doing it she sometimes go so excited that she ended up with more paint on her clothes then on her paper.
After Minka got her apron there was a knock on the door Blythe opened the door and saw Youngmee. She hold a white, chubby girl with blond hair tight by her wrist.

"Hi Blythe. I'm just here to drop of Buttercream." She said and let go of the girls wrist that laughing ran inside.

"Don't you think she eats a bit too much Sugar?" Blythe asked.

"Yeah well she's a candy addict, and my aunt owns a candy shop. You do the math. By the way. How is it with us, you-know-what."

"I'm working on it."

She closed the door and looked around. Minka was painting, Vinnie, Russel and Senil were in the reading corner looking through some books and Pepper was doing some stand up comedy for Zoe, Penny Ling and Buttercream.
She fast got some paper out of her bag and started on what Youngmee asked. A design for some clothing. There would be a customized party in a few weeks and you needed to make your costume by yourself. The person or persons with the best costume would get a prize. Blythe, Youngmee, Sue and Jasper decided to join together. The also decided that Blythe need to design the clothes for them. Jasper, Youngmee and Sue would get the stuff, and together they would make the costumes. Blythe fast started working. Just when she was done coloring it she heard a voice.

"That looks nice. I would love to wear that." Zoe said.

"This? Sorry Zoe but it;s way too big for you."

Zoe was bit shocked. After hearing the stuff was too big for her. It made her feel like she was too small and thin for nice clothes. Of course that was't what Blythe mend, but that's how Zoe understand it.

"Hey what's up Zoe?" Pepper asked. "You look like someone died."

"I saw some new designs from Blythe."

"Are they that bad?" Penny asked.

"No they look great. But Blythe said they were way too big for me. But it would look so good at me."

"But for who was it then. You and I are about the same size. Minka is even thinner then us. Penny and Buttercream are perhaps a few sizes bigger but not that much. So why would that clothing be so much bigger?" Pepper asked.

"It is't for the boys. It's obvious for a girl. But am I too thin?" Zoe asked.

Just the Blythe stood up and went too the bathroom. The four girls fast looked at her sketches.

"You're right they all look great. But Blythe said they were too big for us?" Penny asked.

They walked over too Minka.

"I'm done with my new painting. Wanna see?"

"Sorry Minka. We're not in the mood." Zoe said.

"Yeah. Blythe made some new clothes." Penny said.

"So?" Minka asked.

"They are fantastic... but too big for us. Or we're too little for them." Zoe said sadly.

"That's too bad. Hee I have an idea." Minka said excited. "If they are too big for us... we just need to become bigger. Gain some weight!"

The others looked at each other. None of the others thought about that, but it sounded very logical.

"Well it's for Blythe and her clothes. For that I will gain a few pounds. Who's with me?" Zoe said and stuck out her hand.

"I am." Pepper said and put her hand on Zoe's hand.

"Me too." Minka said and put her on Pepper's hand.

"Like if you have too ask?" Penny said and put her hand on Minka's hand.

"Well I suppose so." Buttercream said and also put her hand on Penny's hand.

"We're gonna gain weight so we can wear Blythe's new clothes."
14233212.title: "The New Clothe"

choices: The girls talk with each other
142332121.content:
Blythe added a bit more color to her design.

"Hey that looks nice. Is that for the girls?" Someone said.

Blythe turned her head and saw Russel.

"Oh hi Russel. No this is't for the girls. This one is for me. There's gonna be a customized party. For me and some of my friends and there is a prize for the best costume. I was asked to design the costumes."

"No wonder. You make the best costumes." Russel said.

"Well... I guess I'm pretty good at designing clothes. It's partly thanks to you guys that I was able to show my clothes."

"Can we come too?" Russel asked.

"Eh no! Sorry."

Blythe looked at the clock.

"Oh it's almost lunchtime. Time to get the food."

Miss Trombly wanted the kids to have a good meal once a day. So she always made sure every day there were different kinds of food to choose from. Every kid took a plate and took what they liked from the food. It worked pretty well. Blythe put the food ready and waited for the kids.
All the girls ran over to be the first in line and each piled their plates high with food. When she saw all the girls walked to their table with full with food she wondered what was going on. There was way more food on their plates then usually. At least on the plates of the girls. The boys took the normal amount.
Blythe once heard that children knew exactly when they had enough bus still she thought this was kind of strange. Why did all girls suddenly at the same time eat more?
Penny Ling and Buttercream always used to be a bit chubby. Pepper and Zoe were normal sized and Minka was as thin as a rail. So why were they suddenly eating so much?
Did they perhaps had a contest who could eat the most? Blythe knew they could be very competitive sometimes. If that was the case she should't worry too much. That would be over the next day.
She walked over too the girls.

"Is everything all right here?" She asked suspicious.

"Everything is fine. Why do you ask?" Zoe said trying to stay calm.

"All right then. But just be a bit careful with how much you eat. If you eat more then you tummy can handle it comes back out again. I rather don't spend the rest of the day cleaning up your barf."

"Do you think she suspects anything?" Pepper asked.

"No I don't think so." Zoe said.

"I sure hope those new clothes are worth eating all this." Minka said.

"Of course you saw those clothes right." Zoe said. .

The girls are were able (to Blythe's surprise) to eat all the food they piled on their plates. However Blythe saw them after wards all five moaning and rubbing their swollen bellies in the reading corner.

"Should I do anything about this?" She asked herself. "I know I need to watch those kids but...I mean it's not like they are on a diet or something. If I deny them more food their parents's can complain. Who am I to say how much they should allow their child to eat? Well maybe tomorrow everything is all back to normal."
142332121.title: Snack time

142332122.content:
Blythe was hanging Youngmee, they were outside talking about the convention that they were so excited about, they were rubbing each others bellies, Blythe and Youngmee were dating for a while now; they loved how the other looked. "So Song, hows your stume coming along sweetheart?" "Well Darling, it's coming along fine, just need to finish the weapon systems"

"That's AWESOME!!!1,, how long do you think it'll take to get it done sugar?" "Well it'll take me a while, since i gained a few extra kilos" Youngmee chuckles at herself, Blythe starts to giggle as well "I've noticed that too dear", Blythe grabs onto Youngmees' belly and jiggles it; as Blythe shakes her loves huge gut. Youngmee starts to speak, "Hey...Stop, that tickles Baxter!"

Blythe continues to play with her girlfriends belly, they were on the sidewalk; meanwhile, back inside the daycare the boys were playing catch, while the girls were thinking how they would  be able to wear Blythes new outfits. "We need an idea ladies"Zoe says to the others, "'We know that Zoe, we have to think of a way to fit into Blythes clothes!" the rookie comedian says to the diva.  Penny was the next to say something "But Blythe specifically told you two not to touch her designs" Zoe was annoyed by the goodie goodie; "Penny,, Penny Ling,  If Blythe told  us not too touch, she means we can!" Zoe says to the cheerful girl. "But..." Penny says to the popular girl. "So we should try on her desighny wineys" yells Buttercream at the top of her lungs.

The girls agreed on their plan to try on Blythes designs,Zoe starts to waddle to the heap of  costumes nervously, as she goes to the heap, Pepper followed her, both girls try to get dressed in  the clothes, as they  were about to finished. As they were zipping *RIIIIIIIIIIIP*
142332122.title: Blythes' Suspicion

1423321221.content:
The two girls were wide eyed; shocked that they ruined  Blythe's new design. "what was that noise  Pepper?" Zoe asks the rookie comedian nervously. "Well Zoe. there's only one thing that makes that specific noise, and it can only be one thing" Pepper answered her best friend, they head to the mirrors to see what had happen.

As they look at their reflections they see their errors; Both girls had tear Blythe's new designs, "Oh no!, Pepper we ruined Blythe's new designs." Zoe whines to Pepper as they removed the teared clothes, really depressed about what they did wrong. they put the remains back on to the table. The two guilty girls waddle to hide.

Meanwhile at the Sweet Delights, Aunt Christy was stuffing her niece and her niece's GF with sweets; also feeding herself with her confections as she was enjoying their presence in her shop "It's been a while girls, so hows the Daycare fairing  Blythe?" she asked the fashionista so cheerfully. "Well Aunt Christy, it
s starting to feel like a second home to me, Russell's so fun to hang with. Zoe likes to sing karaoke for the other kids, Vinnie and Sunil are best of friends, but they have their moments, then there's Minka, she quite the artistic genius, so creative mind. Penny,  Penny-Ling  she's the sweetest and kindest girl there, now for Pepper, she's fun to be with. shes got the best jokes you've ever heard!. Well you know about Buttercream." Blythe tells her aunt.

"!?!!...Wh..what.sorry guys I goy to check on the kids." Blythe heads to the daycare frantically, she enters the doors. She goes to the play room to check on the kids,they were playing cards, Blythe sighs as she heads to the door knob display room where the costumes were . As Blythe entered shes sees the designs she smiles, as she reaeches for the clothing she was still smiling, but as she picked up the costume her jaw drops and she starts to tear up "ZOE! get in here" She says angily. 

Zoe enters with her head down "Yes Blythe?"
1423321221.title: Blythe's Fashion Emergency sense's are tingling...

14233212211.content:
"My clothes are ruined, and I just think you knew what happened."

"All right. It was my fault. I tried them on and... well they ripped and I'm really sorry. I did't do it on purpose. It was a accident."

"Zoe. Accidents happen. But why did you try to wear my designs when I told you they were too big for you. I always make clothes for you and the others. Don't take my designs if I don't want you too. Now I need to repair them."

"I'm really sorry Blythe, but I..."

"Zoe I'm really angry at you. You gonna have a time out!"

Zoe sadly walked too the time out spot. She felt really bad. She admit that she kind of deserved this. At least she did't betrayed the others. But why were't that clothes for her. They looked so good.
In the meantime Blythe looked at the clothes.

"Well I can repair them. It just needs a few stitches."

She knew Zoe would't be in time out to long. She could't stay mad too long at those kids. After all Zoe said she was sorry and seemed to feel really bad. Besides that she wanted to wear her clothes. That was kind of flattering. But still.

"Those clothes are't for them but for me. I and the others worked so hard. We have a good chance to win."

She put the clothes in her bag and walked back to the other kids. The boys were still playing catch. But the girls were standing together whispering.

"So the clothes are to big for us. According to what Blyte said." Pepper said.

"Well I would't try them on again without Blythe's permission. I never saw her so angry. Not even that time when Vinnie put insects in your drink and you barfed over some schoolbooks." Penny said.

"Thank for reminding me of that. He wanted to show me what's funny, well that was't funny." Pepper said angry

"It was funny for him." Minka said.

"That does't matter right now. How are we gonna be able to wear those new clothes from Blythe. We're not big enough for them."

"We can't wait until we grew enough. We grow very slowly." Penny said.

"But we can become bigger If we eat more!" Minka said.

"That's an idea. That way we become bigger. Perhaps enough to fit in those clothes." Buttercream said.

"Why not. I love a good meal." Pepper said.
14233212211.title: Time out for Zoe
